I booked a table for 3 people for Christmas dinner. Here are some minus points after my experience:
1. The service is not as advertised: (1) The Christmas choir starts at 7:00, but we booked a table for 7:30 and did not see the people telling us the time to start singing; (2) Giving away hot wine, foreign guests saw that the restaurant brought it to them while their family was "ignored"; (3) Christmas gifts for guests -> once again giving gifts to foreign guests who don't give gifts to their own table, reminding the staff that gift-giving time is over so they will ask "please" for one gift for my table 😒 (what the heck)
2. Guests are not allowed to try the wine first, so the restaurant pours it so they drink it. If I have feedback on the quality of the wine, the restaurant will not charge me for my glass because of my feedback, the guests at the other table will still be charged.
3. Food doesn't come out according to the dish, the cold weather makes the food cold and hard. Steaks and pizzas were cold and had to be reheated, and the restaurant's appetizer sandwiches were dry and hard
4. The restaurant has a view of both the sea and the city, but it has columns and an old-fashioned design, so it's not too impressive.
In short, 3 people with a bill of nearly 3 million (dessert was cut off because I was really frustrated with the above experience) is not worth it in my opinion.

We visited during the day because our baby was young, and it was actually more relaxed during the day, making it easier to come with the baby!! 👍🏻👍🏻 The seafood platter was fresh with a variety of ingredients, including shrimp, lobster, scallops, and clams, and both the texture and taste were satisfying.👏🏻👏🏻
The plating was beautiful, and I was able to taste the full flavor of each ingredient.😚 The staff were friendly and helpful, so we were able to enjoy our meal comfortably. It was especially satisfying that it was a quiet daytime, so we could enjoy our meal leisurely. If you want to enjoy delicious seafood in Da Nang, I highly recommend it.🤭🤭

Everything we ordered today was delicious! The seafood was fresh and well-seasoned, the duck breast was delicious, and the staff were very helpful. Thank you for celebrating our anniversary with us! We had a wonderful dinner.

The atmosphere is great, the service is great, and the food is friendly. ^^
I went to Fatfish in Da Nang with my family and loved it. It was delicious. I highly recommend it.
We were amazed with Fatfish since we stepped our feet in. All the staff were super friendly and the food was really delicious,  drinks were top-notch! I highly recommend this restaurant!
The atmosphere, the view, the taste, the value, the service—everything is perfect! If you're looking for steak in Da Nang, this is the place to go :)

I wanted to enjoy a quiet glass of wine near the Dragon Bridge in Da Nang, so I searched Google reviews and ended up visiting :) Fat Fish had a variety of alcoholic beverages and a nice atmosphere. I was especially impressed by how clean the restrooms were, unlike other local restaurants in Da Nang. 👍

First of all, the atmosphere is crazy...
Especially when the sun is setting or it's completely dark,
the atmosphere is incredible...ㅠ I was so happy to be able to eat a Tomahawk steak for half the price in Korea.
I want to go again next time I'm in Da Nang... The atmosphere and value for money are amazing...ㅠ
Make sure to order the salad with avocado and shrimp with the meat! It's so delicious!

The Dragon Bridge is nearby, and the night market is a 6-7 minute walk,
so be sure to walk over after your meal and see the Dragon Bridge Fire Show!
(The Dragon Bridge Fire Show is on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays at 9 PM)

Fatfish surprised me with its mix of Vietnamese and Western dishes served with style. The cocktails are creative and refreshing. You should try their fresh oysters and grilled fish. I highly recommend this restaurant for anyone looking for a modern riverside dining experience in Da Nang.
Mahi Mahi was a little bit dry. But the rest were good! Had a very nice  birthday celebration with my wife there with the help of the wonderful staff.
Food was okay but nothing impressive. I felt like it’s overrated but if you are tired of Asian -asian food during your trip then here will be a good place for you.
This was our last meal in Vietnam and it was delicious! The decor was amazing and the bathroom sink was so cool, it was shaped like a fish 🎏
This Da Nang seafood restaurant is luxurious and delicious! It's right next to the Han River, so the view is beautiful, and the staff are all incredibly friendly.

The atmosphere of the restaurant is so pretty. I ordered the seafood platter and seafood tagliatelle pasta. The seafood was really, really fresh. 🌊
If you're a seafood lover, this is a great option.

I visited during the day, but I think the atmosphere would be even better in the evening!

11:30 AM, Brunch, Customer #1
The charm of a quiet, off-the-beaten-path Han Riverside location
The roads and waterfront aren't ideal for tourism.

The 8% tax bagels are tough.
The atmosphere is good, especially the second floor.

The food was sub par but the team tried their best.  We had amazing seafood at other restaurants so it isn’t a Da Nang thing.

I read some of the other reviews prior to posting and almost didn’t but Mat’s responses are really over the top for those that don’t like the food.  We are just trying to help other people and it’s an honest review.  I would never recommend your restaurant as the food wasn’t good in my opinion. This is solely my personal opinion.  Others seem to love it.  Let them review and say what they might.  Don’t hammer the poor reviews, just apologize for the experience, be humble and offer them a chance to try again.  Good luck.  Customers are your gift and their experiences are the business you are in.  All the best.

We chose this place while strolling along the Han River. We weren't familiar with it and chose it for the amazing Heart of Darkness beer (made in Vietnam). We found it to be a very well-kept place with young, knowledgeable, and friendly staff. The food? Delicious!!!
Take a look!
A well-deserved 5 stars. Welcoming place and knowledgeable, friendly staff. Excellent food and top-notch beer 🔝

I started with the crispy sweet and sour hot wings. They reall6 are crispy and seems they are cooked with sauce on instead of tossed at the end. Kept them nice and crunchy.

I also had the Diavola pizza l and it really surpassed expectations! The crust was my favorite kind (a little char on edges and bottom), tasty, spicy salami and very flavorful cheese.  I usually only eat a third of this size pizza. This time -> 75% haha.
We chose a seafood platter, but it included quite a bit of fried food. The oysters had melted cheese on them. If you order this in other countries, it's quite different.
I ordered mahi mahi. Delicious and beautiful.

Had 3 dishes:

Crispy Calamari
Lightly battered and calamari was cooked to perfection. Chipotle mayo was a nice touch. The only imperfection, the batter caught on a tad too much oil.

Seafood Tagliatelle
The servers were kind enough to remake a second portion as the first was too salty. The seafood were fresh and cooked to perfection. Shrimps and calamari had a slight smoky aroma and a nice bite and the morsels of fish were great as well. However, the marinara sauce lacked depth. Notably, fresh pasta was used in the dish but I wished it was al dente. Then again, the taste and texture profile could be adjusted for locals.

Crispy Pork Belly
The rind was leaning towards chewy than it was crispy, the meat was tough. Coconut rice cake was a tad undercooked, you can taste the raw grains of rice. Apple sauce was decent.

Overall, I generally think their seafood dishes will be a hit. They are fresh and cooked well. Servers are friendly, attentive and the atmosphere was cosy.

Eight people visited. The food was delicious, the atmosphere was nice, and the prices were reasonable. It's a place with everything you need, but three generations of our family went, and I think it would be even better for a family of three or a couple.
Delicious food and kind staff

Staff speaks great English, everyone was welcoming and attentive. I’m a solo diner and prefer to sit at the bar; their bar is full service. I appreciated the beer selection and the bartender correctly identified the better beer out of the 2 I was choosing between. The food is thoughtfully executed, with elements that were new to me and that I liked. Eg. The brûlée citrus with the calamari, the black sesame in the batter, the roasted chile skins that were julienned. They make a lot of items in house, which is why I picked this place to try out. The spinach and ricotta pasta was delicious; it had bite, but not chew, and the filling was well seasoned. The toasted pine nuts on top were a necessary and appreciated texture. I had to get extremely picky to find any faults, but consider these negligible: basil chiffonade lacked uniformity and the basil was a bit bruised, perhaps because the knife needed to be a bit more sharp? Pasta was a touch thick, but had excellent crimping technique, which is a skill I personally struggle with. The sauce could’ve been adhered or merried better with the pasta, maybe with a little bit of that pasta cooking water. The dish lacked acid. Again, super minor things, but I would have welcomed a lemon wedge or a touch of vinegar to lift that cream sauce a bit. After a few bites, it got a little heavy on the palate and I needed some relief. Overall fantastic meal-I would eat here again and I have in mind a couple more dishes I’d like to try. Highly recommend.
Refreshing cocktails, fantastic wine, friendly, knowledgeable service. The food was even better.

I had a wonderful dinner at Fatfish Restaurant. The location is perfect, right by the river, with a beautiful and relaxing atmosphere. The food was fresh, delicious, and well-presented — especially the seafood dishes.

What really made the experience even better was the excellent service. Phuong Anh, our server, was incredibly friendly, helpful, and professional. She made us feel very welcome and took great care of our table throughout the night.

Highly recommend this place if you’re in Da Nang. I’ll definitely come back!

The riverside location offers a pleasant atmosphere, and the interior design is luxurious.
The seafood platter is fresh and pairs perfectly with white wine.
The staff was friendly, so I had a pleasant meal.
It's also great for families, as it's perfectly safe for children!
The fish and chips are crispy and delicious, so be sure to try them!

It's a restaurant with a view of the Han River, so it's a bit of a stretch, but the food here is truly delicious. I enjoyed a seafood platter with craft beer. The seafood was fresh and delicious, and the night view of the Han River was fantastic. The atmosphere was so wonderful that I felt good throughout the meal. I highly recommend this place if you're looking for a special night in Da Nang.

I had the seafood platter with craft beer, and it was absolutely amazing. The seafood was fresh and flavorful, and the night view of the Han River was stunning. The atmosphere was perfect, making the entire dining experience memorable. And all the staff were so attentive and friendly. I highly recommend it if you want a special night in Da Nang.
It was a delicious meal and snacks enjoyed in a pleasant atmosphere by the Han River at night. It's the perfect place to end the day after a long day. I'm very satisfied. ^^

Banger of a meal. Top quality dishes, excellent cocktails, great service. Shout out to the bartender Thao, and servers Ha and Trang. Also thank you to the owner for taking the time to chat. Don't miss this place; highly recommend.

I've been wanting to come here for a while and I'm so happy to have finally checked out Fatfish restaurant lounge & bar. As soon as I arrived I was greeted by the friendly staff and seated at my table. Everything on the menu looked great but I had cone for the Mahi Mahi. I was so happy with my choice. A tasty fillet, with mashed potatoes and asparagus to go along with it. Along with my fresh lime juice I was very please with my dinner, the tip notch service, great atmosphere and amazing music playlist. I recommend Fatfish to anyone who wants to grab some dinner and drinks along the Han river. Thank you!
Nice, a little expensive but the atmosphere is pleasant and so is the service.

I came here because of many 5 star reviews. Unfortunately, the dish Da Nang Seafood Platter made me so dissapointed because the seafood was not fresh and smelled bad. After our complain, they cancelled our dish and they took our complain seriously that what I liked. The pizza was super good. In short, I dont think you should come here for seafood. The rest is fine.
My favorite restaurant in Da Nang, food and drinks absolutely spectacular, not to mention the service. Especially Thao who makes the best cocktails!

The atmosphere is really great and the quality of the Tomahawk steak is crazy! It's cheap, but the meat is soft and of good quality, the staff is friendly, and the view is great, so I highly recommend it.

I feel like this place is flying under the radar, and it needs some recognition.
It was pretty quiet when we went in, but oh my word, everything we had was delicious. Our cocktails, the ceviche, the duck, the pork belly, it was all so good!
Definitely not traditional Vietnamese if that's what you're looking for, but very tasty food and drinks.
This place was a great find.  From the friendly and professional staff, to the amazing wine selection and the delicious food.  It is well worth a visit.
The entire meal was delicious! The staff is very pleasant and helpful.

I ate a seafood platter while looking at the Han River view. It was a healing time I enjoyed during my trip. The food was great and the atmosphere was great. I enjoyed the night of my trip. The fireworks started while I was eating, so I watched them.
One of my go to restaurants in da nang, always recommend the seared salmon
Great place, the staff were very friendly and the food was excellent. Handily located for a stroll a long the river the  Dragon bridge was all lit up and looked amazing .

I visited a restaurant near Da Nang Dragon Bridge. The atmosphere was great and they had a variety of seafood platters. I liked it 👍🏻 They have a variety of tables, so I think it would be good for a group. The drinks were varied and delicious >_<

The food was well decorated and tasted amazing. The waiter was also proactive in giving recommendations with a smile. The menu is filled with a wide variety of seafood and the meat prepared there was of near-finest quality, especially the tomahawk which i saw first-handedly. I especially appreciated the great deco and quiet atmosphere at night when I went there. Really relaxing and nice experience.

Insane food. What a gem this is. We ordered 3 dishes, well I would call them tapas...and each of them was just a flavor explosion. There were only two customers during the lunch period and we thought it couldn't be as good as the reviews say...oh boy...it exceeded our expectations as it was the freshest, most flavorful tapas we had. Their beer is also amazing. Can't wait to go again.

A restaurant & bar where you can enjoy both the atmosphere and the taste
The atmosphere was better when I sat at the bar and ate.

I came here last year and fell in love with the view, atmosphere, and taste, so I visited again this year! It's really pretty when you go at sunset 😍😍 I ordered the tomahawk that was the most delicious last year again, and it was just as delicious 👍👍

There was a variety of wines on the list, so the wines were good value for money, and the seafood platter was good. The cozy atmosphere with a local feel and the friendly service~~ I think it was the most delicious meal I had during my husband's birthday party and my trip to Da Nang, so I think it will be unforgettable.
Great restaurant! High quality food and service is on point.
Food was unreal, the crispy pork belly was the best we have had, and the cocktails were amazing also. Thoroughly recommend

A restaurant along the Han River with a great atmosphere. The seafood platter and grilled pork belly are both of good quality, and the whale-shaped interior and stylish table decorations are impressive. The menu was also in Korean, which was convenient, and it was nice to enjoy a leisurely meal with a bottle of Laru beer. A clean place that I would recommend to tourists!

It's a great place to go on a special day in Danang!^^
I ordered a seafood platter and was able to taste various seafood such as oysters, shrimp, clams,
lobsters, etc., and the atmosphere was great so I had a satisfying meal and left!
Be sure to visit on your last day in Danang or on a special anniversary^^

A place that was more delicious than I expected! On my last day in Da Nang, I wanted to eat something delicious in a nice place, and all the food was delicious. I recommend the Da Nang seafood platter. There was also a nice outdoor table, so next time I come, I want to sit there and take a lot of pictures :)
Good drinks, very crowded
The food here is delicious!!

This is my second visit because it has the best atmosphere with a view of the Han River. You can enjoy the best cost-effectiveness of Tomahawk steak, and it is so delicious that I recommend eating steak when you go to Da Nang..!! It is cheaper than half the price of Outback. The atmosphere is so good that I went during the day and also at night, and both are good, but I recommend the sunset view in the evening! It is close to Yongdari, so it was good to go together.
I came here because I wanted to eat steak when I came to Da Nang. The price of a tomahawk steak is 1/3 of that in Korea, and the food is delicious.

Ah*back I really like tomahawk but it's expensive so I couldn't eat it. But I was so happy that I could eat it here. The meat was really delicious and what was the sauce? Anyway, there were two kinds and both flavors were JMT!!!

This is a great restaurant in Da Nang where you can eat steak at a reasonable price near Yongdari. It has air conditioning and a variety of options, including seafood, pizza, and steak. I had the tomahawk steak at a reasonable price!!

I came here because the atmosphere looked good, and the food was great too!
I had a hard time deciding whether to eat steak or seafood,
but the Da Nang seafood platter was perfect, I really recommend it ㅠㅠ!
There was nothing that wasn't there, including scallops, crayfish, and oysters, and the sauce was so delicious :) ㅠㅠI want to go to Da Nang again because of this place..
I think I'll definitely visit again next time I go to Da Nang.
One of best dinners we had in Da Nang! The seafood was delicious and beautifully presented. Good selection of wine too

After spending one month in Danang this is the best restaurant we have eaten at.  The pizza was delicious and beautifully cooked.  The prawn dumplings were delicious and I had Mahi Mahi fillet whilst my husband had beef fillet both beautifully presented and again delicious.  The staff were amazing and very attentive.  Compliments to the chef for a lovely and memorable meal.
The seafood platter is very filling and delicious. I recommend it.
Recommended by locals

We came here for brunch. Very nice experience!
The restaurant's located near the city center and Dragon bridge so it's very convenient. It's also by the river, really cool and nice to walk after meals.
It's spacious and you can sit indoor or outside.
They have quite a list of selection. We had salad, duck and pizza. Everything was fresh and tasty.
Staff are friendly and helpful.
Highly recommended!

This restaurant has such a great atmosphere!
I ordered the Da Nang seafood platter and it was great because I could taste a variety of different kinds! …

Please visit this place!!! The Service and the food is amazing!! Came all the way from Australia, to Celebrate my Wife’s Birthday, they went out of their way to decorate the table. A big Thanks to all the staff!!!!

Wow! Just wow ! Some flavors I never experienced before!  We ordered 4 appetizers like tapas, don’t miss them , the Ceviche is to go out of your mind! The dumpling very good ! The tacos we sublime! And when I rated  the duck  meet serve on pizza I almost cried of emotions

If you are looking for the best atmosphere and hip restaurant in Da Nang, Vietnam, I definitely recommend Fatfish. It is great to eat a mixed seafood platter, and the night view is especially great here. The Han River is right in front, so …
The staff is friendly and speaks English well. If you are craving rice noodles or Vietnamese food, this is the place to go. Highly recommended.

We came here for lunch on a hot afternoon - and what a wonderful experience! All of the servers were very friendly, kind and hard working; and they worked as a team to ensure we had a fantastic lunch. Our server was especially wonderful, so …

The restaurant space is great for dating, the food is quite delicious and the price is reasonable, the owner and staff are very enthusiastic, I hope to see you again.
Thank you so much 😊 …
Wow, just wow. The. Best. fish. Platter (accompanied by Octopus) I have EVER eaten! The staff, the food, the drinks. Absolutely incredible!
Um... not good
Great wee find, food was amazing and service spot on, kind of vietnam/mexico fusion, I did sit outside though which was a mistake as it was hot, hot, hot. If you go, get an air con seat inside.

I came here for late dinner (after 8.30pm) and was a bit concerned about the quality of the food since the place was pretty much empty (there were only 2 other guests there at the time). However, I was pleasantly surprised by the good food. …
nice restaurant, great food
Great food! The octopus was excellent and also pizza!

Posting last week’s review late.

The food tasted good and the atmosphere was good, but there were a lot of server …
The food is not good regardless the expensive price
Excellent in every way. Delicious meal and wonderful cocktails. A must visit

A restaurant with a great atmosphere discovered in Da Nang!💛
It's in front of the Han River, so the night view is pretty, and the interior of the store is also very pretty. It's comfortable and has a nice atmosphere, so …

It’s a riverside restaurant near Dragon Bridge and the Son Tra Night Market, perfect for enjoying Da Nang’s night view. The atmosphere was romantic, and the staff were very friendly, which made our dinner even more pleasant. The signature dish, the Danang Seafood Platter, paired with their craft ale, was absolutely delicious.
Great service, delicious food. This is my number 1 place of the entire trip to Vietnam. The atmosphere is great. I will definitely be back.
Good food, friendly staff, but stuffy and long wait for food (
We did a beer tasting, it was amazing, never had such a fruity beer before and the sunset was perfect too

Loved the food here. Great for an elevated experience seafood dinner in DaNang. I got the grilled fish of the day and it was delicious especially with the chimichurri sauce. The wings were also great. All the staff was very nice and food came out quick.
We stopped there just to have a drink. The place is very beautiful, clean and the staff is friendly.

Since our family loves seafood, we looked for ways to eat seafood while looking at the view of the Han River, and ended up going to Fat Fish Restaurant.
The pub-like atmosphere was also really nice.
Even if I only order one seafood plate, I am more satisfied with the variety of dishes^^
The fatigue of the trip was completely relieved as I drank a cold beer.

While I was looking for a restaurant with a great atmosphere during my trip to Da Nang, I stumbled upon Phatfish! Located along the Han River, the view was breathtaking, and the signature Danang Seafood Platter, laden with fresh seafood, was especially impressive. The food was delicious, and pairing it with a beer completely melted away my travel fatigue.
The restaurant's sophisticated and comfortable atmosphere makes it a great place to visit with friends, couples, or family. The staff were friendly, and the service was excellent. After dinner, I visited the nearby Son Tra Night Market and took a stroll along the Han River, making for a perfect day!
If you're looking for a restaurant in Da Nang that offers both atmosphere and food, I highly recommend it.

This is some of the best seafood I have ever had the pleasure of experiencing in my life. I went with friends and we shared the entrees and mains so we could try a bit of everything and I’m so glad we did! Favourite had to be the grilled octopus. The signature cocktail was very lovely also!

The seafood platter is so delicious! Definitely order it!
Unlike the atmosphere in Da Nang, the restaurant is luxurious and very clean.
There aren't many Koreans, but the food is delicious and the staff is friendly.
The prices aren't overly expensive, and the service is very satisfactory.
I plan to visit again.
Great food and beer

The atmosphere is great and the staff are friendly! I recommend the terrace seats on the 2nd floor overlooking the Han River :) The platter is good and delicious. If you are traveling as a couple, be sure to go there.

If you're looking for a hip seafood restaurant with a great atmosphere or an evening with wine and beer, I highly recommend this place! I made a reservation in advance, so the table was ready, which was convenient :) I brought my mom with me, and the seafood platter was generous and we were able to enjoy a variety of dishes. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Fatfish is a 5 star resto & bar. I was invited by a friend who lives in DaNang and I was blown away by the little place that packed a punch. Superb seafood, mindblowing duck and what can I say about the beef etc ! Have to go there if you like European fusion food.
Excellent cuisine combined with a cozy atmosphere and excellent service. No Da Nang without fatfish!

I went there because of the many recommendations on Naver. The pork ribs and dumplings that came out first seemed a bit salty... so I asked them to make the seafood a little less salty. It was nice to have dinner with a view of the Han River and enjoy the nighttime atmosphere, but the food wasn't all that great. The staff were very friendly!!!

Best restaurant we have been to in Da Nang.
Everything was perfect
Lovely food, great service and very tasty cocktails.

It's a restaurant and pub close to Yongdari, Han Market, and Seonjja Night Market. The food is mainly Western, so it goes well with beer and wine! There was a first floor and a second floor, and the atmosphere was slightly different for each floor. I recommend the 1st floor for an exotic feel😊

We nipped in to the Fat Fish restaurant for a quick drink after watching the fire breathing Dragon Bridge. It was so lovely we decided to have dinner there the next night, my husbands Birthday. The staff had put up a Birthday banner, and other decorations, the meal was scrumptious, the atmosphere was relaxed, the staff were attentive but not over the top, it was great value for money. Definitely would recommend this place to you. Only thing you might have to plan for, we had to pay cash on the night we were there. Good to check when booking. 15/15 from our party of 4.
Terrific lunch! The pizzas are awesome & great selection of beers 🤓we had the vegetarian pizza for the two of us, + 2 wines & 2 beers
Lovely restaurant with a great menu

Had to leave a review here. It’s a great place, with some things to improve.

Food:

We started with the cevice. Wow this was truely a great dish with well balanced flavors. Fried calamari also super fresh and not chewy. Then I had the grilled octopus. This was not prepared well by the chef. Really overcooked, and chewy like gum. The chef really messed it up because I do believe the octopus was fresh. Hope he reads the feedback. The other fish we ordered was cooked perfectly.

Ambiance:
Really nice decor and much love for the music playlist. This really added to the atmoshpere.

Staff:

Everything with a smile and all really attentive. But a bit too much. You don’t have the take away my plate 1 second after i’m done eating, while the other person is still eating. You don’t have to ask 5 seconds after that if I want a dessert. Guys it’s not fast good I am enjoying my evening at a really nice restaurant. I asked for some time between appetizer and Main course, specifically 30 mins. But it came 10 mins after finishing appetizers. Restaurant was not crowded.

So, few things to optimize but would definitely try again.
Been coming here since 2016, and still just as good :)

The food and atmosphere were good.
But I saw rats running around twice.
My appetite was gone, but what can I do?
I came in.

By far this is one of my favourite restaurant in Da Nang with great atmosphere i ordered an Australian tenderloin steak and i was delicious and perfectly cook medium rare. I highly recommend this place definitely worth it.
Very good!

The restaurant with the most luxurious taste and atmosphere during my trip to Da Nang. If I travel again, I will definitely visit and eat the seafood platter! If you make a reservation in advance, you can enjoy the wonderful view, so I recommend making a reservation and visiting^^
Tomahawk meat. A place with a lot of alcohol. It's my first time eating meat here. It's delicious. It's been a while since I've cut meat. I feel good.

One of the best meals and experiences we had in Vietnam. I ordered the Grilled Octopus and damn was it delicious. The kids weren’t too sure on trying it but when they did, they were jealous. Coupled with my new favourite cocktail “Le Fatfish”, everything was perfect. For dessert, my sons ordered the chocolate box and chocolate tart, wife the Ginger Panna Cotta. But the star of dessert was the Passionfruit Crème Brulee! It was so good we ordered a second. When we get back to Da Nang, we’ll be sure to come back to the Fatfish. Absolutely spectacular. 10/10!

It's a cozy restaurant located near Yongdari.
All the staff were kind and friendly. Seafood platter, fruit juice were really good. I had it for lunch this time, but I'd like to enjoy it for dinner next time with alcohol.🩷

It's a restaurant that was easy to find because it's located near Yongdari, and the cozy atmosphere was really nice! >_< We ordered seafood platter, watermelon juice, and passion fruit juice, and they were really delicious. If we had visited in the evening, we would have definitely had alcohol with it ㅎㅎㅎ
In addition to seafood, there are various menus such as meat, salad, pizza, etc., and the bar is well-equipped, so it seems like a good place to go for a quick drink.

This is a great restaurant with a great atmosphere where you can enjoy a drink while eating seafood that is expensive to eat in Korea at a reasonable price :) Each piece of seafood was delicious and it was great to be able to try a variety of things! I visited this restaurant with my parents while traveling, and the flavor wasn't too strong and suited the Korean palate, so both my parents enjoyed it!

I found this place because I wanted to set the mood while traveling:) Thanks to the friendly staff who greeted me as soon as I got there, I felt good even before eating the food~ I ordered a seafood platter and pizza, and although it was expensive for Da Nang, it was good value for money when you see what was served! It was generous, so the amount was quite large for two people. It was good to set the mood with wine! I was satisfied with the high-quality food, friendly staff, and taste👍

The restaurant looks beautiful, with a cozy interior and a nice ambiance. The staff is very friendly and speaks excellent English, which makes it very accessible for international guests. Unfortunately, the food was a bit disappointing. The dishes were on the dry side and lacked some flavor. With a little improvement in the kitchen, this restaurant could really be top. Nevertheless, I had a nice experience thanks to the service and environment!
Good European style food

It was nice to be able to eat delicious seafood in a nice atmosphere~ The staff were very friendly. I ate the seafood platter, and they explained how to eat it well. The lobster and shrimp were especially delicious.

A somewhat upscale seafood restaurant.
All seafood dishes are presented with a good sense of color, including on tableware, and the flavor is consistently good.
The grilled octopus in particular has an exotic feel to it, but is also highly recommended for its tomato-based, slightly spicy flavor that is easy to enjoy.
Top notch! Delicious food, a peaceful atmosphere, and just steps from the most popular bridge on weekend evenings to see the dragon spit fire. A great evening, thank you!
We had a very nice dinner. ❤️ food was amazing, very good staffs and ambience. ❤️

the food is delicious here, service and atmosphere are also great.

just that i don't see any Vietnamese touch and the creativity on the dishes. the description on Google map reads it's  European-Vietnamese fusion, so it might bring a somewhat incorrect expectation when I went.
The atmosphere is good. I recommend the single dish rather than the platter.
Where to eat Tomahawk steak in Danang

I had an Australian Tomahawk steak and it was absolutely delicious. If you go to Outback, it costs 300,000 won for 1kg, but it was much more delicious at almost 1/3 the price. 

If you go to Da Nang, don't just eat Banh Xeo, but definitely eat the Tomahawk steak. It's well-rested, so no meat comes out at all and the meat is well-retained.
Great food, great service, great location.

I found out about it by chance while browsing Google Maps! The interior has a luxurious atmosphere, and the staff was friendly, so I felt like I was being treated well. If you go up to the second floor, there is a seat with a view of the Han River, and you can take a picture of your life just by taking a picture. The seafood platter was very generous, and I was especially surprised that the Gorgonzola pizza was even tastier than the one I had in Korea!

While looking for a restaurant with a nice atmosphere with my family, we visited Fatfish.

It's a place where you can eat tomahawk, seafood platter, and pizza at a reasonable price compared to Korea.

There are seats on the second floor with a view of the Danang Han River,
and I was very satisfied with the atmosphere :)
Best food we have had in a long time, so delicious!! Service and atmosphere were so amazing too.
The atmosphere is comfortable and chilling, nice place.
The restaurant is very cozy, the food is delicious and the staff is lovely.
Nice bar with delicious drinks. The wines are also very good quality.
Excellent food, excellent drinks and excellent music! Really i loved everything!
Yummy seafood squid ink pasta
Nice meal here with good food and a modern restaurant. Prices quite expensive but we thought the quality of the food was worth it

We were googling places to eat when this place popped up and we made a booking for an hour later.
It was superb!! We ate upstairs near the balcony and also had a nice view of the …

It was an unfortunate experience that ruined a precious evening of a family trip.
The food was good, but the salad took 40 minutes to arrive, and even after an hour and 10 minutes, all of our food hadn't arrived.
This restaurant truly excels at the aesthetics of waiting.
Oh, and the prices on the menu are all high.

Pizza is good, good service
staff speak good English as well
Stack is nice
Very close to the dragon bridge
Can a place before the 9PM dragon fire
The food was great, the staff was very friendly and helpful, and the environment was cool, calm, and clean. 5 stars!
Thank you Fatfish Restaurant.

We ordered Smoked duck breast, Galic and butter New Zealand mussels, Broccoli & Gorgonzola soup, and Grilled Australia Tomahawk, Vanilla cheesecake. All is good 😍. Additionally, the staff is very friendly and nice, they always support us. 💗
Excellent food and ambience. Must visit if in Danang

My boyfriend said he had the perfect restaurant to take me to and brought me here, I am so glad he did!! I can't stop thinking about the fish dish we had and I want to come back if time allows. I highly recommend dropping by and visiting Fatfish for a delicious meal. It's not traditional viet food by any means, but I needed a break because we had been here for almost 2 weeks already and ate all of the viet dishes I wanted to eat.

We ordered a lot haha, at least I feel like we did. I personally didn't really like the chicken wings because the flavor was too sour, my boyfriend happily ate all of the wings though! So this was 100% a personal preference. I just wish it was more sweet than sour. I ordered the whole fish and my boyfriend got the pork belly, it was so good!! One of the best fish meals I've had in a long time.

Their interior is beautiful and you can walk alongside the water to the dragon bridge after dinner.

This is a seaside restaurant where you can eat fish and other dishes.
There was a massage parlor nearby where I could leave my luggage, so I went there instead. The pizza crust was thick and had an American feel.
The grilled octopus was stylishly presented with lots of vegetables.

I was looking for a light meal, so I asked for takeout in case I couldn't finish my smoothie, and they were happy to accommodate!

Nice place. Very good food. We had calamari in batter cooked in beer. The staff was very friendly and recommended a great place for a post-dinner drink and booked both a taxi and a venue for us. The gin and tonic prices are perhaps a little higher than average.
Would be three stars but Matt gets passive aggressive if you criticise the food.

Very good presentation but food doesn't taste as good as it looks. no free water.
The crispy pork belly was fatty and only one piece had crispy skin (there were 4 pieces of the whole chunk that was pre-sliced). i've had better crispy porks from takeaways.

Also, they charge 2% and 10% fees (maybe tips and service fee?) so be prepared for a higher bill at the end

also, nothing is their fault, always the customers'. just read the owner's replies lol really don't recommend coming here.
The taste and atmosphere are both good.
Great fusion of European and Vietnamese cuisine. The beef carpaccio and the grilled fish and salmon were delicious. Top notch service and great atmosphere. Would definitely return

Every time I go to Da Nang, I come here once. When I go to Fat Fish, I must order grilled fresh fish! The seasoning is very good! If you eat noodles or pizza, choose something else. The rest of the dishes are ok!
The restaurant is not large but the food is quite fresh, the price is not very expensive, and the food is quite good

Fatfish Restaurant & Lounge Bar in Danang, Vietnam, offers a first-class dining experience with its elegant atmosphere and delicious menu. The restaurant is known for its innovative dishes that combine Vietnamese flavors with international …
Delicious but a bit expensive

Terrible restaurant. (Please read on to see my response to the owner)

Don’t listen to any of the positive reviews. …
This restaurant is on the waterfront. It's a bit pricey, but the food and service are excellent. The duck curry is especially worth the visit. The staff are friendly and the atmosphere is great.

Great experience, as close to the Michelin star you could get i guess.
Everything was on spot.

Great upscale bar for a cocktail or dinner. The staff really looked after us and took great care with our drinks and were very attentive. A bit more expensive than many places in Da Nang but a great place for a special event.

Food is not fresh
I went out with a bad lady from Nha Trang to Da Nang to visit because we only went to eat for 2 people, so my father and I wore very casual clothes. When we walked up to the staff, they immediately showed their attitude and looked for a table forever, but when they saw my father asked the staff, the staff did not welcome them warmly, but when they saw me, they said "sit on the other side." My father once knew me.
I like it because I can eat cheap seafood dishes and unique signature cocktails.

It has a Vietnamese vibe, but the prices are Korean!! It's pretty, the food is delicious, and the staff are fluent in English, so communication is smooth and friendly, but the prices aren't that great. ^^;. Still, I recommend it to anyone looking to go to a high-end Vietnamese bar. Not recommended for families, but highly recommended for couples!! The atmosphere is great.
Had the prawn and avocado salad. Hot, plump, juicy prawns, crunchy lettuce, avocado that reminded me of Australia. Looking forward to next time!
Amazing food, very well cooked ! The waiters are very kind. Great taste of music also.
The service is great and good ambience. The seafood is mostly overcooked and a bit disappointing
Try Mahi Mahi, very delicious

A restaurant that's welcoming to Japanese people. They have a menu with pictures. The staff are friendly. I had an egg dish. I thought it was an omelette or something like oyaki, but it turned out to be a fresh spring roll. It was absolutely delicious.
My wife and I went there two nights in a row and all I can say is that the food, service and atmosphere were great or even fantastic, thank you.
Very good food and nice place
More than I thought...

Nice vibe and place! Appetizers were
good but we ordered pizza that was really bad.

It tasted cheap overall and the meat quality was super low, and for 280,000 for the pizza that’s more than other pizza restaurants here so we expected it to be better. The crust and dough was super thin and broke apart

It seems the other food here is good so I would come back again but never order pizza from here!
Food is really tasty, I highly recommend the bbq pork ribs. But the dessert is average, would be lovely if they have more selections for dessert.
This is the best restaurant I've ever eaten at in Da Nang! Everything is delicious.
It's a place where you can enjoy alcohol in a relaxed atmosphere.
Great service, good food. 😊
Beers were cold, food was tasty and staff were friendly and attentive. Would come back to try more food here.
The staff was super kind, food and space were great. I will definitely return!
I had good food and good beer. Staff was very nice and attentive, overall nice place.
Great place with amazing food. The service was so great, kind and attentive. all the staff was sweet and on point but should out to Hoa. I would definitely recommend this place.
Delicious food.. friendly staff
The service staff speaks good English, the food is delicious, and the restaurant is decorated with great care. Great restaurant!
We went there for breakfast and came out very satisfied. They have multiple variants of Benedict eggs (i.e. bacon / salmon / smoked shredded ham) and the one I had (smoked) was excellent.
Authentic European dishes, enthusiastic staff, very convenient near Love Bridge 100 points 👌👌
We had the tomahawk steak. Plenty filling for two people. Cook perfectly! Best beef I have ever had in Vietnam.
Had a nice cocktail here. The staff is very friendly.

Lovely atmosphere & nice staffs.
But, I cannot recommend the food as it is overpriced for what we got.
The falafel was ok. We ordered the seafood plate as the main dish. Except for the fish & shrimps, the rest was overcooked & not fresh. Low-quality cheese, scallops looked like being cut in half. The passion fruit crème brûlée had the texture of runny mousse than flan.
Hopefully the quality will get better.
I came here after seeing the blog. The price is expensive, but the taste is average. I will never go back.

First time here...very impressed with everything.I had the braised duck....so delicious. My compliment to who cooked it.Will definitely be back.My wife had something else and she loved it also.You deserve every star we gave you!
It's expensive compared to the prices in Vietnam, but the food portions seem a little small, but the taste is okay. The staff were friendly, and the meal was good.
Delicious cocktails, great atmosphere and great food.
Not really

The spaghetti dish is terrible, the baked potatoes are burned like that but still brought to the customers. When asked for feedback, the staff said that the nature of baked potatoes is like that, as if I had never had this dish before. Overall not worth the price.

Stopped in for a couple rounds of drinks before the dragon bridge. Originally came in for happy hour a few years ago which was memorable, and wanted to return.  Wonderful house cocktails and great hospitality - thank you Binh and Quan!
Restaurant near dragon bridge

The food here is pretty good!
With its location right next to the river, it has a quite nice atmosphere.
A bit pricey though but I think it’s definitely worth it.

I choose this place because of the high number of reviews, while the service was good, the food isn’t. For the price that we are paying and waiting half an hour for the food, I was expecting it to taste good but was disappointed, the calamari and the duck salad taste normal while the beef tenderloin is only normal taste with the mashed potato not tasting like how mashed potato should be. I’m fine with paying a premium as long the food is of quality, but sadly it just wasn’t worth it here. Hope they improve on it.
Good, but expensive.
It was mid
Meat platter was great

The food here was amazing!! The service was great too! Best place I’ve eaten in a while. Slightly pricy but definitely worth the price. I got the calamari to start with my boyfriend, then the duck for my main, which was done perfectly. My boyfriend got the octopus, which I tried and it was amazing! They give you the cutlery in a box which was a lovely touch too!
Food was really really good. We had calamari to start to share and then I had the octopus which was lovely and my girlfriend had the duck which I must say was quacking 🦆
One of the best in danang.Food is quality service is quality

The staff here is wonderful. And the food is a delight. I ordered the snapper ceviche, beer battered calamari, and meat platter. Perhaps the best Calamari in Da Nang. And the meat platter did not disappoint. I really enjoyed the brisket and roast pork, it reminded me of good Texas bbq back home. Overall a wonderful dining experience. Highly recommended.
It's cold outside
We came here because it's close to the dragon bridge. The food is good and the service is good.

Amazing meat platter and octopus. Cocktails are also delicious!
Would definitely recommend.

I really wanted to give a perfect rating to this cute little restaurant on account of the staff’s friendly and excellent service, and the relaxing atmosphere. However, I had a few issues with the food that I cannot disregard in this review. …
Liked the way they prepared fusion food using local ingredients...tasty!
Very beautiful atmosphere, next to the dragon beach. Wenloved it
Friendly staff and delicious, especially the ceviche!
Great little place. Chilled out, had a few beers to let the rain pass. The beer I had was amazing!

It's a restaurant with a nice atmosphere
The view of the Han River from the Yongdari Bridge right in front is also nice😀😀
It's a bit pricey, but I think it's a good place to visit when you want to feel good while traveling in Da Nang!
Every time I visit the restaurant, I enjoy the food. The pale ale is also delicious. The food I order is neatly presented on a plate, making it a restaurant that is pleasing to the eye and mouth.
We were there for my friend’s birthday. The food was delicious and the service was amazing!!!! We really enjoyed the meal.
Had a great meal at Fatfish, i ordered the ceviche and grilled octopus. the service was good too. I recommend you have a meal here.
Good value for money and tastes good too

The food is decent.
The atmosphere is nice.
The prices are a bit on the high side.

It's indoors, so it feels like a quiet and well-equipped restaurant. I recommend it to those who don't like noisy and chaotic places. I especially liked the second floor seats. The prices are a bit more expensive than restaurants that many tourists visit, but they're affordable for Koreans.

Maybe because I had high expectations, the visual of the food was good, but the taste was average. I made a reservation in advance, but the table I was told to reserve was right in front of the entrance. The atmosphere wasn't that great, …
The quality is good

Best restaurant in Da Nang! Dined here twice with my gf who is Coeliac whilst staying in Da Nang. Showed staff card in Vietnamese explaining that we couldn’t consume gluten and they took it with great consideration. This was our favourite …
The food here is so delicious, I came back a second time. The downside is that it's out of sight and easy to miss :))
#NAME?

It's a good place if you prefer a clean atmosphere rather than local seafood. It's more expensive than local food, but it's a good place for foreigners to enjoy a platter of seafood without burden. The atmosphere is also good~~

That duck steak is really delicious.
That seafood platter was the most expensive I had in Da Nang.
Amazing food and amazing service. Great cocktails - can especially recommend the Fatfish cocktail if you're into lemongrass and a good wine selection. Waiters were polite and helpful!

My son visited last year and said the food was delicious, so I recommended it to him during this trip. We weren't particularly hungry, so my husband, daughter, and I ordered a seafood platter, three beers, and a juice. Before the seafood platter arrived, we were served our beers and a simple snack, like puffed rice cakes. The snacks were crunchy and had a nutty flavor thanks to the sesame seeds sprinkled on top, making them incredibly delicious. It was early, so most of the tables were empty, and despite the large staff, we had to wait a while for the seafood platter. I thought they were out catching seafood.
The food didn't smell like spices, so it was passable. We had a small lobster, three or four oysters, some fried squid, a large piece of fish, a few small scallops, and some stir-fried noodles. The food was average. It wasn't enough for a full meal, but more like a drink. One seafood platter, three beers, and a glass of juice cost 2 million dong (about 110,000 won). It didn't feel worth the price. Local For someone like me who can't visit seafood restaurants because of the spices, I recommend visiting at least once.
Excellent meal, great menu. Service was really friendly and efficient. More expensive than some restaurants in area but worth it. We'd go back.
I'm satisfied with everything except the draft beer being lukewarm.
It's a bit pricey but it's delicious. It was good except that I ate outside during the fireworks festival.

It's expensive for the country but it's good and sufficiently filling. The wine was average but drinkable. Very good selection of beer on the menu. On the other hand, I don't understand the presence of pizzas... I didn't taste them but visually they didn't look appealing and don't match the rest of the menu.
Although the price was a bit high, the two of us were very full and enjoyed the meal! The food quality was excellent.
The salmon dish was the best salmon I've ever had fro many restaurant in any country.
The three of us had a fabulous meal at Fatfish, the Duck curry was amazing. Great service and all done in a lovely setting, thank you. Jack, Dan and Gavin.

Great restaurant, good vibes and fresh seafood and meat. Staff were kind and we received our dinner fast. Heart of darkness Beer was also great, but also strong 😁 it worth a visit when you're at dragon bridge.

Everything is good, but the price is a bit expensive.
Of course, it's okay if you compare it to Korean prices, but if you think about Vietnamese prices, it's a bit much to spend more than 70,000 won for a meal..!
Hajimam's food is good and the service is good:)

Very very chill place to have some nice drinks.

I went at about 9pm to have some drinks with my partner. Was greeted by the staff. Got a bar seat.

The bartender was Binh, he made me an Old Fashioned. My favourite. The drink was good and the experience of him making the drink in front of us was even better.

Then I had a Jasmine Pale Ale to end off the night before heading off to our stay.

The food prices are a little on the high side, but that’s what you pay for quality.

Nice seafood & good atmosphere

Big seafood platter is highly recommended and very matched with tap beer. Jasmine beer is very good! Very smooth, no bitter and easy to pair with seafood and beef. Staffs are very helpful.

Lovely restaurant and food, found with the help of the good reviews.
However, what made our visit especially memorable was the staff, since it was a special evening for me and my boyfriend. He was looking for the right moment to propose that evening and decided to do it after the meal at the restaurant. I said yes!!! The staff were super lovely and shared the moment with us. Big thanks for helping to make it so special, we will never forget it. 😊

I’ve eaten four different dishes here on three visits. Amazing food and service at reasonable prices. Very friendly staff. The ceviche (with todays fish, which were Silver Pomfret) was especially good.

A memorable dining experience

I would like to thank the Fatfish team for being incredibly hospitable to my friends and me during our dinner. I appreciate every single detail that was taken to ensure we felt special.

Now onto the food.

Starters

1) Fatfish Ceviche
Deconstructed to an incredibly pretty plate  to consist of acid, sweet & spicy and is something unique compared to a traditional ceviche.

2) Shortbread Duck
Admittedly it wasn’t very impressive looking but the flavours that hit straight on my first bite made me know that I was wrong. Sweet yet savoury definitely a good starter.

Mains

1) Spinach Ravioli
Probably my least favourite dish amongst the rest due to high calibre of flavours the rest had as this felt under seasoned. Great idea but execution of the sauce may need some work.

2) Mahi Mahi Fillet
Incredibly done, the perfectly seared skin and the fresh firm Mahi Mahi was superb. Resting on top of some grilled asparagus and what I can assume is a pumpkin purée spice the dish fit the billing as a popular dish. Asparagus however was a bit old.

3) Seafood Tagliatelle
My standout dish for the night, with a squid ink tagliatelle cooked into that sweet and perfectly spiced sauce. It was fantastic, topped with a lot of fresh seafood. I love it.

I’d give my time here an 8/10. With my only pointer is to build more dots between the guest and restaurant. Will be back when I’m back in Da Nang! Thanks team.

Excellent food with nice and chill view on the second floor.
Highly recommend.
230507 The atmosphere was good, the beer was delicious, and the staff service was good. Comeback again~

Awesome food and selection of the wines from all over the world.
Enjoyed so much

Based on the reviews here I ordered the fresh fish ceviche, flatbread duck and shrimp dumpling. These 3 dishes are decent but overrated, they don't taste phenomenal like most reviews state. The Mahi Mahi fish was the worst, the meat was tough and I needed to chew for so long.. mushrooms were bland too. Overall I don't think the food was worth the money. I paid 1.1million dong but don't feel satisfied at all. At this price I could have enjoyed other restaurants with better fish choices and dishes..
Amazing food, Duck was juicy and flavoursome

Overall, everything is great. The atmosphere, the service, the food. I didn't like the ceviche - why so much sugar? It's unacceptable. The salmon pita appetizer was a complete failure. There were about five grams of salmon, not enough cheese, and the pita was dry. We ate for two with wine and cocktails for 2.7 million. We drank rose - a delicious French wine. But they forgot to top it up on time. Overall, everything was great, but not without its nuances. But, be that as it may... We'll definitely be back!)

Only had two appetizers including the beef carpaccio and the calamari and two drinks.  We enjoyed the atmosphere, music and service.  A bit expensive but not terrible.  My Jim Beam old fashioned cocktail was great actually.   Carpaccio was ok, should of been served with bread and it seemed that it was cooked for some reason.  The calamari was heavily breaded, overly breaded and chewy.   Good for date night but you can find better for cheaper.

We've been to Fatfish for my mother's birthday, the restaurant team prepared little details wich was very nice. The food and cocktails are very good. People are lovely , smiling,  discrets and they are there for you anytime you need. Thank you for this wonderful evening. 😘

Simply good, clean and nice.
Vietnamese pizza without tomato sauce... also delicious
An original little restaurant with an interesting menu. The cuisine is excellent, the service is friendly and attentive. The prices are reasonable.

More than average restaurant!
The setting is pretty.
The quality of the meals was OK but nothing more, the price is extremely high.
On the other hand, the service was catastrophic, 1h30 wait for a pizza...
Move on, there are other much better restaurants nearby!
Each dish we ordered was a delight specifically the shrimp dumpling and the duck flat bread highly recommend
Excellent food. Excellent service. 100% would recommend anyone who comes to danang to try this place out.
Fantastic restaurant with reasonable price
Excellent food, more French/continental with some Vietnamese influences. The ceviche is a must try
What a lovely lunch experience. The service was   the best I’ve experienced in a long time. Our highlight was the cocktail, Le Fatfish
Good food but a bit pricey
Perfect brunch after workout.

I visited for dinner with my mother and friends from Korea. We ordered Caprese Salad, Scallops, Seafood Platter, and Tomahawk Steak. The food was good, but 3 hairs came out of the salad and steak. After the 3rd hair was found, we couldn't eat anymore.
We complained to the manager and asked to see the boss, but we couldn't. He just told the manager that he would give us a 15% discount.
This was really bad customer service and a huge disappointment to Korean customers. Be careful of hairs in this restaurant.

I visited for dinner with my mother and friends from Korea. We ordered Caprese Salad, Scallops, Seafood Platter, and Tomahawk Steak. The food was good, but 3 hairs came out of the salad and steak. After the 3rd hair was found, we couldn't eat anymore.
We complained to the manager and asked to see the boss, but we couldn't. He just passed word to the manager that he was offering a 15% discount.
The customer service was really bad, a huge disappointment to our guests from Korea. Watch out for someone's hair in this restaurant.

It was nice to be able to satisfy the tastes of both children and adults.
The kids eat pizza and the adults eat seafood, so it’s the icing on the cake! I was so happy that my picky father enjoyed the meal. I highly recommend the fish of the day! It's so delicious for the price
The food is very average, especially the meat, which is very poor and not up to standard at all.
Had a fantastic lunch here with a good selection of Vietnamese IPAs. The salmon flatbread was divine.
Lovely bar/ restaurant- friendly staff. Great selection of drinks and extensive menu.
Good Service delicious food !
It was absolutely delicious
Great landscaping and best food. Quality is good
Great food, great beer. All of the people in our group really enjoyed it. The tomahawk and spinach ravioli really stood out.

Fairly uninspiring experience.  Staff are attentive and caring which is a bonus.

Pro tip: although they serve bottled water, they also will serve you filtered water if you insist.

In terms of ambience, design is ok but they fall flat with the monotonous background muzac. Makes you feel like you’re in a mall more than in a restaurant. They missed the mark.

Nice touch, they serve you a complimentary flatbread at the start although neither the flatbread or the sauce had a discernible flavour.

Ordered cerviche, carpaccio, taco trio and salmon flatbread.

Cerviche was a total assault on the senses with no balance. It’s the perfect way to ruin your palate before eating anything else. There might be fish on the plate but you won’t be able to tell that it’s fish. Take a pass.

Taco trio seems just for show, meat was dry, large quantities though, overwhelming the somewhat dry tortilla. Similarly, I would pass.

Salmon flatbread missed the memo - the salmon was cooked to tastelessness.  Could have been tofu and had the same complexion and flavour. Perhaps the person executing has never actually tried this dish before. You don’t cook the salmon on the flatbread.

Finally the carpaccio was nice to look at. They had an attempt at a sweet tomato salsa to accompany which didn’t match. Cheese was the lowest cost hard cows cheese they could find, robbing the plate of appropriate richness. Would pass.

The best part of the dinner was the Savall Chocolates featuring local flavours. Pricy though, 185k.

Overall dinner came out to 1 million for one person.

Was I full? Yes.
Was I satiated? Not really. I went and ate Vietnamese noodle soup after.

Would I come back? I’m really not sure. I like the look of the place and maybe the bar top would be good for a date and some nibbles, but for a dinner where I’m looking for sustenance, nutrition and deliciousness, probably not.

In the end I fault the restaurant -2 points for being overpriced for its food category given the ingredients and execution. Design and ambiance does not make up for shortcomings in what the food should be.

I just had an amazing dining experience with my son. From the entree to the desert, I couldn’t fault anything. We thoroughly enjoyed our night. The staff need to be commended for their impeccable service. I rate this highly 🙏 …
Overpriced for the quality of food. Octopus was tough and needed steak knives. I wouldnt go back.

The staff is sweet and nice, environment is good too. The price of the food is consider high but we are ok with it as long as the food meet the expectation. The food is very good, but the price is expensive. The chicken wings, which were appetizers, took about 20 minutes, and the seafood platter took about 30 minutes. The staff was very friendly, but at first they tried to take us to a not-so-good spot on the first floor. There are many better seats on the 2nd floor.

--EDIT: They called me on the following day and apologized for the inconvenience, and offered me the laundry. While it's late, as I have already washed the shirt, I still appriciate their effort. I raised my rating to 3 stars as an appreciation for their effort.

____________________________________
Extremely bad service. They spilled the wine everywhere on the dinning table and even on the customers shirt and trousers. Yet, they didn't bother to apologize or offer laundry to customers. On top of that, they didn't even bother to change the spoiled tablecloth too. Am I supposed to happily fine-dine under such bad hygiene?

The food quality was also definitely not worth the monstrous price. Nothing special and the dishes tasted dull most of the time. But this could be due to my bad mood caused by their bad service. Anyway, I strongly recommend AGAINST this restaurant.

I enjoyed the pale ale.

Very delicious and not expensive. The duck and chicken wings are #1

I went there after reading the reviews, but was shocked when I left. To think that a family of four could eat a meal for this amount in Vietnam... I felt like I'd been ripped off. I'd expected a fancy restaurant, but the interior was a bit flashy, but it was cramped and the chairs were hard and uncomfortable. Keep in mind that this isn't a restaurant for dinner, but a place for snacks. While it's certainly my fault for going there based on reviews, the food was salty and incredibly expensive. It was over four times the price of a typical Vietnamese restaurant. I'll just take the reviews as a guide... It's not Vietnamese food, so keep that in mind. This definitely doesn't deserve four and a half stars. I was shocked that a seafood dish in Vietnam cost over 60,000 won. The food was salty and lacked anything. I wanted to go back, but I was afraid of upsetting my family, so I ate. I felt terrible when I paid and left.
