Hong Kong restaurant, famous for charcoal roasted duck. All kinds of fresh noodles are delicious. The restaurant has a cozy space, suitable for family meals. The price is a bit high, but it's okay to try.

We have been wanting to eat here for awhile so we were happy we got a chance to drop by for brunch. So happy with the portion size for the roasted meats and stir fried flat noodles. Tasty and authentic. The decor was spot on with a vintage …

Delicious food, a bit greasy (Chinese style), the dipping sauce is also elaborately made
The price is a bit high compared to restaurants in the same segment but still …

Delicious food. Sometimes they won’t let you sit upstairs and argue there is mot enough staff to serve you upstairs. 😂 they are just lazy to serve you upstairs, thought the balcony is cute and comfortable
Very tasty, very yummy. The roast items all taste so good. And the pepper pig stomach soup very nice too. 👍
The restaurant is a bit small but the food is suitable for those who like spicy food. I stayed in Da Nang for 2 days and 1 night and had 2 meals at this restaurant :))

I am Cantonese. The char siu was good for Vietnamese standards. Worth a try

The wonton noodles no flavour at all. The wonton was not bad though. Had proper meat and prawns but lack of seasoning.

Salt and pepper tofu was dry, lacking balance. Was just salty more than flavourful

Service was poor. Took more than 10 mins for rice and no water for the table.. Disappointing experience, based on the reviews I thought it was worth a try. Would not recommend unless you are craving char siu
I enjoyed myself
A nice place to eat Hong Kong style food, loved roasted pork and soya chicken more than any other menus

****EDIT TO ADD: They added fake 5 star reviews after my review.****

We ordered an appetizer and 3 entrees. One of those entrees was the sweet and sour pork. First bite I took was so tough I had to spit it out. I took a second bite to see if it was any different… it was not. The dish was tough and dry, seemed like it had been reheated from a prior day. We returned the plate and asked them not to remake it. The other dishes were OK but we managed to eat what we could. We asked not to pay for the sweet and sour pork but were told we “ate it all” and could not be given to us for free.  We are not picky eaters but that dish was inedible… The gentleman who went back and forth with us was not pleasant to work with. Beware that staff is not helpful and that you might be paying a high price for food that is decent.
Good
Delicious food with many new dishes, authentic taste, I eat it every day

We ordered 3 entrees, one of which was extremely tough we couldn’t even eat it…we asked them twice to take it back and that we didn’t want it because we couldn’t eat such tough meat…at the end they went back and forth trying to get us to pay for a dish that was almost 200,000d that we didn’t even eat…the guy in charge was not helpful at all and the food wasn’t worth the cost. If you are a foreigner don’t waste your time here, there are better places that will treat you better.

Authentic Hong Kong style restaurant
Crispy pork is delicious, crispy and thick. It's not too much. The chicken meat is just right. But it got stuck and the bone broke. causing the chew to hit the bone Chewed and my teeth hurt a lot.
Service employees meet standards.

This restaurant cooks authentic Chinese-style sweet food, roasted pork with char siu and delicious dipping sauce, but the chicken and duck are not so good. The restaurant's premises are a bit small, so there are limited people and the space is not very airy.
Nice Cantonese dish
Delicious food. Super delicious roast duck. No need to discuss.

The food was unclean and tasted bad. I vomited and felt uncomfortable all day. I went to the hospital and was diagnosed with acute gastroenteritis. The merchant had a bad attitude and refused to acknowledge the debt or solve the problem.

Always been my choice whenever I want to eat Hong Kong food.
The bowls are kinda big and I can’t finish them all but it's so good. I recommend the rice here. This place is the most similar to the real restaurant in Hong Kong.

Noodles is not my favorite but it was fine.
Will come back again

Passing by, I saw the Hong Kong vibes so I stopped in 😂 I was impressed with the mahjong table. Most of the customers ordered delivery more than ate at the restaurant, while I only sat in and out, there were only 2-3 tables. 

I chose the BBQ combo of 2 dishes: duck and roast pork, both were delicious. At first, the plate looked very small, it felt like a small amount, but after eating, it was enough for 2 people. Order another bowl of white rice and it was done 🤤 The sauce was a bit sweet, the meat juice in the plate was more delicious. The char siu noodles were like homemade noodles, not like packaged noodles, chewy and delicious. The char siu was a bit salty, the thin meat was a bit dry. The broth was light and fatty, I like the sauce mixed with dry noodles better. The Hong Kong milk tea was normal, not as delicious as the shops I tried before, but it was also served in a shaker, which was also strange. The ginseng juice was sweet. 

Overall, it was okay, suitable for the days when the rice was coming back 😚
Standard Chinese restaurant, in my opinion the food is okay but not too delicious. Good service, clean space.
Best Hong Kong restaurant in town, must try char siu pork and Ty Ba roasted duck

It's authentic hongkong food, we ordered some dishes and satisfied with all, nothing to complain.
Staff taked care us very well, they were friendly and professional. If the restaurant played 80_90s hongkong music that will be perfect.
We highly recommend this restaurant for those who love hongkong food.
The pics were the food we ordered.
First-class service, understand Chinese, quality guaranteed
There is no food, they are not friendly, and they do not take orders very well. If you are a Korean, I do not recommend going there to eat Peking duck.
Delicious dishes.
It has a local Hong Kong restaurant feel and is reasonably priced. Don't expect Peking duck at a hotel, but rather focus on the value for money.
2023/08/07 For our last dinner in Da Nang, Chinese food still suits our appetite the best.

As far as I know, this is the best authentic Chinese restaurant in Da Nang! 🍜 (Mainly Cantonese)

Their flavors aren't as mild as Japanese ones, so if that's what you're looking for, this isn't the place. But if you're looking for flavors that Chinese people love, this is the place for you! 👍

The prices are also incredibly reasonable, which is great!
As of February 2023, the two dishes pictured and one drink cost just 360,000 VND.

If you're looking for delicious Chinese food, I highly recommend this place! 👌
I especially recommend the braised beef. I have the impression that Cantonese noodles tend to be surprisingly mediocre. lol
Delicious, fresh, clean, beautifully presented, cooked quickly, reasonably priced.

I visited this restaurant when I was getting tired of Vietnamese food. It was a shame that some of the dishes were sold out when I went around 7 o'clock, but all the dishes I ordered were delicious. Peking duck, mapo tofu, wonton noodles, meat rice, and sweet and sour pork were all delicious, and my top pick was mapo tofu. The spicy taste of mala was well reproduced and it goes well with rice. The air conditioning was on, so it was less hot than other restaurants. It was spacious and comfortable because there was a second floor. The restaurant staff were also friendly, so I had a great dinner. Thank you. There are 5 dishes on the menu, 2 rice dishes, and coca. The portion was large, so I left some. I should order in moderation.
Highly recomended delicious chinese food restaurant in Danang to everyone
Love to eat here. Very good!
Delicious food, authentic Hong Kong flavor
Okay for now

If you want Cantonese style, this is it! Definitely top level in Da Nang. In addition to Cantonese-style dishes, there are also Sichuan-style dishes. Both have a gentle spiciness but are delicious. Since it's Chinese food, the portions are basically large. One girl couldn't finish even one dish.
The only regret is that it doesn't appear on the delivery app. The store also has a delivery service, but you have to call them directly, so it's tiring and I don't want to do it too much.
The food is delicious.
Delicious food. Had the roast duck, roast pork belly and stir fried veggies, all were delicious. This is a must visit restaurant.

Insane portion for the price. Tried the 4 variety rice set. It was so good, I came back to the shop 2 days later and ordered the exact same set. The milk tea was superb as well. The interior of the shop really resemble the shops back when I was in Hong Kong. Good taste in food and style of the restaurant. Keep it up!
It's delicious and the restaurant is clean and nice.
I am just so happy to find this restaurant! They reminded me not to over order… Nice people & food!!
If you like Chinese food, I recommend it.

I ate the most humanely during my 8 days in Vietnam. Male 50+ water bottle left + duck
But pay attention to the bill. Since it was the last day, I had to use the remaining money, so I ordered by tapping the calculator and checking with the employee if the total amount was correct. They asked for 100K more.
There were no other customers except us before 5 o'clock, and there were 3 tables when we left. And I ordered a large Heineken beer. There was Heineken in the fridge, but they only had small Tiger beers.
Everything is satisfactory. But the 56k can of lemon soda is too expensive. So I deduct 1 star.

If you are Korean, you must buy pork on page 1 here. Crispy skin pork belly is so delicious. Tofu dishes are also delicious. Things like Mapo tofu and braised tofu. The duck was just okay because of the bones. It was delicious. I eat lunch here every day. The only downside is that the air conditioning isn't cool, but the employees turn on the circulator and give you cool water, so it's okay.
Good Char Siew and Roast Duck. Milk tea is nice. Staff can speak mandarin too.

This is a Hong Kong-style restaurant.
The portions are huge. The price is reasonable and the taste is good.
I ordered 2 BBQ rice bowls and 1 menu item that I don't know the name of, so it came to 463,000 dong!
The staff is also very friendly, and if you want to try Hong Kong-style food, definitely stop by!
Great food, I wish to revisit

I like Hong Kong food, so I ordered as shown in the picture,
and the portion was really big and really delicious!
But I don't know why there aren't many customers, so I want to keep this restaurant to myself✨
There's also a second floor, so there's plenty of seating, and the food comes out a little late, but it was worth the wait~
The bathroom is also clean, so I highly recommend it

The food is delicious, but the way the restaurant cooperates with shipping platforms like Shopee food or Baemin is very annoying and unprofessional.
Before the list of dishes on Now (Shopee), every time the restaurant called to add 10k/dish, not a problem, but why didn't they raise the price on Now, which is always the same?
Recently, on the Baemin list, there are only a few dishes available. When I order, I ask the restaurant to change to another dish, but the restaurant doesn't notify me and still delivers the wrong dish to the shipper?
If you order at the restaurant 15 minutes in advance and tell them it's ready to be picked up for convenience, the food arrives uncooked, while the restaurant is empty and you have to wait for the kitchen to prepare it for a long time.

Even though I like the restaurant's food, with the owner's lack of professionalism, I will probably never eat here again.

🔎Summary:
✅Strengths: Clean space.
❌Disadvantages: Oily food, only suitable for those who are used to eating Chinese food.
---Details---
🏠 The restaurant is located on the front of Phan Chau Trinh Street, the front of the restaurant is wide, there is a sidewalk for motorbikes (there is a security guard), cars can park on the street.
🏠 The restaurant has the style of a Chinese restaurant, cozy space, using high tables and chairs, large table tops, with glass panels above. The restaurant only has indoor seating (with air conditioning). The restaurant's kitchen is located right next to the entrance, with a transparent partition so it can be seen from the outside. The restaurant's service staff is quite large (compared to the area of the restaurant).
🦆 I tried ordering the dishes [Tu Hy Lam Mon Roasted Duck], [Fried Wonton], [Cauliflower Soup]. In general, I rarely eat Chinese food because it's oily and doesn't suit the taste, so I'll skip the food review 😁. 
💰 The menu prices are quite diverse, on average, to eat enough, each person can spend about 1️⃣0️⃣0️⃣k-1️⃣5️⃣0️⃣k, the price is quite high compared to the general level. However, you can try it to experience because the number of Chinese restaurants in Da Nang is not much. 
🌟 The restaurant is suitable for families (with high chairs for babies) or groups, the optimal number of people is 4-6. 
ℹ The review was written after visiting the restaurant for the first time on December 24, 2020.
Fabulous, the distinctive aroma of Hong Kong cooking greets you as you step into this modern well lit restaurant. The black eggs were devine.

this time, I saw the price increase:
1, Quality: 4* (not up to the mark and not at the perfect level).
2, Facilities: 3* on par with normal restaurants in Da Nang.
3, Service: 4* good, security is ok, and the service staff is also average.
4, Price: 1*, due to the big difference in quality, service, location, facilities and luxury.

We have been to this restaurant for a few times, this is really a authentic Hong Kong restaurant. The milk tea (港式奶茶）, the fried beef rice noodle （乾炒牛河）, and all sort of roasted item (燒味）. It remind me the taste of Hong Kong. And during this COVID time, they also do delivery, their packing and deliver time is excellent.

The staff here is very nice and can speak good Chinese and English.

I had the "Roast Duck + Char Siu Rice Bowl" (about 500 yen)...it reminded me of when I used to live in Hong Kong's Sky City. However, since it's "foreign cuisine" here, it's not exactly cheap, but it's delicious. I recommend it.

I eat it every day and still crave it. It's really delicious, the noodles melt in your mouth, the roast duck meat is not fatty but very lean, the broth is very clear and delicious. Perfect spot to go if you wanted to have authentic Hong Kong Cuisine here in Danang. Went there on International Women's Day and they offered a free drink to our female friend. Good was decent and tasted like the real deal. Staffs were being helpful and acted efficiently.

Hong Kong Authentic Cuisin in Da Nang, Best food ever for Chinese and Local people.
This is one of the Chinese food restaurants that I really like. I knew about this restaurant through a friend who lives in Guangzhou. After hearing great reviews about the restaurant, I stopped by and tried it. The food is fresh and authentic and still retains the flavor of Chinese cuisine.
The impression of this restaurant is that the decoration is very eye-catching, the dining table is a very cute mahjong table. The waiters and the owner are very friendly. I will support you for a long time ^^
Authentic taste, clean environment, delicious food, recommended
Superb. No more words needed.

HongKong restaurant located in the centre. Price is a bit expensive when you compare with local restaurant. Budget: Food + Alcohol --> around 300k VND/person. But taste is really good. Highly recommend to eat 'roast duck'.
Impovement point is customer service. One staff said 'May I help you?', but could not understand my English. And need to ask many times to get a cup of tea. (Staff forget to serve)
Delicious food, affordable prices, attentive service, providing dining chairs, spoons, and bibs for babies. Hope everyone supports the restaurant

A Hong Kong style in the heart of Da Nang from decoration to service and taste.
An interesting experience for Chinese food lovers.

This is the best Hong Kong restaurant I've ever eaten in Vietnam. The typical Hong Kong style of decoration. When you step into the restaurant, you will feel very familiar.
The menu has many dishes but not messy. All the dishes I ate here are extremely delicious, only two dishes may be a bit bland for my taste.
In particular, you should try Uyen Uong milk coffee tea. This is a typical Hong Kong drink. Here, not only does it taste better than all the restaurants I've had it in Vietnam, but it can also be compared to many restaurants I've had it in Hong Kong.
Regarding the food, I have nothing to complain about. I tried the stir-fried pho (similar to Hanoi's pan-fried pho but with a different sauce), the roasted dishes including roasted duck, roasted chicken, roasted pork, and char siu. All are very delicious. You should also try Thai Tu fried rice, fried bread with butter and peanuts in the middle, salt and pepper tofu, etc.
In addition, the prices are very very affordable!! If you go to Da Nang and miss this restaurant, it's a regrettable mistake!
Great food, menu with many choices. Great services and good taste after all.

Entering the restaurant, the first thing you see is the kitchen, which, if not clean and tidy, will definitely be a minus point for a picky customer, but here I find it clean, very clean and tidy, because I am one of those picky customers, because my nose is a bit sensitive ☺️,
A clean house is cool, clean bowls make rice delicious, it's not an exaggeration at all 😁
The food here doesn't make me stop my chopsticks when I feel full, 😋 using the word DELICIOUS is not enough to evaluate, that's my personal feeling, with a variety of foods from seafood to poultry for a menu with many rich dishes, the price must go hand in hand with the quality 👌 that's what the majority of us are looking for 👍I will come back soon, and don't forget to admire the owner for having enthusiastic, polite and friendly service staff.

Beautifully decorated place. Food was awesome too. Had banh xeo, a little oily but a new food experience. Thank you for explaining how to enjoy it. Pho bo, bun bo, chicken leg rice for mains. Portion was fulfilling for 3 ladies. And curiousity led us to add the spicy potato... Spent less than 700k with 3 drinks too. Will be back if we can.

The best Arabic restaurant I've eaten in all of Vietnam.. The portion of food is large and enough for two people.. The rice is cooked grain by grain and separated.. The taste is delicious with the mixture, it gives you a sense of well-being and reminds you that you are in a Gulf country.. Thanks to Chef Samer, may your hands be blessed.. The prices are reasonable.. Its location is near the Dragon Bridge.. Also, there are restrooms for men and women.. and the sinks are clean.. Family friendly par excellence.. I will definitely visit them when I am in Da Nang.
Very very tasty. Best Arabic food in DN by a long shot.

Beautiful place with inspiring Palestinian 🇵🇸 prints that bring a smile to your face. Run by a young Bangladeshi owner who keeps everything spotless and welcoming. Their Egyptian chef serves flavorful dishes with quality meat, plus rare halal Vietnamese options. Will definitely be coming back very soon.

The Arabic rice here was delicious! Reminded me of the mandi and kabsa I had in the UAE. Fluffy rice, tender meat, and rich spices. Portion sizes are big, and the price is very reasonable. A great spot in Da Nang if you are craving Middle Eastern flavors

When I arrived around 5:30, there were no customers. The staff were sitting at the entrance, drinking and chatting. (So, I didn't realize it was this restaurant until I got out of the taxi.)

Service: The staff were clean and friendly. They provided service in simple English.

Interior: The interior was unique and stylish, worth a visit. I especially loved the paintings on the wall.

Food: I ordered raw beef, pasta, and tteokbokki, but honestly, I was disappointed because it lacked unique flavor.

Price: 1.5 million dong, about 300,000 dong per dish, which is on the high side.

It was a good experience, but the menu was too monotonous. (The raw beef was delicious. The tteokbokki—oh, really, just tteokbokki?. The pasta—it was delicious, but lacked unique flavor.)

I also visited a tavern in Hanoi early last year, and it had a similar feel, suggesting the same owner. I remember getting a similar feeling back then...

If I were to write this from the perspective of a self-employed person in Da Nang who wants to see more of their business,

I'd recommend heading towards a pub or wine bar. It looks like it's actually better to open it.
It seems difficult to find anything special on the menu to compete on food.
Even if the menu is reduced and the drinks and alcoholic beverages are strengthened, the interior, atmosphere, and music seem to have the potential to compete.

First, please check the name of the restaurant before you go. The food is average, and the price is a bit lacking. It's not a bad bar to go to for a quiet drink with friends. However, since the restaurant is located in a basement, the cell phone reception is poor.

Overall is very overrated and over priced place. 1.2mln for 3 starters and average quality steak 🥩…

We cane here for dinner - ordered 4 dishes, 3 drinks 🍸.  We were offered the private dining room on arrival. And because the music playing in the dining area was techno, we took up the offer. We had a delightful evening. Food was delicious:  flavourful and well balanced with vege. The saba was cooked beautifully. The truffle fries were sensational, and the red wine - yum! Hubby went in for 2 on the tequila sunrise it was that good! Excellent wait-staff. My only criticism is the room needs a fan. Despite the aircon being on, its directed at the back wall. The room was warm. Menu still says Under The Sea but there is clearly a name change happening as the fish tanks are gone and name over the door has changed. Please keep the truffle fries on your menu! 🙏

It was pretty and had a nice atmosphere, so I felt good the whole time I was eating. There was a bathroom in the room, so I was able to eat comfortably and privately, and the food was really, really delicious.
Good food, great hospitality with clean kitchen!
Fabulous place, great food, and top service.
Delicious food, friendly and enthusiastic staff

I am very glad that I chose this bar to celebrate my birthday 🤍👌 the staff is very polite! Delicious cocktails, wine👌 and the bartender treated me to a delicious drink! It was very nice! I definitely recommend visiting! The atmosphere is magical 🥹

Very cool bar! With very cool bartenders and waiters. We came here for my girlfriend's birthday, the staff was very kind, talkative and cheerful! The drinks are very tasty, the prices are pleasant and the atmosphere is just top! We will come back here next time!
Perfect little hideout under the sea, everything was perfect. I was there two times during my three weeks stay in Da Nang. I really recommend the aglio olio  with seafood.

We went here for my birthday celebrations and what a fab experience it was. The staff knew it was my birthday and gave us a private booth. The booth was huge, super stylish and we could plat our own music. The food was delicious and the staff were super attentive.
I would highly recommend this bar.

Went for dinner with our kids. This place was amazing! Food delicious, cocktails were best we had in Vietnam. The bartender was a local guy we got to know well and had a good laugh with. Very highly recommend 👌
Amazing food, especially Korean tartar with outstanding service and tasty watermelon soju. Recommend this place.
Everything is awesome!

We visited the Under the Sea restaurant for the first time today and were truly impressed by the friendliness of the staff and the ambiance. The round bulletproof glass windows set into the ceiling create a unique play of light in the room. And of course, you can constantly see what one fish or another is doing. The menu is varied and should have something for every taste. The price range is in the mid-to-upper price range. The dishes themselves are okay, but there's still room for improvement. The cocktail mixer is fun and also accommodates special requests.
Conclusion: You should definitely try Under the Sea during your stay in Da Nang and will experience an extraordinary evening.

This place hits all the marks. Great food, atmosphere and superb service! Manager came by twice to make sure we had everything we needed. Had the creamy pasta and the shrimp and pesto. Would definitely recommend.

Come with me on a journey at Under The Sea - Korean Bistro, Da Nang. The perfect place to meet up with friends for a meal paired with wines selected by their sommelier or start your night out with some of their signature cocktails. If you’re in the area you should definitely stop by check it out.

The most impressive thing that made me come to the restaurant many times is that the restaurant has a good taste and is beautifully decorated. I have been coming since the restaurant first opened until now and I see that the restaurant has improved a lot from quality to service. It is worth trying for couples on dates or groups of friends because the restaurant has a lot of private and comfortable space 😺 Will try more food next time

Great bar!
Very tasty food, high prices, but large portions)

Great bar, the staff speaks good English. They're always happy to adjust your cocktail recipe to suit your taste. A very pleasant place, and they even show you fish.

Highly recommend that place. We ordered burata salad, the truffle pasta and the steak — every dish was exceptional. The service is really great too. And it’s quite vibbyy. Thank you! Highly recommend and we’ll be back too
It's one of the best restaurants in Da Nang. Everything was super nice. Special service perfect. Will come again.

The atmosphere of the restaurant is like an aquarium so I like it.
I was surprised that the female employee spoke Korean really well haha.
The two of us went there, and we ate in a room of 10 people while watching Netflix... hahaha.
The steak is really delicious
Chadol bibim is not the taste of convenience store bibim noodles we think of.
Aglio olio is also delicious.
Was celebrating my wife birthday here, the environment is good and awesome, nice food is served, good cocktails provided, will definitely come again 🤗

It's a bit pricey, but it's a full-fledged cocktail bar.

The atmosphere is good, and there are a variety of seat types, including counter seats and private rooms, so it can be used for a variety of purposes.
The staff is friendly, so if you become a regular, you might be able to use it alone.

I also like that the background music is not EDM or up-tempo music unlike other Vietnamese restaurants.

Although it has a calm feel, it is not too chic and is perfect for people in their late 20s to 30s.

The food was also well prepared.

thank you very much! Thank you for the meal😋

people and environment are nice.
the pool design is good.
Just go for it! Great food (open kitchen, rather Western with a Vietnamese influence), very friendly and entertaining staff, interesting views, and great and delicious cocktails.
amazing food and the cocktails were delicious. the staff was very attentive, friendly and polite. the aquarium on the ceiling was impressive
The truffle pasta was amazing! The friendly service and super calm atmosphere, I highly recommend it!
Delicious food and cocktails.  Staff were super friendly.  The short ribs are a must.  On the pricer side but you get what you pay for!
We had a great night with the team at Under the Sea. Some great cocktails, good conversation and superb service. Yo!
Amazing Cocktails and wonderful staff.

This place is amazing! We found it on our first night in Da Nang and had a really great time, amazing food and drinks, and the biggest oysters I’ve ever had! We will try and come back on our trip here
Great vibe and service. The cocktails recommended by the bartender are pretty good

Lovely experience. It kinda feels like you are in some gen Z bar but in the best way. You sit on stools at the bar and you can see everything being prepared as you can see into the kitchen and the bar as well.
Everything is taken care of until the last smallest detail about the presentation of the drinks and food and the flavours are wonderful.
Staff is really polite and helpful.
The music was really nice and of course you can watch the fishes swimming above you which is very soothing. 🙌🏻🐠

Excellent drinks and food, with extremely friendly staff. The bar has windows on the roof that offer a view of a koi fish pond from above. I highly recommend visiting for cocktails or food if you're in Da Nang!
Good service, enthusiastic staff, quite good 🖤 will come regularly
1000000 points, super delicious water and very cute staff
Fantastic food!!! Hidden gem!!! Service cocktails and the beautiful fish tank view
A second place we all visited together. As rumored, we got even drunker with the delicious snacks and soju.

We had a hard time finding a bar that was open on the first day of Tet. My friend had injured her leg and was having trouble moving. Google maps showed that this bar was open so we decided to come here. It was closed (like all the other bars that day) but the owner was a very handsome, enthusiastic and really kind. He opened the bar for us and served us the best I have ever received. What's more, he was a great bartender! Our two drinks were his own creations and they were great! The fries were crispy and delicious, I don't know what the sauce was but they were great! He and everything about this bar were great, there's no reason why we wouldn't come back here again!

Amazing gem!! Incredible ambience with good music, lighting, and 'under the sea' vibes. The boys at the bar were so attentive and friendly, and their cocktails were delicious. As for the food - it was great too, I was itching for my fill of pasta and the delicious seafood pasta totally scratched the itch.

Cute staff
Good music

Today, after finishing my schedule late, I ate tteokbokki, aglio olio, and raw oysters. They were so delicious.
Tteokbokki and aglio olio are spicy enough to suit the Korean palate. ㅋㅋ
And you should definitely try the raw oysters. They're much tastier than in Korea!

I had a wonderful time in Da Nang, with a hipper atmosphere and delicious food, even better than in Seoul. The staff were friendly and the place was clean and well-maintained. :) I'll definitely visit again next time👍🏽
Quality food and cocktails. Watching the bartenders preparing cocktails is mesmerizing. Would recommend trying a  cocktail if you arrive there.
Very good cocktails. Good music. Beautiful, unusual ambiance – you can watch fish (but you probably already knew that).

Great cocktails, amazing food, incredible ambience, and awesome interior design. The fish in the sky, i mean ceiling, is such a brilliant concept. Such a great treat to have had dinner at this amazing place, that would not be out of place in West Hollywood nonetheless, in Da Nang out of all places!
Staff were kind. The vibes and atmosphere are great for a date night.
Underwhelming both food and service.
I really loved this place!! The great hospitability, and great gesture, just awesome! And about the food, ambrosia!! Ambience is amazing!! ❤️
The food is delicious, the staffs are friendly and the owner s lovely!
Fabulous food, amazing service, value for money!
Nice ambiance, the service and food quality here are excellent, staff can speak English well. recommend tourist to visit.
Super friendly & helpful staffs in supporting me to organize the surprised bday dinner for my friend. Romantic & cozy ambience, Los Angeles style with Korean fusion.
love the vibe here💙
Enthusiastic staff 10 VND
Delicious fast food
The restaurant itself is very beautiful, food impeccable and service is excellent. Recommend highly when in Da Nang.

Good fusion food. Amazing staff. The fish pond makes it magical.

One of my fav restaurants in Da Nang. Bullish
Great service and great drinks, but most of all, the atmosphere is incredible. Make sure you don’t miss out on this hidden gem!
Almost great for chilling at the night. The bartender also nice and friendly. Wish you may enjoy when come to this place.

this place was amazing and the vibe was great. You must come for once when you’re here
P.S. the bartenders also great as well too,

Review_text: the bartender is really nice fr the vibes, music, and the drinks too 💯💯💯

very nice, the owner and the staff are very nice! The drinks are also very delicious. If you have the chance, you should come and try it.
Tho was very friendly!! Appreciate the service he has given!
Beautiful restaurant, extremely enthusiastic staff. Delicious food, delicious drinks

We visited the city of Da Nang! And the restaurant UNDER THE SEA made our vacation even better, we did not miss a single evening without visiting this restaurant! …
Coming from singapore, this was even better than most of the bars i visited with much more expensive price. Strongly recommend!!!!

Where to start? I'll just say that this is the best place in Da Nang. We tried different restaurants, but we came back here every time. Super polite staff, delicious food, cool drinks, good music. We have no negative comments. We were in Da …

This intimate spot is amazing. The food was delicious, we had the Seafood Aglio Olio and Grilled Beef Brisket. The service was also great and we enjoyed the koi fish swimming above us. I would definitely recommend.
Nice place for hanging out with friends. In love with drinks here, btw the employees are friendly 🥰. Highly recommend 🫶🏻 …
Nice little bar.
Very basic for the price. Not recommend!

I had a fantastic time at UNDER THE SEA. The drinks were expertly crafted and really hit the spot. The music set the perfect vibe for the evening, and the atmosphere was both lively and welcoming. What really stood out, though, was the staff. They were incredibly friendly and attentive, making the experience even better. Highly recommend checking this place out!

If you're looking for a comfortable and inviting place to unwind, this bar is a fantastic choice. The atmosphere is lively yet relaxed, making it the perfect spot for a night out with friends or even just to chill solo. They offer an impressive variety of drinks, from classic cocktails to unique creations, so there's something for everyone. Overall, it's a highly recommended spot for hanging out and enjoying a good time. Definitely worth a visit!
Good Food and friendly service. Recommendation!
I called to book a table but no one answered, texted zalo/SMS but no reply 😌 …

The atmosphere is even better at the steak pasta restaurant. The owner is very, very *100 kind, and the staff does not miss anything, including checking the taste of the food. Thank you for even making a massage reservation. I will definitely visit again.

The restaurant is spotlessly clean, and the open kitchen is simply impeccable, providing complete transparency into the preparation of the dishes. The meals were absolutely delicious, with special mention for the meat, pasta, and shrimp, which were incredible. The staff was extremely pleasant, adding a touch of warmth and attentiveness to the experience. A very pleasant surprise that deserves to be revisited!

On the last day of my trip to Da Nang, I found a highly rated restaurant near my accommodation and visited it!
Since I had to catch a flight soon, it was difficult to exchange money, so I asked in advance if I could use a credit card before visiting! Credit cards are accepted! The staff were friendly, the service was good, and the owner was Korean, so I was able to finish my last meal even more happily.
We ordered pork belly, trouble french fries, pasta, tteokbokki, cocktails, and beer.
Above all, the aglio olio pasta and seafood tteokbokki were really delicious!!
I think travelers to Korea will be satisfied if they visit during their travels! Recommended :)
Beautiful view. Extremely friendly staff. Always take care of customers carefully. :))
a really good spot to chill , good music and good customer service , and the food here is 100000/10

I bet that you will never find any bars same as this one in Danang. A gem in the city!
Love the vibe, the decorations and the music they play~
We had a memorable date night with a selection of delicious foods and tasty cocktails
Staff are so kind and I love to chit chat with them. It’s just 2 hours but I felt like we became real friends 😊
Must visit place when you stay in Dang ✅

Great service and a wonderfully chill vibe. The fish in the ceiling provided a delightfully marine visual flair. I ordered the roasted marinated eel--of course I had to order seafood to fit the ambiance. My dish was tender and very flavorful, with a great balance of sweet, salty, and umami flavors. Overall it was a great experience.
Super cool bar with great drinks, yummy food and super chill atmosphere.  Love the music, service and location.  Stumbled upon this little gem while staying at the Four Points by Sheraton.
Good service, nice staff, delicious food

Under the Sea in Da Nang is a cozy bar with a cool underwater vibe. The bartenders were awesome! They welcomed us warmly and mixed great drinks. Their friendly service made our time there really special. Definitely check it out if you're in Da Nang!
I searched on google and came to this place, the food is great, especially the pasta and steak, the staff are great and we were served wholeheartedly by them, I had a complete trip.
Friendly staff, delicious food, attentive service, will come back.

Fabulous place- amazing service
Steak was so good!

Found this place on Google Maps and was pretty close to the hotel we were staying in. It’s one of the best experiences we’ve had here in Da Nang and we would definitely come back everyday if we stayed longer 💙🐟

We ordered the Korean Beef Tartare, Chicken Wings, Camembert, Fruit Platter and a couple Cocktails and everything was stunning 😍

100% would recommend this place. The staff spoke to us in English and were extremely attentive and provided amazing service 💯

Cảm ơn Under The Sea!

Sea you soon! 🐟🐠🐡🌊
Well worth a visit! Food is exceptional and the wine even better. Menu is quite limited, but very well executed.

The staff is friendly and the drinks are made in front of you, so it tastes even better.
A real local restaurant without advertisements.
I recommend it.
The place is beautiful and it taste great
It was fun and memorable night here! We recommend this place for people who are staying around Danang.
Beautiful space, delicious drinks and very friendly staff
Nice atmosphere, good food presentation 😌 …
So happy to be here
The best!!!!!!
Wonderful night ❤️❤️❤️
nice
The best ever

We loved our meal and drinks at UNDER THE SEA. The mushroom pasta and the brisket which were both lovely - we felt best pasta of our trip! The service was incredible - we had non stop complimentary prawn crackers and free still water throughout our time and complimentary toasted marshmallows at the end of our meal! More people need to go and experience this place as it really exceeded our expectations.

I visited this restaurant two days in a row!!! The clean open kitchen, the welcoming and friendly staff, and the cocktails... It's a great restaurant for couples, family gatherings, or even solo travelers. Next time, I'd like to stay at the accommodations run by the owner. The quiet and clean atmosphere is exactly my style. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a relaxing time during their Da Nang trip. ^^
Great whiskey sour and super friendly staff. Wrote you and on the Great Wall.
Great ambiance !! Must visit!!
Best service I’ve ever had, great food and great drinks - sat at the bar and could see the chefs cooking our meal as well as the fish from the pond above swimming about
The atmosphere here is great, and the food is truly delicious. You can enjoy a wonderful dinner here. If you're visiting Da Nang, be sure to stop by here for dinner. You won't regret it.
If you're visiting Da Nang, be sure to stop by. The atmosphere is great, the food is good, the music is good, and it's a comfortable place you'll want to visit often.
Great atmosphere, the boss is also very friendly, I recommend you come~
Like
The boss is Singaporean and he is very nice. The atmosphere in the store is great and the music is very good, very similar to Taiwan.

What a great experience!  The mushroom pasta and grilled brisket were delicious!  The girls were so welcoming and even made us a special dessert!  Thank you for making our evening!  😊. We will be back again.
The restaurant has a very beautiful view, romantic, delicious food, good service. Will come back later.
The food is really good, the staff is so nice. Absolutely come back next time.
5 stars for all the experience, food, and service. They have the best ambience, vibes, and comfort places. It suitable for chilling at the bar. Best of the best service I ever had.
The staff is extremely friendly, the view is beautiful and the food is delicious
Good service, delicious food, but need to change the phone number on the page because when I called, it said it was a wrong number.

While staying at the hotel, I heard that there was a good bar in the basement, so I hurried to go after 10 o'clock and the owner was Korean. He was very kind and showed me to the room as there were 5 people visiting with my child. My mother was 60th birthday, so I came here for a birthday party. They made non-alcoholic cocktails when I asked for them and the pasta was so delicious that I ate a lot even though it was late at night. This seems to be a great pasta restaurant! Those staying at the hotel must visit

Cocktails were really good, got the Soju cocktails and were given a small
tasting of Soju before to make sure we liked it. Staff were super friendly and helpful, giving excellent advice on the food and drinks. Aglio oglio pasta was lovely. Would recommend for a quiet, intimate drink or for a nice, relaxing dinner. Good selection of snack food too. And, of course, there are fish swimming overhead which adds to the overall
vibe of the place; couldn't recommend enough!

Amazing experience at under the sea, fantastic service, food and drinks tasted like they were made with love! Cool vibey music and the fish swimming above you is a very nice addition ❤️ had the watermelon soju cocktail and seafood cream pasta and both were delightful 🥰
10/10 would recommend
Gorgeous place. So memorable night in Danang at this bar! Must try Pasta and Steak
The atmosphere and food are decent. The prices are a bit high.
The steak and pasta are delicious. The interior is also clean, so I recommend it.
Nice shop, good bartending
The waiters are very enthusiastic❤️I will definitely come again next time

I'm leaving satisfied with the atmosphere, the taste, and the staff's friendliness. I visited on a recommendation, and it was so delicious that I forgot to take a picture. ㅠㅠ
I'd love to come back again next time.

I'm YouTuber Noh Neun Namjakkugi.
Luxury and romantic!!
A versatile establishment that kills two birds with one stone +_+
A wine bar armed with a clean and deep flavor,
with recipes passed down from the former Blue House chef.
My wife and I enjoyed a moody meal.
The interior is stunning, and the prices are reasonable.
I really, really want to visit here often.
Highly recommended^-^
I like to enjoy it privately in my room.
beautiful space
Cute and cozy bar, extremely friendly staff and great introduction to Da Nang. Will be back ❤️❤️❤️
The owner, Matthew, was very friendly and the space was comfortable. The natural wine was also very delicious and I plan to visit again during my stay. It was a nice surprise during the trip.

Great experience! Not just a bar, but also a good restaurant. The environment is very cozy. Salads, snacks, main dishes and staples are all cooked to perfection, and the service staff is very qualified, with no problem in English, Korean and Vietnamese. 100 points recommended~

Gorgeous little place where the koi fish swim above you. Went there a couple of times during our 10 day stay in Da Nang and had two lovely evenings thanks to great staff,  delicious delicious food (so good I had to say it twice!) and the intimate atmosphere. Thank you for two great evenings :-) (And so cheap considering the quality of the menu)

The restaurant is hidden, located below a restaurant, so everyone should pay close attention. The restaurant is spacious and cute, there are even private rooms, and the staff are very enthusiastic hehe
Cute hidden bar with delicious drinks
The bar is very chill, the bartender is friendly too, if I have a chance to come back to Da Nang I will come back to enjoy it.
so awesome

This isn't a cocktail bar, it's a restaurant with delicious food. The pasta and steak are delicious. Google reviews suggest it's a cocktail bar, but it's actually a restaurant. The staff are incredibly friendly, and even if you come alone, they speak English and Korean fluently. The customers are also incredibly entertaining. Highly recommended.
Very good, fun music, very kind staff.

Such an amazing cozy place for a dating night. Highly recommend to try Chicken Wings and Singapore Sling from UTS.

All the staffs are friendly and have high interaction with us. I will be back but I would prefer to have drinking game hehe

I was so busy eating that I didn't even take a picture.

This is my favorite jjambbong I've had in Da Nang.

The noodles are delicious.
Beautiful and chill space, great drinks. Friendly staff and enthusiastic advice. Always take care of customers. This bar is okay everyone❤️
I had a wonderful evening with friends here. Everything was really good, the service was very enthusiastic.

The staff is so cute, the space is suitable for all types of vibe hahaa the drinks are okelaaaa
Service and Staff super friendly and well-trained hospitality. I didn’t expect they have good taste of music as well!!!

This is the best place in town. I’ve searched it on google, that brings me to this bar. It has a unique design and manificent architecture. Moreover, the food and the service is outstanding. The staff in here is very friendly and enthusiasm. Hope all of u can have a nice dinner. Definitely im gonna come back here
The accommodation and the bar are both great! 🍸 …
Amazing experience, unique venue, speak great English and phenomenal wine list! Matthew the owner was nothing but hospitable. One of the highlights of damang!

Amazing service and experience! As a foreigner, I truly enjoyed meeting and speaking with king, gentle, and friendly local bar tenders. Our drinks were described as “a message” of our appreciation for enjoying our bar. Could not recommend enough!
Great, the ladies are very enthusiastic... Will come back

Nice food and drinks, good service. I enoyed the atmosphere here alot 100/100

The place is located underneath an aquarium where old Japanese fish observe you. Great atmosphere, I really appreciate the friendship of the staff. Both of them speak English and are very keen to handle your comfort…I will come back for sure..
lovely staff, take care of customers 100/10 delicious drinks, beautiful view chilllll

Very nice cocktail!!! And the bartenders are really friendly and professional 😍I love the ggetnip cocktail they served here. Strongly recommend it 😋😍
The bartenders and waiters are very friendly and enthusiastic. They care about the customers' satisfaction with drinks and meals and make adjustments, and they still smile.

The price is high in Da Nang, but it’s about the same as Taiwan. But it’s really beautiful and the atmosphere is so good that I’m willing to spend money. The shrimp cakes are so filling that I’m really full. It’s really a great experience!
Funny cocktail place where the fish swim above your head. The cocktails were good but not great but the atmosphere was spot on. Lovely service and nice crisps to snack.

Accidentally found this restaurant when we were traveling to Da Nang, the restaurant was extremely good, the staff at the restaurant were extremely enthusiastic and the restaurant also often gave away some snacks. Strongly recommend that when you come to Da Nang, you should try it, I guarantee you won't be disappointed :)))

You will be enchanted with under the sea! Me & my husband went for a drink and stayed for a couple because it was very nice. The team were very knowledgeable about cocktails and served us really lovely selection of cocktails and beers. The place is really cool, quirky, with big chandeliers and fish swimming above us. Good music, good cocktails and really lovely team! We will be back :)

What kind of tax is that... 5% service charge on the total price, 10% on alcohol, 5% on drinks. And it doesn't end there. They already added 5% to the total price, and now they're adding 5% on alcohol and 5% on drinks. I won't do it again.
A little hidden gem in Da Nang. Great food with exceptional service. Definitely worth a visit.
Lovely food and lovely staff, really nice atmosphere

A nice place that is hard to find in Danang. The cocktails are great. The staff is also friendly.

Great drinks and atmosphere. The multilingual staff take time to talk to you and get to know what your tastes are and check in on how you’re doing. They’re very accommodating without being too overbearing.

Food options look plentiful and delicious, and the drinks are the best i’ve had at many bars. They take the time to make you a proper drink.

Atmosphere is cozy, with good music (without being too loud to hear), comfortable lighting, and good bar seating.

10/10 for a cozy night out with a date or a few friends.

Reviewer_name: ภาสธร จันทนาคม
Review_text: This place is amazing with lovely staff.
Very nice place
It’s surprising that there is a bar like Gangnam in Da Nang.  I think I came here three times with my kids on this trip. Highly recommended

I love this place! Coolest bar I have been to while in Vietnam, the atmosphere is awesome and the staff are amazing! They have a small menu with everything executed perfectly, would highly recommend the buratta salad, it was a standout. Also, the space is so beautiful, you really feel as though you’re dining ‘under the sea’. Cannot wait to come here again!

10/10 would recommend to anyone, whether you want to go in for a drink, a light meal or a feast. The atmosphere, music and aesthetic is epic & you feel like you are under water- the decor really matches the name. The food was outstanding; a small menu but every item was cooked quickly and perfectly. Staff are very friendly, speak great English, and are attentive, but also leave you to enjoy your meal in peace. Price was very reasonable - would definitely go here again!

Chill quiet space suitable for young people... Cocktails and Food are delicious and suitable for taste... Bartenders and Waiters have good attitude, very friendly and take care of customers... Especially Staff Trinh and Hang should get a raise
Super beautiful space, friendly staff🌹11 points
Lovely kind staff, pretty restaurant with great food! Loved our pasta dishes!
Amazing time here! We were greated with friendly staff and amazing food! Super excited to come back again!
The service was wonderful, such kind ladies working the bar! Very attentive and friendly. I am looking forward to returning!

Have found it on gg maps and it leads me to this place 🤙🏻 its pretty cool with the music and space. They have unique concept and know how to make good service, including the food also. Cocktails are awesome and they’re likely to be classic. Highly recommend for tourists because the staff are very friendly and dedicated, they will give u some instruction and recommendations for your night plan.

Drinks were really nice, they gave us free crackers all night and roasted marshmallows. There was a surprise 5% service fee at the end and tax was not included in drink price but that is standard for the area
Overall a good night

Highly recommended as a bar with a reasonable price and atmosphere. The prices of various alcoholic beverages such as soju, wine, and whiskey, as well as reasonable snacks, are truly crazy. There are also private rooms, and each room has a bathroom, making it a great place for a golf after-party!

Very cool, cosy restaurant under the fish tanks.
Great snacks/ starters selection. Staff are very attentive and offer suggestions depending on your tastes. …

Fantastic experience. Staff super, engaging and go out of their way to ensure food, drinks meet expectations.
Cocktails, wine great and food very good. Good size servings. …
Amazing venue. Great interior. Nice cocktails.
