Very good
Delicious, enthusiastic 😍 …
Everyone should try this bar because the service, food, and space are all great. The staff are lovely and enthusiastic. Once you go, you will want to go back a second time!!!!
The food and drinks at the restaurant are quite delicious, the staff here are very enthusiastic and attentive, worth the experience.
cute staff

My husband & I came here for drinks and ended up staying for dinner. It was quiet at 7pm but really picked up later. We started with cocktails (the signature cocktail and a gimlet) then had champagne & an excellent St Emillion Grand Cru. We had some snacks. The Korean potato pancake was great. Also the fried dumplings were
really delicious so was the sauce with it. We ordered the steak to share and it was perfectly cooked medium rare and was tender and delicious. We were amazed at the quality of food for a bar. The steak comes with caramelised onions that are delicious - we told the owner he should sell it in jars as a condiment. The staff were also very helpful and will offer suggestions if you’re unsure of what to eat/drink.

We went in for appetizers and the food was so good we are coming back tomorrow night for dinner! The staff was friendly and efficient. The atmosphere is modern, upbeat, and lively. I highly recommend all the appetizers and the Garden Salad was amazing.
Really nice view. high recomend for all
This is a great destination. Friendly, enthusiastic and attentive staff. Delicious and eye-catching drinks
Cute and enthusiastic staff, many virtual living corners, delicious water, chill view, good music, highly recommend 🤌🏻💞

We came here for dinner and drinks after seeing high reviews and definitely wasn’t disappointed.

We had the Seafood Cream Pasta, Crispy Pork Belly with Garlic & Vegetable, and the Lemongrass chicken wings and they were all stellar 10/10s.

Service was also fantastic and we will definitely head over again if we visit Danang again
So so...

Good place to chill out
If you go alone, don't be afraid. Staff will actively reach you and talk. They are so nice :)))
The shop's space has many beautiful corners, the staff are enthusiastic, and they are very suitable for dates.
Amazing staff
Beautiful shop.. friendly and enthusiastic staff. Especially Trinh. Will come back 👍

Un posto da sogno!
I stayed at Livie (the hotel upstair) 3 nights and everynight this bar was my getaway. It has the charm of a hidden speakeasy, private, intimate but their attentive staffs, sexy music and lovely guests make it easy to open your heart to new encounters. Good selection of wine and spirits, but their cocktails are something one must try. I was lucky to be there at their first event with a guest bartender - Mr Tu Nguyen. He presented some of the most delightful original cocktails I have ever tasted, tailor made to the concept "under the sea". I haven't had such a good time like this in a while. Thanks for the great memory, I will def visit again next time in Danang!
one of the best bars you can visit if you have the opportunity to come to Da Nang. the space and quality of service as well as the staff everything is perfect. Hidden Gem in Da Nang i have to say so🤍

The food is excellent however it is much more of a bar than a restaurant.
I don't understand the identity of this bar-restaurant, the drinks menu only consists of wine sold by the bottle. The choice of wine by the glass is only red or white, no grape variety (and no quantity on the menu either). So it's not what I call a bar.
For the restaurant part, the music is very loud, it's complicated to get a table and not eat at the bar even if our group (of 3) represented 50% of the customers.
As the music is very loud the waitress did not understand my order.
Super beautiful space, cute and enthusiastic service 🥰
The shop is beautiful, the staff is friendly and cheerful, the water is delicious
Great space, good drinks. Especially the staff are super cute. ✋🏽🤚🏽 points
Great
The atmosphere was great, the service was great, and the food was delicious!!

Reviewer_name: ปิยะฉัตร วิจินาวา
Review_text: Very good, the staff are lovely, and the food is very delicious.
Great place! Lovely food, wine and service. My favourite place in Da Nang to go for an evening. Highly recommended!
so good

The employees are so friendly, we love the environment, really unique with the view, making things actually feel like we are under the sea. The drinks were amazing, we picked the place's signature. Love everything about it❤️❤️

The shop is small and neat, the drinks are delicious and the prices are reasonable, the staff are both friendly and enthusiastic. If I have the chance to go to Da Nang again, I will definitely visit the shop again.
Food was very tasty and service was 10/10. Would highly recommend if you're in Da Nang.
Really attentive service, great Korean fusion food and well priced beverages
Great wine bar~
I'm still here an haven't left yet. Looking to pull an all nighter!!!

I stumbled upon this place through a Google search. The food is based on Korean dishes, and they're delicious. The atmosphere is upscale, but the prices aren't overly expensive, so I was very satisfied.

If you haven't visited this gem of a bar then nows the time. The girls are attentive, service is 5*, nothing is too much. The food is a must try, attention to detail and flavour is again 5*. This place is an absolute must try, you need to experience it for yourself to really get the vibe. Definitely would recommend and return.

100% recommended, Gem of a place 💎Staff are so friendly and welcoming. Food is best I've had in Da Nang. Wine and cocktails are amazing, decor and atmosphere is stunning. Highly recommended to anyone visiting.
Very cute and sexy lounge. Great spot to connect with friends over some quality drinks and amazing food. Definitely recommend
Good drink, nice service and amazing atmosphere  🫶🏻🫶🏻🫶🏻 i’ll be back 😍😍
Good drink and lovely staffs 🥰
The wine quality is high. I was really happy that the Nghi staff spoke to me. I like that they are friendly to introverts like me. The staff can also speak a little Korean.
This place is amazing, a wonderfully kind staff,  and has great food and drinks! Offer much local advice and are very kind!
Very nice space, lovely and enthusiastic staff, delicious drinks!

Nice place to have a good wine with delicious food.
Good memories in vacation

Good atmosphere, delicious food, nice wine.
Recommend a bar kitchen with a good atmosphere for vacation!!
Love this place!!!  Coolest interior and by far best cocktail and pasta I had in Danang!  Awesome staff too
good

I think this is the coolest bar i’ve ever been in Danang. The interior is very nice and creative, the food is amazing and people work there are very friendly with detailed service mind, also the owner is Korean and seems like he is very knowledgeable on food and beverage. Strongly recommend this place for the good vibes

Mathew and his staff is super friendly and accompany us for kind chat. But watch out! REAL korean soju will shooy you to the moon and mars in no time ^^. Also, the design, though simple, is useful and reveals thorough understanding of the customers' need. Nice and polite place for good chat with friends and the love one!

The owner, Matthew, is one of the best hosts out there. He is mindful of his customers' needs. The ladies at the bar, Trinh and Duyen, were willfully giving us tips to navigate the streets of Da Nang and Ho Chi Minh. The cocktails were top notch and food was true to the culture the bar represents - Korean. Overall, it was a fantastic experience!!!
Amazing service and cocktails, with great food. The staff is very welcoming. It’s really a hidden gem in Da Nang
Very chill and classy place. Love the foods
Everyone there was really nice. Great service, food, and drinks. Nice chill atmosphere, too.

Amazing dinner at under the Sea ! Nice atmosphere & music, unique concept and amazing natural wines. Ideal for a business dinner, a date or a casual night between wine lovers!  I will come back here everytime I’m passing by Danang. Thank you again to the owner Matthew for the excellent service & story around the place :)

I think they just open recently. Chill, quiet place. Owner is Korean and the food and drinks are really good. Good place to relax and have a drink with friends and colleagues. Lots of parking along the street
Danang's first Wine-pairing Kitchen Bar recently opened. The wine and food are both very clean and delicious ~ good!!
The spicy dumplings and Korean seafood stir-fried rice cakes went well with the white wine. The prices are reasonable and cheap compared to the quality of the food.

Wonderful experience,
the food is great👍 👍👍👍👍
the service is 👍👍👍👍
the atmosphere is great ! 👍👍👍👍👍
The washroom is 👍👍👍 👍👍
High standard
Highly recommend
Here is a place. The boss is very kind. You should come here one time.
Chill space. Delicious food with enthusiastic owner
The space is nice, the food is delicious, and there are many types of wine.
This is such a great space! The food is delicious. I hope you all have a great experience!
Cozy place, great. I will come back here. Food is delicious.
Delicious food. Passionate staff. Nice store.
Very good!!!! I love it 🥰 …
This is the place where I want to be for relaxing time. Good quality of food with selection of wines.
Super nice place for enjoying wine and whiskey

I visited with my parents, and they had bad knees, but they reserved a table on the first floor.

They congratulated my father on his birthday and provided excellent service.

From the reservation to the arrival and departure, everything was wonderful and I was grateful.

Every dish was delicious, and I couldn't stop exclaiming.

I still remember it. Even after returning to Korea, I regret not being able to enjoy the steak and foie gras because I was so full.

The staff were all so friendly, and I was deeply touched by their attention to even the smallest details for my parents.

If I ever visit Da Nang, I'll definitely make this my first restaurant reservation.

It was very stunning experience
Specially lamb shank with figs It was so delicious
Amazing authentic Moroccan food! We had a great time eating here with a group. Halal of course too!
The food here was delicious and top-notch. It exceeded my expectations. I had the tagine, and dessert was a pancake with mango.
Excellent, great boss, great food and service!
At the top, Uncle Sam
Unique place. Quiet area. Great chef. Super food. Excellent service.
Very delicious dishes and friendly, the chef is great, humor

Excellent restaurant! An incredible culinary journey!
The chef is incredibly kind. I highly recommend it and will definitely return.
Nice for Moroccan tagine lovers 👌

This restaurant is a real gem! A favorite during our trip to Vietnam! ❤️❤️ The food is incredibly tasty and generous, with friendly and genuinely kind staff! This is an address not to be missed, it's worth the detour for lovers of Moroccan cuisine. Magnificent, no other words...
Excellent, you feel like you're in Morocco. Very tasty and generous dishes. It's worth the detour, I recommend it.

The restaurant is small and cozy, with a nice, calm atmosphere. The owner is also the chef. All the dishes we ordered were delicious and very filling. Thank you, and may God bless your wealth and your family.
Little jewel hidden at the turn of an alley. Very good. I recommend.

1 The place is beautiful
2 The food is delicious
3 The service is excellent

I don't know if the employee is the owner or not, but he is honest and has a refined demeanor.

Yes, it's worth trying again 🙏🏻
Sam will enchant you with his Moroccan cuisine and his succulent dishes that come from the heart with an exceptional welcome…. We loved it and we highly recommend a visit to Bladi 🤙🏼🤩🤩✌️

The food was amazing. I have not had an amazing experience in any Morrocan in Asia as I did at Blardi. The service was  by the owner himself- Sameer , the food was exclusively cooked and prepared by him and his petite Chef. The setting was calm and cozy. Don’t miss coming here if you are in Danang. We came here on our second night and our last night. We can’t leave Danang without going back there back again.
We had wonderful dinner experience. Tasted Moroccan food. Must visit place for sure
I advise you to come here. Good halal, Muslim, Moroccan food. I recommend this wonderful restaurant to every Arab Muslim.

A real favorite! You feel right at home. The welcome is warm, the atmosphere authentic, and the dishes... a pure delight! Moroccan flavors like you rarely find, especially so far from Morocco. Thank you for this delicious and generous moment!
We had a lovely time at Baladi restaurant, the welcome, the food, the atmosphere were great, delicious and varied, if you are in Da Nang try it it is great
Best food i had in a long time

The restaurant serves halal food and honestly I don’t know where to start. Should I start with the waiter who welcomed us or the creative chef who served the delicious dishes himself? The food is very delicious and above average. Thank you from the bottom of my heart ❤️

A halal Moroccan restaurant in Da Nang, a real treat.

Very good food, and the entire staff, including the manager, are very welcoming.

Authentic decor, which truly gives the impression of being in Morocco for the duration of a meal.

I recommend it.

The server was super friendly.
The food is very good. I recommend this restaurant.
I just find the prices high.
But we'll be back 🇩🇿

Finding a place that combines great food, atmosphere, and service isn't easy, especially in Da Nang. While looking for a place to have dinner, I stumbled upon this restaurant and it made our trip with friends special.
excellent address for people looking to eat halal
Love this place for it’s super delicious food.

BEST RESTAURANT IN DA NANG HANDS DOWN!

Not only the food is absolutely fantastic, the host is amazing as well! The recommendation for food is fantastic! Briwats, hummus, and the Marrakech Pizza is amazing! Better not skip this one as you'll regret the best tasting food you'll ever eat in your trip!

P.s. the host is very handsome!

Attached image of an empty plate is the evidence of a good and tasty food!
Very good restaurant, fresh and very tasty cuisine. If you want to eat tagine or couscous, this is the right place. The manager is amazing.
Such a peaceful place to have a delicious meal and be sat in a simple beautiful setting. Absolutely loved it.
Bladi is next level! The food was incredible, the owner, chef and staff are absolutely beautiful. A definite MUST to visit
I am coming, God willing
I passed by at 9 o'clock and it was locked. The next day I passed by after sunset and found it locked.

Absolutely exceptional restaurant, in a beautiful traditional Moroccan decor, whose owner Samir will delight you with his incredibly kind attitude. Not only is his cuisine succulent, elaborate, very tasty, but his delicate attention to each customer is a must that is so rare and that I highly appreciated. Samir delighted my taste buds and enchanted my evening. His team is also very involved and very professional: Bladi Restaurant is a very beautiful and succulent table to try in Danang. Since the beginning of my trip to Vietnam, it has been the best restaurant I have had the chance to go to. A thousand thanks dear Samir for your immense kindness and the generosity of your cuisine. I wish you the best.

Thank you to Samir for this super welcoming welcome and this exquisite halal Moroccan cuisine! A restaurant and food made with the heart! A very warm team, we feel at home! For all tourists you absolutely must come and eat in this restaurant, if you pass through Da Nang!
Awesome restaurant , test of food , service , the staff so kids, have to try the Moroccan tea
Delicious food and expensive price

Awesome place, the menu is large and varied! The food is beyond excellent, especially the beef tartare. We also ordered a pizza with camembert, but we had to take it with us because the portions are very big and we got full with one dish :D
The owner is very nice!!! This place is now on my favorites list. Thank you 💖

PS Terrific responses from the owner of the place to bad comments :D love it!
Amazing Moroccan food

Unfortunately, it didn't work out with this restaurant. We wanted a new taste, we were looking for something different from Vietnamese and Russian food. And we responded to this restaurant based on the rating and reviews. We liked everything from the photos and reviews. We immediately went there.
But! We were disappointed, we didn't like the food. We left hungry.
Perhaps we were just unlucky with the choice of dishes.
I loved the whole wheat pizza, but the real standout is the owner—he’s exceptionally attentive and offers excellent service
Very excellent, specialized chef from Morocco. It is true that there are not many varieties, but the tagines available are very luxurious. I highly recommend it. Go and try it and pray for me.
delicious food and gorgeous decor, deserves waaaaay more customers and attention ! 🤍🤭
We showed up on Saturday evening at 8 p.m. but it was closed, but there was no indication to the contrary....
If you want a break from Vietnamese food, this is a find! Very tasty, stylish, and beautiful!

Thanks to Sam, the owner of Bladi, we spent a family moment that will remain one of my favorite moments in restaurants in Danang. We had the impression of being in a Moroccan family with dishes with an exceptional flavor. The setting is simply simple and warm, we are taken by the atmosphere, music, decor and smell. I recommend 100%, leave your problems on the restaurant landing and let yourself be carried away by the experience 💕💕💕
Great Moroccan restaurant in Da Nang is a must try. Super tasty options. The house white wine isn't bad either. Helpful firendly staff.
Very nice food

At Bladi's, flavors tell stories, and each bite evokes a new world.
Samir isn't just a chef: he's a passionate artist, a spice alchemist, who generously shares his love for his country's cuisine.
Thank you for this experience and these memorable moments!

Sabrina

A cuisine that's sincere, generous, and full of emotion. The flavors are perfectly mastered, and each dish tells a story. Samir welcomes us with a rare warmth, as if we were in his own home. My only regret: not having discovered this gem sooner. Thank you for this wonderful experience, Samir.
Everything was perfect! A big thank you to Chef Samir. Refined and excellent cuisine that reminded us of where we come from, even in the depths of Vietnam 😉

Bladi is my go to spot for Moroccan food in Da Nang. Its rare to feel so welcome when you arrive in a restaurant. The staff are friendly and professional. It reminds me of my experience in Morocco. Don't miss this spot while in Da Nang!
Trop bien. So gooddddddd. More Vietnamese people need to know how to eat Moroccan food and come eat here.

The best food experience in Danang

I've been to many Moroccan restaurants, and Bladi wins with its taste and hospitality.

May God bless him and expand his livelihood.

Wow so so good
Real Morrocan food
go there to take your taste buds on a journey

We had a very disappointing experience. When we asked for a table for two, the owner simply told us to “come tomorrow” without any explanation. When we tried to clarify if there were any available tables, he responded with sarcasm: “If I had a free table, I wouldn’t tell you to come tomorrow.”

The tone was unnecessarily rude and dismissive.
Definitely not the kind of welcome you’d expect from a restaurant.
Now I understand all the 1-star reviews 😂

You need to improve your attitude and the way you talk to people. 🤦‍♂️😁
Amazing place, I really liked the cuisine, everything is unusual and delicious ❤️
As usual, a great welcome and sublime cuisine, good atmosphere and a change of scenery guaranteed, we will definitely come back :-)
Restaurant and food, the food is very delicious, and the owner of the restaurant is very ethical and respectful

A true culinary gem in Da Nang! If you're looking for an authentic Moroccan experience, look no further. Samir, the owner, is simply exceptional: welcoming, passionate, and always ready to share a moment with his customers. You can tell he puts his heart and soul into his dishes, and the results are incredible.

The flavors are rich, the spices perfectly balanced, and the meat... what meat! Tender, flavorful, and of rare quality.

A place where you eat well, but above all, where you feel good. Thank you, Samir, for this unforgettable culinary journey to the heart of Morocco, while still in Vietnam. I'll definitely be back!

As always a most delicious dining experience! If you have not yet enjoyed the culinary delights of Bladi.... what are you waiting for? Every dish shows attention to detail and the love of fine cuisine.

This is my second visit for lunch… nothing changed from my previous visit in term food quality and service. Chef on duty even came out to check the satisfaction…. The food still amazing… And this afternoon I had an Octopus salad and Chicken Tajine.. both were excellent..

-Azizs-

Best place I have been in all Vietnam and ofc in Da Nang too! The atmosphere was amazing, you feel at your moroccan home, the girls staff were very very nice and the food was amaziiing! I had also the pleasure to sit and talk with the Owner, Samir, for 2/3 hours in a row!
P.s. You can also pray, just ask and they will tell you where to pray!
Absolutely raccomended!

I've never experienced Moroccan food before.

I felt the natural flavor of all the ingredients.

The boss is very kind.

We had a lovely evening! Our dishes were delicious, a real treat! We have been traveling for almost 2 months now and this was our favorite so far!
Beyond the food, the owner takes the time to chat and is super welcoming.
Result: we ate very well, we had a great time and learned about Vietnam. Many thanks
This was the best food that I’ve had in vietnam. The chef is very friendly and respectful I will recommend this restaurant 100%.

What a pleasure to eat a good tagine in Vietnam and to introduce this cuisine to my Vietnamese friend! A beautiful discovery, go there with your eyes closed, you will not be disappointed and Sam will welcome you as he deserves! Thank you for this moment of culinary escape! Pascal
It was good as much as the service was

To my surprise I came across a Moroccan restaurant on Maps. I felt like going there after weeks of eating only rice. The welcome by the Chef and owner was warm and friendly. The food was delicious, Moroccan but with its own twist. The briwat were delicious as well as the harira and tajine with beef (halal)
Chef, thank you for your hospitality and your delicious Moroccan cooking. I hereby invite all Muslims to visit beautiful Vietnam and especially Da Nang and do not forget to eat at Bladi. Eating here felt like Bladi (fatherland)
I forgot to mention that the atmosphere and decor of the restaurant do justice to the food.
They were very hospitable it made me feel like I was in Morocco. I am Moroccan myself the food was delicious. Super sweet staff.
Tasty and interesting dishes. A bit pricey, but worth it.

I went there twice, with friends. The food is always great and the waiter is super friendly.
I'm looking forward to going again.
I tried the tartare and the tajine, both were delicious.
A truly unique restaurant in Danang.

We just had the most amazing dinner at Bladi Da Nang! Chef Samir was so welcoming and friendly: he personally welcomed us as soon as we arrived, and gave us a choice of the lovely tables on the intimate terrace. Service was fast and efficient, and Chef Samir made sure that we, and everyone else in the restaurant, were enjoying the whole experience. The food was absolutely amazing: we began with the Moroccan briwats, lovely homemade savory puff pastries, and then moved on to the beef tartare. We’ve eaten many versions of beef tartare, and Chef Samir’s was absolutely one of the best we’ve ever had; it was truly a perfected dish. We then shared a Kefta Tagine, a delicious tagine of lamb meatballs and egg in a savory red sauce, served with homemade Moroccan bread. We finished with a peanut butter crème brulee that sounds crazy, but absolutely worked, was light and super-flavorful.  We came to Bladi just looking for something a little different; and ended up having one of the best meals we’ve had in Vietnam. Thank you, Chef Samir, for a fantastic meal; we’ll return soon!

The food is delicious, thank you very much, I recommend it to everyone! I can leave a suggestion: add air conditioning or a fan to create a breeze as it is very hot and stuffy in the evenings. I love food even if the price is a little more expensive than other establishments, but this establishment is worth visiting and trying the delicious dishes!

What an amazing restaurant!

The food is definitely up there as the best you’re going to get in Danang (in fact, it’s likely the best Moroccan food you’ll get anywhere).

The service is also absolutely fantastic, Sam - the owner, is such a nice and kind person. It was my partners birthday and he absolute went above and beyond to make it an unforgettable night for us.

We had the lamb shank which was superb, and the rich gravy stew that accompanied it was an extremely well balanced and tasty.

We also had the hummus and eggplant caviar, both incredible.

Briouats were absolutely incredible - these are a MUST ORDER!!

We will definitely be coming again, and if you’re in Danang, even if just for the day - come here.

It's amazing to find a restaurant like this here!

But what’s more, it’s really good!

The manager is super friendly!

I had a kofta, how good it was, and eating Moroccan here is great 😌

Thanks again!
Friendly service, wonderful food, cozy atmosphere
Amazing place, authentic Moroccan and super tasty food, and a friendly atmosphere, super chill.

We had the good fortune of enjoying a private dinner that was a tasting of the entire menu.  Wonderful dishes with the lovely spices of Morocco. And an excellent Moroccan red wine blend paired perfectly. 🍷🍷🍷
Super cozy with super tasty food, freshly made and very tasty. Cozy atmosphere, owner is very nice and gives you a lot of attention. Highly recommended!

My husband and I wanted to visit this restaurant for two years and finally went there on a date. We tried delicious eggplant caviar, tagine with kefta and couscous and the owner recommended chicken pies as an appetizer. We really liked …
The place is great, the service and food are delicious.

Sat down in this restaurant with my girlfriend and was excited to try this place. Unfortunately we had a bad experience. I asked our host a couple of simple questions about the mint tea and the menu, and was met with sarcasm and a …
Great place! The food is very tasty, the owner is hospitable, the atmosphere is cozy. We had hummus, pizza with salmon and a burger - we really liked it 🥰 …
Incredible Moroccan restaurant, I ate a Kefta tagine and the owner, who is a sweetheart, even offered me a hummus, I highly recommend it 🔝 …

The owner is funny, kind and a person who knows how to make you feel good in his restaurant. Great food.
We booked a table at 8 and arrived 20 min later, thank you so much for staying extra time serving us!

We had a Iovely dinner at this restaurant, the chef served us amazing food and some drinks afterwards.  The quality of this food was outstanding and I had to ask how many Michelin stars he has? Really great food a must visit if you in the area or make it a destination.
Quaint restaurant. Excellent food and service. A gem!

Very tasty beef tartare!
Also a large main menu
There are different wines, good prices!
Very friendly and pleasant owner
I recommend

One of my favourite places in Da Nang ❤️
Amazing tartare, good wine and wonderful owner who takes a good care of guests. Totally recommend!

Its amazing when we travel and we start searching for our native food Arabic or African. All these restaurants are changing unbelievable prices for a piece of lamb or chicken. Plate for this restaurant is almost $25 us dollars for a piece of lamb and rice. Compared to local food for $4 a good meal.  I ended up paying $10 for a bowel of soup with a small piece of bread.  Likewise Middle eastern and Turkish restaurants.  People that’s why noone is coming to your restaurants.  I don’t recommend
Small but cozy and well-kept place. Excellent Moroccan cuisine with very well presented dishes and generous portions. The service is excellent and the staff is very kind. We will return.
A very atmospheric place and delicious food. I recommend it!

Amazing allround experience!
We started with a delicious hummus, followed by the most amazing kofte tajine!
Would recommend this to anyone that wants to experience another type of atmosphere in Vietnam.
The host made us feel very welcome as well :)

Excellent service, very personalized. Samir, the owner, is particularly attentive and keen to satisfy his customers in the pure Moroccan tradition... taking care to add his personal touch and a hint of culinary creativity. The dishes we enjoyed were exquisite and unpretentious. Truly, a little Eden to discover for true connoisseurs of cuisine and extraordinary atmosphere. BRAVO SAMIR from a pure-bred Quebecois and a Morroco-Québecoise who really enjoyed their stay with you!
Very tasty, large portions, you can pay by card, prices are high. I recommend
Gorgeous flavours and presentation. Lovely service.

For a second time on our trip to Danang, we went to eat at Bladi. It was a must! The warm welcome from Sam and his wife, the food was exquisite, the wine excellent, everything was perfect. I recommend this restaurant without hesitation. 😍

Dining here was an absolute delight! From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with warmth, making us feel right at home. The highlight? Our waiter, who was also the chef, had exceptional hospitality, and his passion for the cuisine shone through.

Every dish was a masterpiece, bursting with rich flavors and authentic spices. The salmon, the  carrot salad was refreshing, the eggplant dish was perfectly seasoned, and the couscous was light and fluffy.

This restaurant is a true gem in Da Nang with amazing food, incredible service, and an atmosphere that transports you straight to Morocco. Can’t wait to come back!
Great address.... Sam the owner treated us, we ate very well in a very good atmosphere, a warm welcome and service, I recommend!
Great restaurant, great food, and everything fresh. Very friendly chef. We'll be back.
All the food tasted insanely good. I feel full and so satisfied, the service was so nice and the decor is gorgeous, will visit again ☺️

If you're not looking for Asian food in Da Nang, you should definitely visit this place. We had Moroccan food, which was absolutely delicious.
The owner was incredibly nice. We felt very comfortable. Thanks again for this lovely evening.

I flew from Europe to Vietnam and was craving Arabic food. I searched for "halal restaurant Da Nang" on TikTok and found Bladi.

The food was a-ma-zing, the service was superb! Anyone looking for delicious food, this is the place!

A very colorful island of Morocco in Vietnam. Nice atmosphere, design and music. Exquisite and unusual dishes that are different from the usual everyday dishes. This is just a gastronomic tour of Morocco. Very tasty dishes, good presentation. You can pay by card and there is parking. I recommend

These dishes... INDESCRIPTION! The atmosphere is amazing🫠
Every bite is a feast, every spice is just right. A must-visit place in Da Nang. Vegetarian options are also available👏🏼

We found this place by accident, but it turned out to be an amazing culinary experience! Every dish is thoughtfully prepared with incredible attention to detail, and the flavors are absolutely outstanding. It’s clear that the food is made with passion and a commitment to high-quality ingredients.
We highly recommend it to everyone!

Amazing food! The dishes are full of flavor and give a real taste of Moroccan cuisine. Everything is fresh and well-prepared. The restaurant has a nice atmosphere, and the staff is friendly. A great place to enjoy delicious food and a special experience! DZIEKUJE
Something amazing. An unexpected yet essential journey for anyone curious about the world. Professionalism and excellence in every aspect.

Bladi is truly a hidden gem in Da Nang! From the moment we walked in, the warm ambiance and friendly staff made us feel welcome. The food was absolutely delicious. every dish was full of flavor, fresh, and beautifully presented.

An Unforgettable Culinary Journey!

We had dinner last night at Bladi, a Moroccan restaurant with a warm and intimate atmosphere. We were a table of 10 and were truly impressed by the seamless service and the outstanding quality of the dishes.

We shared several plates, each offering an explosion of flavors:

Sardine ceviche

Tabbouleh

Fish tartare

Artichoke salad

Briwats

Hummus

Beef tajines

Special mention to the briwats, which truly transported me to the other side of the world! Every bite was an absolute delight.

Finally, a huge thank you to Sam, the Owner, for his warm welcome and exceptional hospitality. His attention to detail made our experience even more enjoyable.

A restaurant I wholeheartedly recommend for an authentic and memorable gastronomic journey !

My best culinary experience in Vietnam: the perfection and finesse of the dishes are simply excellent!
I recommend you try this Moroccan restaurant because it represents Moroccan culinary culture in a very authentic way. Being Moroccan myself, I was pleasantly surprised by the diversity of dishes it offers and their harmonious flavors.
I personally tried almost every dish, having been here five times alone and with friends, and my friends really enjoyed it!
As for the service, you are served with great care by very kind and attentive staff.
The restaurant has a typical Moroccan decor that takes you from Vietnam to Morocco upon entering!
A very warm and friendly atmosphere, which I really liked.
And as for the owner of the restaurant, he is a very courageous man, full of good values and kindness, with great determination.
A Moroccan from France who opened his restaurant in Vietnam. Frankly, you have to respect him and his cuisine, which did not leave me indifferent. I am very satisfied and I will come back!
Thank you again for everything.

Perhaps the best meal we've had in our 2 months in Danang. The level of care, artistry and thoughtfulness in each dish was intentional and impressive. Harmonious flavor combinations and a stunning ambiance warrants a return visit soon! Thank you!
Food that you served me made me sick, shame on you guys.  So many fake reviews.

The food was amazing! 100% recommend! Food tasted even better than it looked! Owner and staff were extremely friendly and attentive to our needs, gave great suggestions and just made out experience so much better!
Bad treatment and arrogance. All the restaurants in Da Nang had excellent treatment except this one, which was strange, to be honest.

The dishes were delicious and made with love! Special mention goes to the briwats and tagine. The welcome and service were warm and friendly. The owner is very friendly; he gave us great advice, and we had a great chat!
We'll be back with pleasure! :)
Bad in every respect

Delicious!  Quite a treat to find Moroccan food in Da Nang!  We had a tajine with lamb shank and figs that was wonderful.  I love Vietnamese cuisine, but sometimes I want to mix it up and have something different.  I’m so glad we found this place.  We’ll be back!
My other review was taken down so fast hah. I asked the most maroccon food and she gave me 2 options. Food didn't taste fresh and gave me toilet visits. Not nice thing to do lady

This is the story of a French Moroccan who came to open his restaurant 10,000 km from home, and it's definitely worth the trip! The welcome is incredible, he, his wife, and his team are adorable!! And the food is delicious ❤️ You'll find classic Moroccan and Mediterranean dishes.

And honestly, in Vietnam, it's nice to get away from rice and come home 😍😍

It really moved me.
Thanks again for everything 🙏🏽

Lovely restaurant where you can enjoy Moroccan specialties. Everything is homemade, it's delicious. The owner and his wife are charming and very attentive. Very warm welcome, we just want to come back often

The place is fascinating, the food was perfect
I would totally recommend it for halal Moroccan cuisine
The owner is very friendly and hospitable

would highly recommend! service was fantastic, waitress suggested a few items on the menu for us to try. The pineapple tabbouleh and the chicken briwats were to die for. We also ordered the lamb shank, the flavor wasn’t really my thing but you could just tell it was a wonderfully well executed dish.
Fantastic food in a fantastic atmosphere and with an extremely friendly owner. If you haven't been to this restaurant, you've definitely missed something.

Everything was really good , the service the food , the owner and his kindness
It was the best food experience for us in Vietnam
Thank you so much samir 🙏🏼
It was my first time trying Moroccan food, but the atmosphere and food were delicious. The owner was also very friendly.
The pizza is good, tasty pizza, we ordered humos and it was very tasty.

The dishes were simply delicious, with quality products and beautiful presentation. The staff were very attentive, friendly and attentive. Special mention to the owner, who gave us a warm and friendly welcome. A restaurant where you feel good and where you can't wait to come back. I recommend without hesitation!
Great food, really nice to have something different. Our second visit, and we'll be back!
The most delicious Moroccan food I have ever eaten. The food is cooked fresh ,The chef cooks food with love He was very kindly . I thank him very much.

I'm living in Da Nang for a month,
and this restaurant is right in front of my house,
so I went back and forth every day and finally visited.
Mediterranean, Halal dishes,
and I didn't know much about them, so I ordered after receiving recommendations.

The food is very clean and very healthy,
the spices have a subtle scent,
and they go so well with the food,
so even people like me who can't eat spices can enjoy it.

The restaurant atmosphere is also very nice,
and the foreign chef and staff (is it the owner's wife?)
are very kind,
and they speak English very well.

However, the price range is 200,000 ~ 400,000 dong,
so it's not cheap,
so it's a bit burdensome to visit often.
I paid about 700,000 dong for 2 dishes and a drink.
Distinguished

I found a delicious and relaxing restaurant on a narrow street near Dragon Bridge.
The store's goods and design are very stylish and relaxing with textiles.
It was my first time to try Moroccan food, but everything was so delicious that I was surprised!
The food was spicy but easy to eat, and my husband and children, who usually don't like herbs or strong scents, praised it highly.
The restaurant is run by a married couple, and both are friendly and give detailed explanations of the dishes and accurate recommendations.
I highly recommend all the dishes! The wine goes well with it!
Even if you drink a bottle of wine, it's reasonably priced and you'll be full! ! ! ! I definitely want to go again! If I come to Da Nang, I'll definitely come again (^^)

Very nice restaurant! Perfect if you fancy a change from the local food.
Food was delicious and the owner is very friendly and welcoming.

I visited Bladi Restaurant twice during my stay in Da Nang, and I must say, this is authentic Moroccan cuisine at its finest. What made the experience even more special was the owner, Sam. His hospitality, charisma, and humor truly made us feel at home. You can sense his passion for food and his dedication to ensuring every guest has a memorable time. Don’t miss the chance to visit this place when you’re in Da Nang!

A beautiful and peaceful Moroccan restaurant! The food is very delicious, with authentic flavors. The owner is incredibly kind and welcoming, making the experience even better. Must visit if you are in Da Nang

The last time I was here was 2 years ago. And so, she came again yesterday. I am very glad that after 2 years the quality and portions of food are still pleasing. For tartar lovers, I highly recommend beef tartar🤤 And the soups are delicious. The environment is clean, beautiful and a pleasure to be in. The background music is also wonderful, not the same - as everywhere else, but thematic, with oriental notes. I wish the establishment good luck and recommend everyone to try the dishes here, originally from northwest Africa 💫🙌🏽
Super tasty thanks 🙏 , I definitely recommend visiting this establishment …
Very tasty and great service

Unfortunately, it was an unsuccessful experience and a failed choice of restaurant
Despite the comments that talk about the treatment of the employees, I believe that one employee is everything, because the restaurant is small, the reception was very cold and he insisted on us sitting outside even though there was no one inside.
We left the restaurant for another restaurant and never returned
Beautiful restaurant, great service and lovely food. Thank you Sam.
The food and service are amazing. Can’t recommend enough.

Because this time I went to Danang with my Muslim friends (I was the only Christian in the group) so I had to find a HALAL place to eat. Well, this is one of the Halal places to eat in the Da Nang area if you are bored with Malay or Indian food. I have personally been to Danang several times, and when I go to Danang I usually go to local restaurants or any restaurant. So this time I accompanied my friend to eat at this restaurant. In terms of place, it's like a house that has been converted into a restaurant. The decoration is nice. 

In terms of food prices, for Vietnamese standards, it is actually expensive. In terms of portions (usually food in Vietnam, on average has large portions. Can feed 2 people with 1 side dish) but maybe because the owner is not Vietnamese and on average the eaters are foreigners so the portions are adjusted a bit small in my opinion. 

Moving on to the taste, the taste is definitely authentic because the cook is from the local area of the restaurant. But for me personally and my friends, the taste of the food did not suit our tongues. One of the foods that was in a pineapple, I thought it was rice and shrimp, but it turned out not to be. Hahahahaha… we spent almost 900 thousand VND.

But the owner and the waiter there were very friendly. At least they smiled and greeted us nicely.

A restaurant that serves Moroccan cuisine in a professional manner.
The Moroccan chef is truly an artist.
Our orders were:
Pumpkin soup
Kofta tagine
Lamb tagine
Briouats
The food was delicious.
I hope there are Arabic restaurants in Da Nang that are at the same level.
I will try it again, God willing, and I highly recommend it.

We hadn't been here in several years. So happy we gave it a second try. Very 'happy food': beautiful to look at, good taste and warm-hearted setting and decorations.

The owner and chef clearly knows his flavours. The proof is in his exquisite fish brandade 👌
Amazing food and amazing owner too. That was probably the best pizza I had in vietnam

It's very surprising to find such good couscous in Vietnam's fourth largest city, but it's true. The couscous is delicious and very generously served (you have to be hungry)!
The place is very welcoming, as is the staff. The owner speaks French and takes the time to make sure everything goes smoothly for you.
I highly recommend it!
The food is so good! I have eaten here twice and tried two different Moroccan tajines as well as Moroccan tea, and it's delicious. (Wa ka marocci ana ngol likom dakchi nadi kanadi)

A great atmosphere, very good Moroccan cuisine.
The best since we've been living in Asia.

So, we went back during our short stay in Da Nang. :-)

Thanks, Sam, for this great time.

Love love loved it! Everything was so delicious, so fresh, and the pineapple Tabouleh oh my God amazing! Chef was very attentive and recommended beautiful dishes.
Can’t wait to be back again!
Everything was perfect!
Very cute and warm restaurant . Great place for catch up with friends and enjoy great food .

The receptionist's behavior is not good and the food is very ordinary. I ordered the meat tagine, salmon salad and harira. The food is very ordinary. I prefer the harira. The price is exaggerated. The place is isolated on a street inside the neighborhood and the furniture is less than average.

Probably the best Halal restaurant in Da Nang. We found this gem of a place when looking for hummus. We ended up having Sameer’s
Halal burger as well and returning the next day to have excellent couscous for dinner. Great food, nice ambience and owner is very friendly and entertaining. Highly recommended.
Great Moroccan  halal food you have to taste the tajeen👌🏻

Couscous is very very good like in the countryside
And it’s the same for the chicken tagine
A real chef 🇲🇦🇩🇿
Nice place traditional moroccan,food good,service best🤗
Delicious halal Moroccan restaurant

Amazing food and lovely owners. As a Moroccan living in Danang, I can guarantee that the taste is the same that you can find in Morocco. So happy to find my new routine place in Danang 🥰. My favourite ones are the Briwates and the Harira soup😍😍😍 Can't go back often to my hometown but I can go to Bladi often🥳✈️

Just saying but the Chef worked for Gordon Ramsay in UK, so no doubt the about the talent👏🏻
Cannot recommend enough. Delicious Moroccan food. Excellent service from the owner. I had lamb tagine and some Moroccan ‘cigar’ dessert which was so good.
A very relaxig place with great good. Vegetarian options on the menu too. Great place for a slow dinner. Ask for mint Moroccan tea and enjoy the moon watching on the terrace.

If you're in Da Nang and craving a culinary adventure, look no further than this hidden Moroccan gem!

The cuisine is nothing short of spectacular, each dish is a vibrant tapestry of flavors. And what truly sets this restaurant apart is the owner, Samir. He takes the time to engage with guests, and gives excellent recommendations. His passion for food is evident in every artistry plate that leaves the kitchen.

This restaurant is a delightful culinary journey that will leave your taste buds dancing! A must try!
The best food u can eat in Danang ..
Very generous and tasty, proper Moroccan flavours and service.

If you have been traveling in Vietnam for quite a while and become tired of eating traditional Vietnamese foods just like me, I would definitely recommend to you Bladi, Morrocan cuisine, located in Danang. Unlike other popular restaurants, …

What a fantastic dining experience made all the better by our wonderful host Samir. His knowledge and enthusiasm for French Moroccan cuisine was a delight and his recommendations were outstanding. A truly faultless and memorable dinner that we shall remember for many years to come.

We would like to thank Samir and his wife for an incredibly special evening.
The food was exquisite and truly exceptional and the portions were also more than generous, leaving us completely satisfied. …
Nice place to visit.

We had an amazing experience at this Moroccan restaurant! The flavors were absolutely incredible, with generous portions that made every dish a delight. The decor and ambiance transported us straight to Morocco, creating a warm and inviting …

A ray of hope!

A truly unique restaurant in Da Nang. …

My son invited me to a farewell dinner at Bladi. Atmospheric and very cozy place! Delicious dishes, wine and desserts! Very attentive, hospitable owner, for which special thanks to him. I recommend everyone to visit this restaurant and enjoy delicious and healthy food) with excellent service👌 …

What a night we had at Bladi! We had a group of 10 and after speaking with the owner Sam, we did a bunch of sharing dishes. Not only was the food high quality and delicious, but we left completely full. The atmosphere is beautiful and you …

My boyfriend and I dined at this restaurant twice during our stay—once for lunch and once for dinner. On both occasions, the experience was exceptional. The owner went out of his way to prepare a special vegetarian dish for me, and it was …

After exploring countless highly recommended places across Vietnam, we found that many popular spots, while good, often feel busy and lacking in personal care. Despite all my research, it's rare to stumble upon a dining experience that …

I hesitate to divulge this little oasis, lest I'm forced to compete for its five coveted tables. Yet, I cannot conscionably keep such a gem to myself.
The owner is driven by passion, not profit. He brings to Danang his many years …

From where should I start? As a moroccan traveling a bit around some countries I always look for a moroccan restaurant to enjoy tastes of my country in different parts of the world but Bladi was really wayyyy beyond my expectations.. …

After four days of eating Vietnamese food, I wanted to try something different, so I visited here.
The owner was so friendly, and the restaurant was beautiful! …

1000% recommend this place if you come to Da Nang! The chef was very kind and professional, i took his recommendation and it was 100% the right choice! I’d come back to Da Nang just for this restaurant!

Fabulous food from a friendly and attentive staff. The atmosphere is cozy and comfortable too, chef recommendations were amazing, do yourself a favor and come here at least once while you are in Da Nang! I am coming back for more lamb :D …
The owner and chef Samir is an absolute delight and the burger was delicious with so many complimentary flavors a must try when in Da Nang! …
Moroccan food done right. Recommend 100%. The owner is working there himself, controls everything to perfection. Try briwats, they are just amazing
Delicious Mediterranean food, healthy and savory. The chef is friendly and obviously loves his craft. I recommend the chicken & olive slow cooked dish.

Mashalla, every aspect of this restaurant was an ultimate surprise! Chef Samir and his friendly staff were gems. The food was extremely flavorful , unique and wonderful.
Hands down, my favorite restaurant in Da Nang so far without any hesitation.

Thank you Bladi team for such a pleasant experience!
Chef sam was amazing the food also tastes amazing and unique definitely recommend you visit this place
The food was beautifully presented and tasted delicious. I highly recommend it!
The food was excellent and the staff very pleasant and helpful

As a Moroccan, I can say that this restaurant in Da Nang is a real find! The flavors are as authentic as at home, and the service is exceptional. It's a little piece of Morocco in Vietnam, a true joy! Thank you Sam!
Very good restaurant, perfect welcome, delicious dishes with very good quantities, Thank you for everything 🥰

It was a wonderful experience at My Country Restaurant Da Nang.
The dishes were varied, delicious, and exceptional.
We found excellence in every dish, and the combination of flavors was amazing and unique.
The overall atmosphere of the restaurant is amazing, and the staff works in amazing harmony.
Thanks to Chef Samir and his distinguished staff. It was a unique experience. We spoke with the chef about various topics, and we were pleased to learn that the person running this project has a wonderful charisma and a distinct, conscientious mind.

The place is worth a visit and deserves an excellent rating for the quality of service, the delicious food, the unique presentation, and the wonderful atmosphere.

Thank you, Samir, and thank you to the entire staff.

Your guests from the Sultanate of Oman 🇴🇲

Our experience at Bladi was fantastic. The chef recommended us some dishes that all exceeded our expectations. The restaurant has a cozy Moroccan atmosphere, and the staff was great. Definitely recommended!
We didn’t expect it would be this wonderful. The best Moroccan food in Vietnam (for me). Highly recommended

Very cosy and warm atmosphere in this place. Owner helped to choose really delicious food. Rain and great welcome from the owner made this evening special. Tried Marocain Rose wine first time in my life. Enjoyed place and company.
The food was excellent, special mention for the hummus, it was delicious, the owner is adorable and made us feel very welcome, our children loved it and so did we. We recommend it 100%.
A haven of peace! The food is excellent and Samir is golden! A must-see.
Samir was great, super helpful, available, kind and friendly. The food is excellent, the atmosphere is family and welcoming. Thank you for everything and see you soon.

I have been customer for many years when i was in Danang, came back on holiday and went for dinner to a beautiful intimate restaurant own by one of the most passionate chef owner i have known, food is top notch, if you want the couscous and I strongly advise you to, make sure to contact them via facebook with 24h notice, we had the lamb tagine and the grilled salmon  packed with flavors and ended the meal with delicious creps! Overall an amazing experience at a more than reasonable pricing! Special shout out to the chef owner Sami who is a beast, works 15h a day, does absolutely everything there so please if you go there make sure to enter this great restaurant with a smile and respect for this talented chef owner🙏

This was such an incredible dining experience, the host was very lovely and suggestion the meatball tajine whicj i was a little unsure about but it was spectacular. The rest of the table had chicken olive, lamb and fig tajines and the birwat all which were absolutely superb. I would go to De nang again just to have this food. We have been to Morocco as well but the flavour and the ingredients in this tajine was better than anything we had in Morocco. I wanted to eat here every night! To top it off the mint tea which the kind regular on the table next to us shared was incredible. I never ever give any place a 5 star review but this place absolutely deserves it. I would give 10 stars if I could.

The food here was incredible (better than anything else we ate on our trip in Vietnam and even better than any food I had while actually in Morocco). The service was top tier and the atmosphere was great. The restaurant host was very friendly and recommended some great dishes, all I can say is if you’re not sure about something on the menu it’s probably good and take the hosts advice if he recommends a dish, you won’t be disappointed. (He recommended the Briwat and we ended up ordering a second plate because they were so good).
Sooooo delicious food! Lovely atmosphere! And the owner is very nice! We'll be happy to come back!
Come here with your eyes closed. The place is charming, the food is excellent, and the service is top-notch. Friendly staff.

Being of Moroccan origin, our experience at the restaurant was simply incredible!
Perfect briwats, a truly exceptional kefta tagine, and a beef tagine with prunes that was also magnificent!!
The owner was very friendly and welcoming. We were able to chat with him a lot, which created a wonderful atmosphere throughout the meal. A big thank you to him for his kindness and his amazing dishes!

Best food experience ever, the place is cozy and well decorated, the food is beyond magnificent it is balanced and flavory. The service is excellent the chief serves the food him self, he is welcoming and nice person.

5/5. Can be highly recommended. Super delicious food, nothing to put a finger on. The owner is simply so sweet. It has been ensured that there are cold drinks with ice. The food also arrives at the same time. Probably the best pizza I've had in Vietnam so far
The food is superb, and the owner is very warm and welcoming. What a lovely place! Highly recommend checking it out.

A friend and I went to Bladi for dinner the other night and I honestly would rate it more than 5 stars if I could. The food was absolutely delicious, everything was made from scratch and made with love. To top it off the owner was an absolute gem! He made us laugh so much that our cheeks were burning! He gave us great recommendations for others places whilst we’re on holiday here!
Thank you for a wonderful night! (Ps we got our teeth cleaned 😉)

I am Moroccan and I missed Moroccan food immensely. When I visited Danang, two of my friends recommended this place. I decided to try it, and I was thoroughly satisfied. The food tasted just like it does at home in Morocco – it was so delicious that it felt like I was teleported back to Morocco during the meal. I highly recommend this place, and I'm not easily satisfied. The owner was fantastic, ensuring everything was perfect and that I enjoyed my meal. If you're in Danang, don't hesitate to visit. Chokran bzf Ssi Samir.
The food is good, the place is very authentic, worthy of Morocco, I highly recommend! And without forgetting the very friendly manager :)

Really good Moroccan cuisine, we were really happy to find a Moroccan restaurant here in Vietnam, and what surprise the quality is really good. The cuisine is really tasty, we can see that Samir the owner is a passionate, and we felt it on our plates ! Simply lovely place I recommend 100%
Very good place to eat a tagine or couscous, I come regularly
Great food and service by chef! The hummus was excellent.

Intimate setting. The soup is hearty, comforting, and delicious. Kafta was well executed, served with a perfectly balanced tomato sauce. Beautiful homemade bread. Nice touch of butter in the couscous. Portions are generous. This place is perfect for a date night, where you go to get treated with upmost care.

We traveled to Danang for only 4 days, visiting Bladi based on a friend's recommendation and the good reviews on Google. Despite our high expectations, Chef Samir, aka the owner, did not fail to meet the high standard. Having visited many Michelin-starred and Asia’s Top 50 restaurants, we can confidently say that the food at Bladi can compete with those, yet is much more affordable.

We had Chef Sam recommend dishes to us, and here we go the detailed comments on each dish:

Briwats (10/10!!!)
- It is stuffed with chicken and other savory fillings, a bite-sized appetizer perfectly fried to a golden crisp (not oily at all!). I'm not sure if this is the typical recipe, but the icing sugar on top is definitely a game-changer, making the savory dish super interesting.

Denjan Pastilla  (10/10!!!)
- Since I mentioned my love for eggplant, Chef Sam recommended this dish to us. I truly loved how he sliced the eggplant into thin layers, covering minced mushroom, lamb, raisins, feta cheese, and other flavorful ingredients. The combination elevated both taste and texture. As an eggplant lover, we finished the dish in 3 minutes!

Kefta Tagine (9/10)
- The lamb meatball is soft, juicy, and flavorful. Baked with mechoiua sauce, tomatoes, and runny eggs, this dish is a bread-killer! However, the most amazing part is their homemade Moroccan bread – freshly baked, hot, crispy on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside. The dough smells amazing and pairs perfectly with the Kefta. The reason I give it a 9/10 is that I wish there were four meatballs… I want more! :(

Crème Brûlée (8/10)
- This special version is peanut butter and dark chocolate flavored. Nothing overpowers the other, and it is not overly sweet either.

The place is cozy and clean, the food is fresh and tasty, and the host is warm and friendly. We had a truly satisfying dinner here and would definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone seeking a good meal. =]

Again, much appreciation to Chef Sam for all your efforts in preparing this menu and excellent food. Hope to visit again very soon!

It's been a really long time since I've eaten such a good meal. Passion, generosity, know-how. I can only recommend it and especially add it to my list of my favorite restaurants in Da Nang. Thank you Samir and the love you give through your dishes. Chris
If you like Mediterranean food, you will love this place 👍

I followed the online review to come here, and it hasn't disappointed.  The chef and I believe he is also the owner was very attentive and recommended items to try.  He also frequently checked on me to ensure everything was fine even though there was other guests at the restaurant.  Highly recommended to anyone who would like to try something different to check out this place!

Samir made our dining experience unforgettably fantastic! He gave us several tips and insights into the menu and guided our selection to curate the most phenomenal meal. All the reviews you read about how charming and welcoming he is certainly live up to the hype, and the food is so delicious that we couldn’t stop raving about it for the rest of the night. We ordered the hummus, the morocan briwats, and the marrakech pizza—each item was to die for! We can’t wait to come back.

Incredible place with incredible food. Pizzas better than italian. Marocco kufta was in harmony with tomato sous. We were 10 days in Vietnam but this restaurant was best we have been. Samir is also incredibly person can advice you what to try.

The place is very cozy, the chef who is also the boss has a very good taste (and is very friendly) and he uses it in his dishes!
The dishes are very well presented with the Arabic flavours, so I can only recommend the restaurant!

I passed by a Moroccan restaurant by accident. The decoration with carpets, flowers and lights was very beautiful and atmospheric, and the owner was also very hospitable and friendly.
The meals are freshly prepared and have a homely and warm feel. The hummus is very fragrant and flavorful with the spices, and it goes very well with bread. The stewed chicken is super soft and literally melts in your mouth.

Moroccan restaurant. Halal friendly.

Fantastic food and service. Small establishment so do make reservations.

Had Fish Brandade,. Meatballs and Chicken. All fabulous. And the bread that was served with each course, soooo good.

A friendly, welcoming place away from the noise, with excellent dishes that take us on a journey.
Warm welcome and friendly staff.

Amazing food and very warm welcoming chef!
Lovely dinner experience.
Food are amazing.
Delicious food, welcoming atmosphere and lovely people running the restaurant. We'll definitely be back every time we're passing through. 🙏🏻

Since we've spent two weeks in Vietnam, we were craving something other than the delicious Vietnamese food.
During our search, we came across this restaurant and were more than satisfied!
We followed the owner's recommendation for the food and were very happy with the taste!

The service was top-notch👍 and we hit it off right away. The owner is friendly and funny!

All I can say is: Stay the way you are!
I wish you lots of friendly customers.
Remember, you always meet twice, so I say... see you next time!

5 stars well deserved!
I went here 2 days in a row because i just loved everything about the place :)
Great food, friendly boss, good vibes!
Really hospitable owner and excellent food 👌

Great hospitality, delicious foods!
Thanks Chef

Samir! The guy is the restaurant owner and which everyone knew from google map comments. As I read the reviews from google maps, I already have a high expectation on him and his team. They did not disappoint.

My mum and I was like any other tourists in Da Nang, fed up with Banh M. We decided to give this Moroccan restaurant a go. Samir greeted us well and introduced his signature dishes. Emphasised no rush in picking what we want. Can finish a dish before ordering another so to make sure the portion is just right for our stomachs.

One of the best dishes was the lamb meatballs. It was served in a Kefta (not sure it was spelled this way). The aroma from the tomato sauce and the spice found its way into our nostrils after the beautiful Kefta lid was opened. The sauce was truly remarkable. It was so intense and sweet. I reckon it was made from dried or pulped tomatoes. Well-done!

Samir told me he was attacked by Israelites online. The reason being he put on an Palestinian flag in his restaurant next to his beautiful Moroccan flag. He explained he would like to support his fellow muslims. I am no muslim myself but I think hate speech should be banned in restaurant reviews. We are all there for the food, right? Not HATE! Please kindly stop the hatred and make food connect us. Thank YOU ALL!
We came here with no expectations, and we ended up with a nice moment with the chef and its delicious food full of flavours. I would recommend this place to anyone coming by Da Nang. Merci encore.

Couldn't get the opportunity to taste their food as the owners misbehavior just pulled us to come out from the restaurant.
He is so so rude, attitude so bad.
We are tourists and will not be there to eat everyday. So one misbehavior can ruin our whole day, and he just did so.
We went there as a muslim halal restaurant but due to his behaviour we have to choose another option and that was Istanbul Anatolian Kebab Restaurant. That was really good, we enjoyed our dinner there finally.

I had this place recommend by a Moroccan friend. And was not disappointed. The food was very fresh and tasted amazing. And the staff was super accommodating to my picky friend and went beyond to make her dinner a pleasant experience.
I would recommend the eggplant caviar, tagine and of course the Moroccan mint tea!
I love this place. It is my cantine! Sam and Tao, the owners, are lovely people. Dishes are succulent. Go there with your eyes closed.

This is an awesome place that I will recommend for all of my foreign friend. The boss is also the chef and he is taking well care of our meeting. The food and the wine is really perfect. Don't believe in some bad review under me. That's all fake and they haven't come to the restaurant. Believe me and give a try❤️

Dear Sam,

A huge thank you for your warm welcome at your restaurant! We spent a birthday party in a truly exquisite Moroccan setting. As for the dishes we tasted, they were simply delicious. It was a first for each of us to taste Moroccan cuisine, and it was a wonderful discovery.

The hummus, the briwats, and the lamb tagine were all delicious, and what can I say about the chocolate crème brûlée? Yum! Yum!

Luckily, you guided us in our choices because we wouldn't have known what to choose. Your passion for your work and Moroccan cuisine shines through in the welcome you gave us and in every dish we ate.

Thank you again for your hospitality, and we will definitely be back on our next trip.

Joanne Caron 😊
Quebec, Canada

An additional note: While browsing the reviews on Google Business Profile, I noticed some derogatory and clearly inappropriate comments.

Inspiring Experience at Bladi: A Culinary and Personal Highlight

I had the pleasure of visiting Bladi Restaurant, and my experience was simply fantastic. The restaurant is beautifully designed and exudes a welcoming atmosphere that invites you to linger.
We both opted for a burger, and I have to say, it was truly delicious. The quality of the ingredients and preparation were top-notch, and every bite was a delight. What truly made my experience special, however, were the conversations we had with the owner afterward. His story and commitment to opening this restaurant were extremely inspiring and demonstrate true passion and dedication. I have great respect for his courage and determination💪

It was a pleasure meeting you.
This personal touch made my visit to Bladi an unforgettable experience.

In conclusion, I would like to say that I highly recommend Bladi to anyone who appreciates not only great food, but also a warm atmosphere and inspiring stories.

Thank you for this wonderful experience! Best regards, A firefighter from Germany 🚒

First of all, I want to clarify that I’m not Moroccan, so Moroccan cuisine is not my mother’s cuisine. However, I’m an enthusiast of it, and I’ve eaten hundreds of tajines, couscous dishes, pastillas, bowls of harira, and briouats. So what I’m writing here is my personal opinion, supported by a lot of experience.

In the Bladi restaurant, we ordered a chicken tajine. I must say, the only thing that resembled authentic Moroccan cuisine was the fact that it was slowly cooked in a pot and served in a clay dish. Apart from that, I didn’t feel any of the elements that make Moroccan tajine special: cumin (which is used so abundantly in Morocco that you can even find it on your restaurant’s dining table to season your dish if needed), cinnamon (which adds sweetness to the dish), dried ginger powder, and last but not least, preserved lemon. This is what you would typically get when you dine in Marrakech, Essaouira, or Agadir.

On the other hand, what we received at Bladi was just slowly stewed chicken with a few olives, and that’s it. It lacked the authentic taste of Morocco. It’s a shame…
Really good food. But more than that it was a wonderful experience. If you find yourself nearby, Bladi is a great place to stop by.

As my wife and I stepped into Bladi to celebrate our anniversary, we had high hopes for an extraordinary evening. Little did we know that our experience would surpass all expectations, creating a memory that would be etched in our hearts forever.

Our evening began with a warm welcome from the owner himself, who took us to our beautifully set table. We were immediately struck by the fragrant aroma of exotic spices that wafted from the open kitchen. The ambiance was set, and our senses were already tingling with anticipation.

Now, let's talk about the star of the evening: the food. The cuisine at Bladi was unlike anything we had ever experienced. Every dish was a symphony of flavors and colors that danced on our taste buds.

One particular highlight was the briwats. They were both savory and sweet, unlike anything I had tasted before. They had a depth of flavor that left us craving more. The presentation of each dish was also a work of art, with vibrant colors and intricate patterns that showcased the culinary skill of the chef.

Speaking of the chef (the owner), we were absolutely touched by his generosity. He surprised us with a stunning bouquet of flowers. They absolutely added an extra layer of romance to our celebration. What made it even more special was that he didn’t charge us a single penny for it. It was a heartfelt gesture that truly made our anniversary unforgettable.

The service throughout the evening was impeccable. The chef was knowledgeable about the menu, offering well thought out recommendations. He was attentive without being intrusive, making us feel like honored guests in his kingdom.

To top it all off, we ended our evening with a decadent dessert that was the perfect finale. I highly recommend the rose crepes, a new addition to the menu. They are unlike anything I have tasted before.

Our anniversary celebration at Bladi was nothing short of magical. The combination of exquisite Moroccan cuisine, a charming ambiance, and the chef's thoughtful gestures made it an evening we will cherish forever. If you're looking for a unique and unforgettable dining experience, look no further than Bladi. We can't wait to return in the near future. Thank you for going above and beyond, and for making our anniversary truly extraordinary!

This place is a MUST if you are in Da Nang. It was my partners birthday and I wanted somewhere special for dinner and Bladi restaurant did not disappoint!
