The Vietnamese pho was excellent! The service was great especially Trang
We came here several times during our trip in Danang. The pho is well priced and tastes good.
Nice restaurant
Enthusiastic and lovely staff.
Good taste,and good service as well. Recommend!
Delicious pho, fast service and very friendly service. I recommend it.
I liked it, it was delicious
Very good, enthusiastic service
Tasty pho and nice staff
Rice Wine Good!!!
Delicious. Just go and try the rare beef pho
delicious food at reasonable prices
Pho is sosoosos good
Delicious, highly recommend. Good price and good quality food. Love the Pho soup 🫶
Chilli + Vegetable  🤩 good taste but some chicken is too hard to eat …
So delicious! Perfectly cooked, super tasty, very friendly. We will be back!
it was so delicious
Super yummy and lovely service. Highly recommend
Delicious Pho 🍜 …
The most delicious rice noodle restaurant in Da Nang~ Highly recommended!!!
Staff and owner are very enthusiastic. 10 points for service
The rice noodles are delicious~ Even picky kids enjoyed them~ They're the best
Nice staff. Pho was actually very fresh. Noodles were good. Great place for foreigners
PHO IS DELICIOUS. FRIENDLY WAITRESS. GOOD SERVICE. WE WILL COME BACK
Very good cafe, I recommend it to everyone
Good taste
Polished my bowl, simply delicious!
Good service, friendly owner, good food, sweet and soft beef
Was great flavour friendly staff and the cost was amazingly cheap

Maybe the only authentic place around without suspicious reviews. We went here for excellent pho (rare beef) at a great price (45-65k VND). Food includes chili, lime, herbs. Thank you for the fantastic soup that warmed our hearts :)
The restaurant is ok and fun, everyone
I ordered the super special pho and it was deserved. Full toppings, big size, served in a golden bowl and special cutlery. The staff is very friendly. Highly recommend

I ordered Pho Ga which is chicken. They served with vegetable,lime and we can add garlic in vineagar and chilli.
Soup is mild taste and delicious.

It's very cheap. It's about 1.5 USD.

Staff is very nice.
World class pho! And really nice owner of the restaurant!

The restaurant makes very good food. Enthusiastic service
Worth trying and experiencing
Excellent

This is a pho shop that I happened to stumble upon while traveling.
The restaurant has a bit of a local atmosphere, but I don't think there will be any issues with hygiene. …

Good beef and chicken pho with

fried rice
Food is delicious
Food was good according to the taste kf nepal and india.
delicious pho tai lan! Great service
Nice service. You can have good pho all day and night 24 hr. They have cute puppy name 'meow'. I love this place.
Nice place to for a quick place to eat, clean and simple.
Awesome Pho

The restaurant space is beautiful, airy and cool
The owner is enthusiastic.
Delicious pho, great broth, delicious fried rice. The first time I visited was a surprise. Cheap prices, great dishes.
10/10, great service, lovely staff and a delicious pho. Couldn’t recommend more.
Some of the best pho I’ve had in Vietnam, the guy who runs it was super nice and friendly and told us all about the different types of pho he offers. I will be back again.
Very tasty, cozy, clean.
Great Pho!
Food was great, location perfect right near the beach and so easy to order !
Good times here!
Delicious
Very delicious Good tasty

It was 11 o'clock in the evening on the first day we came to Bengang. When we saw this shop, we walked in to eat. The food was of a very high standard and was authentic Vietnamese food. The waiters were very polite and provided references in Chinese and English!
The food is very delicious, high quality and authentic Vietnamese
Tasty & friendly
Great!
The pho restaurant is very delicious, rich in flavor, better than the restaurants I ate at before in Da Nang, the restaurant is right next to the beach, airy and clean.
The food is quite suitable for me 🥰
The pho here is very delicious, everyone please come support this restaurant 👍
Delicious food, the owner is very nice. Prices around 50-100 baht, open 24 hours, very good.
Went out late at night and came back with a super delicious bowl of dandruff pho
Good portion of nice pho with good quality beef. Large bowl with a beer was 75k, which is a reasonable price.

Have some fried rice. This is a real fried rice restaurant.
If you eat it with a little garlic sauce, it tastes like heaven.
The pho restaurant is clean, the staff is friendly. Pho has a strong Northern flavor and is easy to eat☺️
The pho soup here is the best in Da Nang. The staff is kind, helpful and they try to help the guests in everything! I can recommend it!

Very good pho with different kind of beef (brisket, flank, red wine braised beef).
Service was excellent, very friendly and prices are affordable. Highly recommended ! :)
Great soup! Inexpensive and tasty snack is the best!
We tried this restaurant today and we really liked it. Food was delicious and service was great. We will be back!
Very good traditional food, they treated us very kindly.
Very delicious

Very very delicious😋
I didn't dare to come here after seeing the five-star rating.
But after eating it, it’s really delicious😋
Highly recommended! !
Delicious pho, suitable for taste. Cute staff
Very tasty pho. Reasonable price. Can't recommend it more.
Pho is delicious. Near the beach, my family decided to go with 4 people and everyone said it was delicious. My 2 kids ate everything. The restaurant was very clean and had a lot of food.

Good food with economic price.
Staff are friendly.
Came here 3 times during my trip in Da Nang!
Highly recommend this Pho restaurant 💖
Very good food. Nice service. I recommend💪
Just opposite the beach, the price is relatively affordable. A bowl of extra large beef noodles costs 18rmb. Tastes pretty good too
Super thick and delicious serving
The broth is low-fat, very tasty. Service was quick, it was cleaner than many establishments
Nv Enthusiastically
The pho is very flavorful, clean, and the restaurant is beautifully decorated. Worth a visit, everyone
It's delicious. Prepare fresh, clean and enthusiastic beef

We have a good time dining at the restaurant. The food are and atmosphere are excellent. Do remember to book the table at the rooftop where you could get a view of the river. And of course not forgetting our cute lady waitress, Ms Dung. She has been most helpful in recommending dishes to us. We have such a good time chatting and learning new ingredients from her.
Excellent dinner and dining ambience. Dung’s service is also excellent, making recommendations on what to order.

The meal was delicious. The five spice ingredients can be omitted, but you need to confirm with the staff. After the meal was served, they added the five spice ingredients. I reported this to the staff, who confirmed that the note wasn't clearly stated. They immediately remade the meal and gave us another one. Excellent service!

Remember to choose a table upstairs. 😊😊
Fine dining place.  Long story short,  still ok but little pricy.  Today I spent 1.44 Millions don.

Great rooftop spot.
The food is top-notch 👌
Luat our server was excellent.  Foid was great, the Three layered tofu is so delicious.
Delicious food, friendly and enthusiastic staff, beautiful and cool space, with river view

Pros:
* The rooftop space is spacious and airy, you can watch the fireworks while going to the festival.
* The design has a religious feel, impressive.
* Bill for 4 people \~1.2 million.
* Recommend pandan rice with cheese, stir-fried vermicelli, crispy fried mushrooms - vegetarian dishes but rich in flavor.
* The staff are generally friendly.

Cons:
There was a guy in a black shirt, wearing glasses who answered a bit curtly, which ruined the mood.

👉 Delicious food, beautiful space, I will come back but hope the restaurant improves the staff's attitude.

Flavourful and good vegetarian food. We were seated on the rooftop, which was a lovely surprise with its view of the city night sky. Luat and team were attentive and we really appreciated the service (:

I had a very delicious evening and was served very attentively at Shamballa Da Nang restaurant. Everything was very neat and clean with a great rooftop view. The food was served quickly and was extremely delicious. And thank you Luat, Thuy Dung and Ly Na for taking such good care of me. See you soon, everyone should come and try it.

Very, very delicious food! There were four of us, and we each ordered two dishes, so we tried everything. Everything was excellent and very varied. The breaded and fried mushrooms were fantastic! Highly recommended.

We had one of the best vegetarian food !
Every food was on point .
Soulful food with super friendly staff.
Outstanding service and food = wholesome experience!
Impeccable experience elevate our da nang trip ❤️

Back to Shamballa after 2 years. Things changed but the Shamballa soul stays still. First time here when it was just opened, after 2 years Shamballa rewarded Michelin guide and Shamballa worth it.

Tonight I was served by Dung, the dinner went smoothly with a nice river view. Hope Shamballa can keep improving like this. Will meet Shamballa again soon!
The restaurant is very chill, the waiter named Bao is very enthusiastic. It is worth experiencing the dishes at Shamballa.

Guess it's not my type of restaurant.
High end/foreigner catered vietnamese restaurant. I wouldn't see locals eating here
First time going to a vegan restaurant and the food was lovely. The servers Khoi and Nam were very attentive and helped me with the recommendations. Will be back soon
Very delicious, nice view too. The staff is attentive. Luat and a few others taking care of my table are very cute 😊

Quite pricey for vegetarian food. Nice atmosphere. Not friendly for pure Buddhist diet without onion and garlic (alliums).

Be mindful of the additional VAT and service fee.

I am a traveling plant-based chef specializing in food science and flavorology. Check out my other reviews on Google Maps.
This is my second time back, the food is delicious, well worth 5 stars

The location is excellent, right by the Danang River with beautiful views of the surrounding skyscrapers and their night lights. There are plenty of vegetarian options to choose from. We were served by Tan, who speaks good English and was very helpful in assisting us with the food. We really enjoyed our experience!
Delicious food, good service
Highly recommended for this restaurant the good very good and the staff Bao is so kind and also all staff so kind
Good vegetarian restaurant
Delicious vegetarian food, especially the pumpkin and termite mushroom dish. Luat is a great consultant. I will come back next time.

What a beautiful restaurant. The bamboo door that opens into the restaurant is so interesting. The interior decoration is calming. I had a great server, Hou Quang was attentive, friendly & kind. I would highly recommend this restaurant to all my veggie friends.

The service is amazing ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Quang was outstanding!

The food is creative and fresh, but some mixes felt heavy. For example, one salad combined lettuce, watermelon, cherry tomato, and radish. Another mixed peanuts, fried noodles, mushrooms, and pickled cucumbers. I also tried fried mushrooms with pickled hot pepper and green peppercorns.

Individually, all were tasty, but together the combinations can challenge digestion. As a biohacker, I felt a bit bloated afterward, likely from fruit mixed with heavier foods. Simplifying or separating ingredients could make the dishes lighter and even more energizing.

Overall, a beautiful place with wonderful service — with a touch more attention to food synergy, it could be truly next-level.
Hai Quong was really amazing, very polite and recommended me dishes. Very smiling guy👌
Great vegetarian food with a nice rooftop view. Luat was very helpful!
Amazing experience and really well hoster by Mr.Hai Quang
Had a lovely experience dining at Shamballa for dinner. The dishes were spectacular and delicious. We were served by Quang who was exceptional in his service and was really knowledgeable as well.
The food was really incredible! A lot of choice of vegetarian food. We absolutely loved it! The service was amazing too! Khoi was exceptionally great!

An excellent vegetarian restaurant with tasty, high-quality dishes. Impeccable service, thanks in large part to Tan's professionalism. Prices are slightly higher than the Da Nang average, but justified by the experience.
We recommend dining on the rooftop for the best atmosphere.
Nice vegetarian restaurant in Da Nang even though the ratio price - quantity is a little bit high. Thanks to Tan for explaining us all our orders.
Great vegetarian restaurant with delicious food! Our waitress Tan was very friendly and attentive, which made the experience even better. Highly recommend!

Found this restaurant in the Michelin guide, located at a rooftop next to the River in Da Nang, great view. Food was excellent, especially the avocado banana rolls, coconut pancakes, and the signature Rice. Service was great too, Hai Quang and the others are the best!
Good service -khoi
Delicious food and beautiful restaurant space, good service. Price is a bit high.

We went to the cooking class - it was preparing three vegan recipes so will suit many diets (except those who don’t like mushrooms!). Some warning the class is more of a cooking demonstration however we still enjoyed it. You can ask questions and get a booklet of the recipes. We were able to practice rolling the spring rolls and cooking the banh xeo. The chef Dinh made some delicious food and Tan took almost 100 photos and videos for us which she air dropped. Would recommend the cooking class.
Food was amazing, very quiet late afternoon on Monday and Tam was terrific taking care of us. Highly recommend everything we had
It was great experience and definitely come back ❤️

This restaurant is absolutely worth your time and money. The view? Beautiful. The food? Gorgeously presented and delicious. The service? Quick and professional. Quang ensured our service remained up to standard while also training a new recruit. Highly recommend the signature fried mushrooms.
Great furniture and interior - amazing food! Staff very friendly! A little priecy.

The food was delicious, but what truly stood out was the amazing service. Tom and Dung were so kind, attentive, and professional, making us feel very welcome. Thanks to them, it was one of the best dining experiences we’ve had – highly recommended!
Food was amazing. Our server Tam did a great job and was very polite.
Dung was very accommodating, she gave us recommendations. The food she suggested was also very delicious. Will probably recommend this place to my friends and family. Toi se quay lai

Wow! After eating so much traditional food in the past few days, to the point of nausea, here we found intriguing, bold, well-measured, and well-executed Vietnamese cuisine! As soon as we arrived, we were greeted by young, friendly staff who escorted us to our table on the terrace. Quang is an excellent restaurant manager: polite, kind, and precise, he also made the right recommendations based on our tastes. The view, spanning the river and the downtown skyline, is breathtaking. We ordered several dishes, all of which received top marks. Honorable mention goes to the grilled tofu. It's no coincidence that this restaurant is also featured in the 2025 Michelin Guide. It deserves it. Highly recommended. The lack of meat and fish is a huge plus in the quest for tasteful, technically sophisticated vegetarian options. The price is more than fair.
The food was so good, and very authentic. Considering it a vegetarian restaurant. Dung was wonderful such a nice waitress

Incredible experience. I'm pretty sure the customer I invited will sign my contract :)
Above the joke, food is totally amazing. I am vegetarian but all people around the table was astonished. So sad I live in Paris...
Ps: photos are only 3 out of 14 meals we took. No idea which was the best.
Ps2: service of Haï Quang was at food level. Perfect.

Thanks to all team.
Dung was amazing, thank you for the great food and wonderful views
The restaurant is great, the service is fun, the food is delicious, everyone should try it 😍
Great view, pretty good food

Came for dinner last night. The place is quite lovely and comfortable. The food was great, really fresh and we enjoyed all the dishes we shared but unfortunately the service let down the whole experience.
Whenever we ordered a drink we would then need to order it again with another wait person who came to the table to retake the order, after which it looked like they were having a conference meeting about it and then it either came after a long wait or we had to chase it up again.
Very strange considering we were ordering things on their actual menu and pointing to it and using translate app…. So language barriers aside it’s just really terrible slow service. But food was lovely.

A quaint restaurant specializing in vegetarian fare. The staff were very polite and courteous, especially our host Tam. We came for a late lunch so there was just one other table when we arrived. We had 5 dishes - shamballa rolls, cheese baked mushroom oyster, fried snowflake mono, signature fried rice, and grilled banana cake. For drinks we ordered lemon and hibiscus iced tea, Ruby Dreams, and Hello Da Nang. The beverages were fleshing, especially the hibiscus iced tea and our food was fresh and flavourful. The portions were just right for two people sharing. We highly recommend Shamballa for its tasteful food and superb service and hospitality!

One of the best dining experiences I've had in a long while. Celebrating a birthday milestone, we are soooo glad that we chose Shamballa to dine at. 5 stars aren't enough; 20 stars in total (5 from each of our party of four).

From the welcome to the very last bite, everything was perfect. Grateful that we got to try a fair few of the dishes on the menu -- the selection was overwhelming! Looking forward to coming back and sampling other dishes! Of note: the smashed rice paper mushroom salad, the crispy abalone mushrooms, the chilli sprinkled fried tofu (my personal favourite), and the wild vegetables sauteed with garlic as recommended by our exceptionally wonderful waiter, Tran Phuong Dung! Shout-out to this lovely young lady, Dung, for looking after us all evening and the exacting and effortless service. You are a gem 💎 and we all greatly appreciate you! 🙏❤️ Thank you for making our evening so enjoyable and relaxed.

We had an avid meat-eater in our group and even they were seriously impressed by the flavours and presentation of the dishes. Kudos and huge thanks to the kitchen staff, too. An absolutely beautifully crafted and delicious meal.

Bar staff: whatever you're doing, please continue doing that! Cocktails, mocktails, mojitos were gorgeously presented and so tasty.

Yeah. We liked it. A lot 🤣😋.
Everybody -- just go. Book a table and just go! Soooo good. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
An is a wonderful host. Delicious food and cocktails. Wonderful place.

beautiful view, first time eating and being able to go to the 4th floor to watch the Han River is so relaxing, the food is delicious and tasty, order some rolls and dip them in sauce to eat =)), love the brown rice dish the most, not gey but the staff is handsome and gentle
hehehehe
This is my first meal ever in Vietnam, the food was very creative and delicious! The staff Bao is really helpful and kind, overall satisfied!
Tell
Bao

I dinned here on some lovely local vegetables stir fried in garlic.  Simply excellent.

My hostess Tan was very friendly and attentive with prompt service.

All together it created an wonderful atmosphere and an extremely pleasant evening.

Amazing restaurant, delicious food!!!
Real value for money!
Tan and all the other waiters are amazing and kind, amazing service!
Highly recommended ❤️
Delicious food. Beautiful to look at.

Probably the best vegetarian food in the city! Very unique items I highly suggest getting lots of small plates to try everything. Come early to get a nice spot with a  river view. Tam  and the staff are very accommodating! 😃

WONDERFUL food. So tasty and thoughtfully combined flavours.
VERY attentive service (shout-out to Kiet)!
BEAUTIFUL view of the skyline.
100% recommendation! ❤️❤️❤️
tuyệt vời!!!

Shamballa in Da Nang is a real insider tip for anyone seeking good food, a relaxed ambiance, and a welcoming atmosphere. The rooftop is a particular highlight: stylishly furnished, with plenty of greenery, cozy lighting, and a sweeping view of the city—perfect for unwinding.

The food is not only exclusively vegetarian, but also perfectly balanced—fresh, creative, and prepared with love. The menu is varied, and the cocktails are sophisticated and well-mixed. Anyone who thinks meat-free is boring will be very pleasantly surprised.

The team is young, warm, and dedicated. Even if it takes a few minutes longer now and then, you can feel that everyone is enjoying themselves and is attentive. And let's be honest: you're on vacation—so sit back, enjoy, and breathe deeply.

Conclusion:

A place to feel good—with soul, style, and taste. Ideal for a relaxed dinner with a special flair. Be sure to head up to the rooftop and experience the tranquility above the city.
The food is delicious, the waiter Tinh is very cute

Shamballa Vegetarian has a unique and vibrant flavor. This place is THE best vegetarian food I have had in Vietnam—it blows the food I had in a luxury cruise out of the water.
The banana curry, and the jasmine rice was sublime. The green curry truffle tapenade has classic tastes and a variety of pleasant textures.
Experience from Saigon to Da Nang still 1 comment: excellently delicious. Super friendly service, will come back 🙏
Great kitchen, great view from the rooftop. Would recommend
The soup contains MSG so eating it causes allergies.
A wide variety of dishes, a rooftop terrace, and very friendly service: Thanks to Bao and his colleague. The food was delicious and excellent value for money.
The space is very good, the food is a bit salty for me because I'm a vegan, the service is very friendly, the male waiter Bao is enthusiastic and very cute.
Great service, exquisite meals, leaving people wanting more, especially recommend Kiet service, thank you

Best vegetarian restaurant I’ve eaten at in a long time. This is a Michelin restaurant and it’s truly well deserved of the accolade.

Price is high, but it’s actually worth the value of what you’re eating.

This place is a hidden gem in Da Nang!

Every dish and drink we tried exceeded any expectations I had. Every ingredient is intentional and meticulously thought out. Dishes are well balanced with ingredients. You can tell the Chef and cooks really know how everything holistically blends together.

Order the appetizers: mushroom (tastes like chicken), 3 layer tofu, salads, bun hue, all of it…

I don’t care about service, but they very attentive.

I’m surprised they’re not busier.

My only regret is not coming back and trying more dishes. And, we’ve been twice now.
Nice

⭐ 5-Star Experience! ⭐

What an absolute gem! From the moment we walked in, everything about this place was just wow — the ambience, the flavours, the presentation, and most of all, the people.

As strict Jains, we often struggle to find places that accommodate our dietary needs. But here? They went above and beyond! Not only did they offer Jain-friendly options, but the food was so flavourful and beautifully presented, we forgot it was a special request!

A big shoutout to Tan and An, our wonderful servers — so warm, so kind, and so attentive. They made us feel at home, smiling through every request with such grace.

And the drinks — wow! Bursting with creativity and freshness, each one looked and tasted like a work of art.

Truly an unforgettable experience. Highly, highly recommend to anyone looking for delicious food, lovely vibes, and heartwarming hospitality.
The food is delicious. The service is enthusiastic and friendly. The space is comfortable and relaxing.
Great find for vegetarian food. The rooftop view is awesome, and service by Tam was exceptional! Highly recommended.
Kiet served us so good, he is so helpful too

Absolutely stunning meal!!! The best vegan food we had in months. Kiet our server was absolute class, friendly, fast and helpful! Would 100% recommend we ended up ordering 5 dishes between two people and finished them all with not a drop left to spare. Please open a Ha Noi branch!!!
Great, great, GREAT!! Service from Kiet was 10/10, drinks 10/10, vibe and view 10/10, food off the charts!! Must try!
Amazing tasty food, huge selection, inventive and executed flawlessly.

The food was delicious and creative. There were so many things we wanted to try and we had only a small number. I think this would be a great place to go with a group so you can get more dishes and share them. Additionally, the view was exceptional. Tam, our server, was also extremely attentive. Highly recommended!

This restaurant has a great environment and the food is delicious. The service attitude of the staff is also very good and thoughtful. Thank you very much for Miss.Tan's service. I will definitely visit often in the future~
Tan gave great service! The food was delicious! So many different options and fun drinks
So delicious and Tan was a wonderful server!! I really enjoyed my food and great atmosphere :)
This was a wonderful dining experience we will never forget. Incredible food, service and atmosphere. 10/10 highly recommend.

I first found Shamballa in HCMC by coincidence and really liked it. So I made a reservation here to see the fireworks and got a front row table with excellent view. The staff was very attentive, food came fast and was delicious. Will come back for sure.
Tam is very good
Kiet gave us very nice service 💯💯💯 …
Be prepared to climb 3 floors of stairs! Went with great expectations but both the food and ambience were sort of mediocre. Nothing bad but not great either. Not worth the price.
Beautifull place, very good food !

I was originally just searching for the best vegetarian restaurant in Da Nang, but I didn't expect that when I arrived at the door, it was recommended by Michelin in 2025.
It's really a blessing to dine on the rooftop with the night view of Han River.
Thanks to Tan for his attentive reception and food recommendations. I wasn't very hungry tonight, but I was very satisfied with the meal.

A wonderful little hideaway from the heat and noise of the day. A super peaceful atmosphere with delicious vegetarian food, particularly the fig salad 💖. Delighted to find this place during our short stay in Da Nang.

I found this restaurant while walking. Mykwang noodle was my choice. It was excellent and taste, having stars of Michelin’s recommendation. Interior design also is a wonderful one, depicting Tibetan style. Especially the kind service of staffs was impressive. I’d like to visit more times during this vacation.
I visited at 4:00 pm, delicious food, variety, reasonable price, lovely staff.
The most delicious vegetarian food in da nang. authentically slow cooked soups and rolls, no shortcuts in here. Will be back!
Food was great. Lots of options for you to choose from! And all fresh and tasty. It’s worth the climb to the rooftop for the view.
The food is so delicious and the staff are very friendly. The view of the Han River is also amazing. I would like to visit again next time.
Delicious food and have eaten here many times
A delicious meal with a range of flavour delights. Wonderfully fresh ingredients, beautifully curated & presented.
It was all very lovely, good food and good service. Definitely a must visit restaurant when you come to Danang.
Great vegetarian and vegan food! Must try!

Good food, good service.
Duy

Great food and atmosphere. Tao and Khoi were very attentive and friendly, and they looked after us the whole evening. It’s a pity we found this restaurant on our last night. The view is superb, and the food is absolutely delicious!

The food and staff here are great. My group of 8 needed a last minute booking and the staff here responded to my email very quickly to arrange a table.  The staff here are great for allergies as well, easily accommodating for our tables nut allergy.
The food here was delicious. Between us we basically ordered the whole menu. Tan was a great waiter and ensured we were well looked after.
We would definitely come back here in Da Nang!!
Great food in a cozy atmosphere. Outstanding service by Tan. Definitely coming here again!
Mr Tien is superb with his service..the food is phenomenal with taste.love the place!!
Very good service , and the set is perfect
The restaurant space is very beautiful, delicious food, lovely service!!

Went in a group of 7, tried the majority of the menu between us and was all great. Even the heavy meateaters of the group found dishes they loved. Our Waitress Tan was great and accommodated for allergies and special requests well. Amazing time, beautiful location, highly recommend

I had a great experience here. The food was delicious and clean. I especially want to compliment Kiệt for his attentive and thoughtful service. He was very caring and made sure everything was perfect for us. Thank you for such a wonderful meal and excellent service

We arrived at 17:45 and were told we had to leave by 7 for fireworks. 4 of us ordered food and drinks. Drinks never came, despite the food being there for 30 mins. My food didn't come because they forgot my order. I reminded them and got my food at approx 18:40. I didn't even have time to finish my meal. Additionally, after reminders of the drink, they didn't bring all the drinks we ordered because they forgot my cocktail. I left the restaurant hungry and hadn't time to finish my meal.

Good food but worst service I've ever had in Vietnam.

What a superb restaurant! The building is beautiful, through the secret door and up onto the rooftop. A magical place in a busy city. The food is exceptional. The brightly coloured menu shows all the dishes with a great variety of fresh ingredients, much of it grown right there on the rooftop. We ordered so much food because we had to try as much as we could! Each dish had its own character and flavour. We loved everything we ordered and so did the kids. Our server was Tien and he was the most pleasant and happy guy I’ve met in Vietnam! Our meal was a 10 star experience start to finish. We can’t wait to go back and try more of the menu. I can’t recommend it enough.
Tien was an amazing host. Very accommodating to match the amazing food. The curries were very tasty.

Shamballa was a standout dining experience. The vegan dishes were full of depth, with beautifully layered flavors and a unique twist on classic Vietnamese cuisine. You could tell a lot of thought went into every plate.

The ambiance was calm and elegant, and the rooftop offered a lovely view of the river—perfect for a relaxed evening. A big thank you to Dung, our attentive waitress, who took the time to explain the dishes and guide us through the menu.

Highly recommend for anyone looking for something flavorful, creative, and plant-based in a beautiful setting.
The food here was amazing! Was served by Dung, very friendly and polite + the view from the terrace is beautiful!
Good service, moderate price.

Don't get your hopes up about the food. If you want to come, come for the space, which is truly charming.
You can easily spend a million and not even get a cup of tea or water, and anyone traveling through Vietnam knows this is a very common practice here.
Look at the restaurant's responses to negative reviews; it says a lot about the restaurant's policy!

Based on the response I received to my comment above, I changed my rating. One star is sufficient, being kind.

What you called "vague defamation" was the result of my experience with you, and the feedback you gave me only proves what I and many others have reported.
Now, based on the experience here in the comments: you don't know how to take criticism and are aggressive with customers. You didn't respond to anything I put forward, just trying to discredit me and my experience.
The negative comments are still from CUSTOMERS who visited, ate, didn't like it, and PAID. Accept the criticism and improve. One last thing, the pillars of a restaurant are good food and quality service, without one of these two any restaurant will one day close its doors!

Tan was a really great help. She made the experience here very smooth. We had their mint and passionfruit mojitos and they were truly amazing. A sensory delight. There was a lovely view of the river as well. We had a great time.

OMG. Our best food in Vietnam by far. It was delicious. We had five different dishes and all were fabulous. Only needed four dishes but the menu selections were all sooo good. The fig salad soared (I do love salads). And it was mushroom heaven. The rooftop location overlooking the Han River made it even more special. The cocktails were great too. Our waiter, Khoi, looked after us very well.

We decided to eat at your establishment because we had a great experience at the HCM branch. The food was very delicious and well presented. However, I had a bad experience with the table reservation. We just wanted to eat and make sure we had a seat before moving, we didn't necessarily want a seat on the upper floor. When booking through our hotel, we were forced to pay 800k dong to reserve a table for 2 people. I thought it was a deposit to reserve the table but in fact it was an extra for the fireworks upstairs. When we arrived a few minutes later, we told the team about the misunderstanding but we were made to understand that there was nothing to be done and that it was non-refundable. I still enjoyed the evening but it was not at all what we wanted and we felt stuck in this situation.

Why on earth is there a 300,000 VND cover charge per person for an inside table at 6pm just because there is a fireworks display outside at 9pm that we wouldn't be able to see anyway?

EDIT:

Wow! Your response is absolutely appalling and you should be ashamed. We arrived at 6:15pm, not 6:40pm and we were never shown to a table nor were we requesting a rooftop patio table. You must be thinking of another customer, which would indicate that we are not the only ones who felt this way. We would have been quite happy to sit inside without a view as we knew we were there too early to see the fireworks. But to pay 300,000 VND each on top of the price of our meal is ridiculous. Had we wanted to sit on the rooftop to watch the fireworks then yes, we would understand the additional charge. We have been to your restaurant before as well as taken your cooking class. But this just feels like a greedy money grab.

EDIT #2:

It looks like you completely edited your initial response so as to not come off looking too bad. Bottom line, we were told there would be a cover charge to dine with you tonight. We were not presented with any other options, so we choose to leave. Your reply to the complaint was unprofessional and you were the one who escalated and made it personal. We expected better, especially based on your Michelin award and our previous experiences. Sadly, we were very disappointed.

The dishes are beautifully presented, delicious, friendly service, the family went on the fireworks day quite crowded. The lotus and cucumber salad and pho rolls were quite tasty. Affordable for the experience compared to the general level.
Tam is a very nice and kind girl,the services she gave was commendable.
Top food and view
Had an amazing meal at Shamballa. The food is fantastic and they have lots of gluten free options too. Also had great service from Khoi and his team. We will definitely be coming back.
Delicious vegetarian food with a nice rooftop river view. Good service by staff especially Huy… definitely will come to this restaurant when i come over to Danang again
Great food and original Vegetarian recipes. Amazing view from the rooftop, 10/10 woyld recommend!!
A great place to slow down, watch the city at night, delicious food, reasonable prices, quiet space, attentive service. Thank you staff (Kiet) for your support and dedicated service.
Kiet provided great service and made some great suggestions for the food and drinks. The rooftop was colourful and I had a great experience with my wife.

I booked a table on the top floor of the restaurant to watch the fireworks with a friend. From the moment we walked in, the staff warmly greeted us and promptly guided us to our table. The temperature was just right, adding to the comfort of the evening.

The food and drinks truly impressed us — very flavorful, creative, and far from boring. We felt fully satisfied. The overall vibe suited a vegetarian restaurant perfectly: calm, unpretentious, and welcoming. The view from the top floor was fantastic for watching the fireworks — definitely a highlight.

If there’s room for improvement, it would be the elevator access to the top floor and the comfort of the chairs. Also, when the place was full, my second drink order took a while to arrive — it felt like a bit of a stress test for the staff.

Final Verdict:

Service: A- (attentive, friendly, professional)
Vibe: A (relaxed, unpretentious, fitting for a vegetarian spot)
Comfort: B+ (good ambiance and setting, but chairs and access could be improved)
Food & Beverage: A (delicious, well-balanced, memorable presentation)
Price/Performance Ratio: A- (good value for quality, fair pricing)

I ate two meals in three days. It was the best vegetarian food I have ever eaten. Each dish was seasoned very delicately, the ingredients were very fresh, and the portion was not small. There was a mushroom soup that tasted a bit too strong, and I was thirsty after eating it. The other dishes were perfect. The waiter was very professional. I will come here again next time I come to Da Nang.
Khoi was an amazing host, and the food was absolutely phenomenal! Will get back again for sure. Highly recommend.
A unique vegetarian restaurant. Some dishes can be prepared without the five pungent vegetables. Every dish tastes good. Highly recommended!

Although thier cost is higher than others. However, their restaurant is one of the best vegan food in danang. Thier food made simulation of real vietnam food as vegan food with taste . We really enjoyed it and hope to come back again.
Great food, awesome view and amazing service. Thank you Huy for the attentive and friendly service. Visit this restaurant for flavorful vegetarian dishes. Get the peach, mint, passion fruit mojito.
Nice food great view 😊
Amazing food. Every meal on the menu looks  so tasty. We got 3 starters and 1 main and it was one of the best vegetarian foods we ever had. Thanks to the super friendly service!

Shamballa Vegetarian, Greenhouse & Rooftop Bar is an absolute delight! From the moment you step in, you're greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere that perfectly complements the lush greenery and stunning rooftop views. The vegetarian menu is a culinary masterpiece, offering a diverse range of delicious and healthy options that cater to all tastes.
What truly sets Shamballa apart is the exceptional service. Duy, in particular, went above and beyond to ensure our experience was unforgettable. His attentiveness, friendly demeanor, and deep knowledge of the menu made our visit even more special. Duy's recommendations were spot-on, and his genuine passion for hospitality shone through in every interaction.
Whether you're a local or a visitor, Shamballa is a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy great food, beautiful surroundings, and top-notch service. We can't wait to return.

Fantastic atmosphere! Amazing vegetarian food. Add to this the breathtaking view of the Han river (if you choose to sit on the terrace). Special mention: Excellent service by Huy - with his recommendations and suggestions. A must visit when in Da Nang.

My friends and I have been planning on going here since we moved to Vietnam, as it came highly recommended by a friend! The location was beautiful and quiet and the service was wonderful. Everyone was so friendly and the food and cocktails were so delicious. Thank you to Kyet and the whole team for a lovely evening.

Such a gem of a vegetarian restaurant! The food was fresh and full of flavor, the rooftop view was breathtaking, and the service was genuinely warm and attentive. Perfect place for a chill evening or a special night out. Highly recommended!

Normal food, ordered truffle beans but didn't get any truffle taste, ordered Hue vermicelli and ate it like vegetarian snail vermicelli. The shop is empty. Mostly foreigners come to eat. Will not come back. The staff even forgot to bring dishes and chopsticks for the guests. The food waits for a long time even though the restaurant is very empty
The food was amazing and the service was great. They didn’t chrarge any extra for card payment either.
The food was delicious and the staff was really kind!
Good service, very friendly staff. Delicious food, small quantity, high price.
Good food, but very expensive
Food was very good we really enjoyed eating here An

I came across shambala in good maps in search for vegan restaurants during my stay in Da Nang. The food and service were impeccable. We had the crispy shambala mushrooms, which we highly recommend. The aubergine and Bun Hue was also amazing. Cannot go wrong with a good noodle soup.
Excellent vegetarian restaurant. Beautiful presentation. Nice atmosphere. Attentive service. We will definitely come back 🙏💛

Amazing place, woth huge variety of tasty vegy dishes.
All tasty and beautifully served.
Fully recommend. Will return again with confidence.
Had a wonderful mushroom and truffle salad on the rooftop. Staff also all very nice. Would recommend! 5*
Very cool vegetarian restaurant

It’s the best vegan dinner!!

Everyone goes to a lot of French restaurants in Da Nang, but it seems like the gourmet experience in Da Nang is now vegetarian.

And the rooftop night view by the river is so nice that many people come here for dates. The building is also very pretty.

However, keep in mind that an additional 15% tax will be added!
The atmosphere is cool, quiet and airy. The view of the Han River Bridge and Novotel is very beautiful. The staff is also enthusiastic.
Awesome rooftop!
For me the best veggie place I have been in Da nang.

Also this restaurant of the same franchise in Da Nang: Amazingly tasty, colorful, innovative and fresh vegetarian and vegan dishes & drinks, inspiring owner, home grown garden, very friendly staff, beautiful ambiente & roof top. Highly recommended and see you soon again. Thank you very much!
The servers are super gentle, cute and attentive. For personal taste, the food is a bit bland, but very eye-catching and delicious

Very unique vegetarian Vietnamese food
"Pandan leaves" are also added to the rice
Centella asiatica salt …
Long wait and overpriced

We visited their restaurant in HCMC before and decided to try the outlet in Danang. Did not disappoint as the vegan food quality is good and well presented. They even have a roof top section overlooking the Han River but you need to …
I just got a snack, the grilled eggplant, it was delicious - the staff are 10/10 🥰 …
Great food. So many options for vegetarians. We were served by Dung who went out of her way to answer any questions we had.
2nd visit and the food is awesome, Tan’s attitude and service is superb! Will definitely come back again when I’m back at Danang 🥳 …
Excellent food and great service, special shout out to Tan who served us well and showed us around the vertical garden on the roof
Great food and nice environment. Our waitress Tan gave us good service during the evening 😊 …

The food is really delicious, especially their dishes. You can really taste the sweetness of the dishes. 😋 I also saw that they were growing their own vegetables outside the balcony. The environment is also great. 👍 The attitude of the waiters couldn't be better, especially Huy☺️ …

Wonderful experience.
Huy and Tân provide excellent service. …

The food was delicious! Everything was excellent, but the fried mushrooms with shamballa sauce were the best! Huy's service was excellent, very attentive to our requests. The atmosphere was very nice; we ate on the rooftop.
Everything was delicious. Huy's service was very kind and attentive, paying attention to every detail. I highly recommend the Shambala mushrooms, which are delicious!
The best vegan/vegetarian experience in da nang! Everything was so delicious and the staff was extremely helpful and nice! Our server A was the sweetest and most helpful. We will be back!

Having been on a more plant-based diet lately, my feet brought me to this restaurant. The menu is enormous, and the drinks, in particular, immediately won me over. I had a freshly squeezed beetroot juice and a tofu plate for the main course. Huy recommended it to me because there's such a huge selection.
Tan! Thank you we had a delicious meal with an amazing view! Highly recommended 👌 …

Tien took good care of us with a warm and welcoming smile and his expertise on the menu- his recommendations were great.
We ordered Square rolls, Pho, Quang noodles, Hue noodles and fries with lemongrass and sprinkled chilly. All was good. And all it cost was a mere SGD31
Quiet space, delicious food, enthusiastic and friendly staff named Kiet
Superb services. Surprisingly good food. Pho is a must try. Taste the same with soup with meat, except less oily! Just 25USD for four dishes omg!

A wonderful restaurant with a great rooftop bar with an amazing view over the riverside of Da Nang. The food is fresh, unique and outstandingly delicious! The staff is super friendly and attentive - special thanks to Dung, she did an amazing service and turned my dinner to a wonderful experience.
The food is delicious and Khoi is very enthusiastic.
Delicious
great food,great atmosphere, nice,people

Lovely vietnamese food!
An does a great job

A beautiful restaurant with a beautiful view! Gorgeous vegan and vegetarian food with tons of options. We also had the lychee and strawberry mojitos which were to die for. Tan, our host was so lovely and kind- she went above and beyond!

We had a wonderful dinner at Shamballa! The food was very, very good. The view from the rooftop terrace in the evening is also exceptional. The restaurant is a bit more expensive than average, but this is justified by the excellent service and ambiance. A tip for the waitresses is also included. :) Kiet served us and did everything to ensure we had a great evening. Thank you!
It was amazing food with such lovely persons! Tan was our waitress and she is so nice. Also the view is amazing!

We have eaten at Shamballa in HCMC but Da Nang was better. The banana curry was excellent and the Tofu stir fry just as good. Service was amazing, especially Tan who did everything she could to make the evening perfect.
The space is clean and airy, delicious food, friendly staff, especially Huy
Delicious food, beautiful scenery, enthusiastic staff Huy

We were simply thrilled. The view of the city from the terrace in the evening is simply breathtaking, the service (we were served by Kiet) was super attentive and quick, and the food was so flavorful, very authentic, and beautifully presented. It was an all-around fantastic evening, perfect for a date or a quick treat.
It was delicious and tan had great customer service! I’ll return here
Tan was amazing as our waitress and the food was just absolutely delicious
Vegetarian!

We had a wonderful evening at Shambhala and the staff are so wonderful and take pains to get your order correct even down to asking if you have any food allergies. An was out host for the evening and everything we tried from the claypot brown rice, the 3 layered tofu, the pumpkin soup, rice paper rolls. A must visit when in Danang because you it's hard to imagine all that's possible with everyday vegetables.
Highly recommend. Food and service was amazing Tan was so attentive.  Definitely a great experience and they had vertical gardens too!
The food was exceptional given the variety of options available here for vegetarians. An who attended to us made the experience even better and definitely a must try for vegetarians visiting Da Nang.
Not worth the money.. super expensive! And I had 2 waiters staring at us all the time (a bit too much). Good food but too expensive

My partner and I really enjoyed the green salted crispy mushrooms and the Shamballa crispy mushrooms. To be honest I’m still thinking about this they were so good.
We ordered a few more dishes because it was our first time dining there, however the eggplant and banh hoi la lot wasn’t to our liking. I think we weren’t used to the eggplant having a strong smoky flavour; I usually enjoy my eggplant on the sweeter side.
The la lot tasted a bit odd to us. We felt it wasn’t cooked enough because it was quite soft, we did raise this with our waiter (who was really great) who said it was the way it was cooked so perhaps again the mushroom mixture they used just wasn’t to our taste.
The bank xeo we had was nice but it wasn’t amazing.
We also ordered a bowl of pho and it again was nice, it satisfied the craving I had for a soup kind of dish.
Overall, we had a good experience. Cannot fault the service and the atmosphere there.
We came back again for dinner just for the mushrooms 👌
Fried mushrooms 10/10

If you want a “slightly better food experience”, come here. The price is of course higher than street food, but there is a reason for that. The amazing view from the rooftop terrace, the nicely decorated restaurant and the hugely diverse vegetarian menu are not even the highlights of the restaurant. When you step inside, you feel like royalty! My wife and I were treated wonderfully and the staff was definitely the friendliest I have ever encountered in Vietnam.

The taste of my own food (mozzarella and rice dish) was perhaps not the tastiest ever, but that was just down to the portion selection.

If you are a vegetarian or even vegan, this is where you want to eat. Or even if you are not. Here is a reason to try something new.
The restaurant has a beautiful rooftop view, delicious food. Enthusiastic and friendly staff. Mr. Khoi provided thoughtful support.
Great experience good food. Thank A for your hospitality. 😊

Delicious food, great atmosphere and very professional, attentive staff. I am so glad I came across this restaurant when looking for vegetarian food in the area. I cannot wait to visit again and try more food from their extensive menu. Would strongly recommend visiting if you are in Da Nang! Reasonably priced too.
A lovely peaceful spot with tasty food! A space for some peace in a busy city.
Very good! (you: Tri)
Dung was very kind and did such a great service. Amazing food! Delicious

I had an absolutely wonderful experience at this restaurant. The food was not only delicious but also entirely vegan, offering a perfect balance of flavors and creativity. Every dish was prepared with great attention to detail, making it a true delight for the taste buds.

The atmosphere was cozy and inviting, making it an ideal place to relax and enjoy a meal. What truly set this place apart, however, was the outstanding service. Our server, An, was exceptionally polite, professional, and attentive, ensuring that we had everything we needed without ever being intrusive.

I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for amazing vegan cuisine, a warm ambiance, and top-tier service. We are here for The second time today!

Amazing food, great service. The lemongrass chips were so yummy, and the hot and sour soup was the best! They catered for our no onion and garlic needs.

AN provided us with really good service!
The food was good.  My server  An was pleasant and attentive.

Great experience
The team was lovely, the rooftop tables really nice with a nice view on the river and not to noisy
And the food was so good.
I really recommend
I loved this place. The food was excellent, ingredients high-quality, service was excellent (from Khoi) and the views were amazing. Highly recommend!

An served us. Everything was delicious and very lovingly prepared. We were very well looked after. And we were able to admire the beautiful skyline from the rooftop.
We spent a little more money because we were so hungry. We ordered a lot from the menu, so it was more expensive than at other restaurants. But I didn't regret it.
Excellent service from an. I am very satisfied with the food and the services at Shamballa! Will definitely come again to enjoy the vegetarian dishes!
Tien treated us well and the food was great. Good service, good food!
Perfect
An Is a great waiter. Fabulous food and amazing environment.
Best food and service in Da Nang, Dung was our waitress and she was exceptional, give her a raise!
special dishes and sublime flavours.
We had dinner there today. The food was fantastic. Tien is very attentive and greeted us with a warm smile. We will definitely come back here

Good restaurant, the food is tasty but not as impressive as we experienced at its sister restaurant in Hoi An, which was truly amazing.
The dishes are overall good, most of them with interesting flavors.
The courteous and professional service of the waiter Tien stood out.

We loved our experience at Shamballa! I ordered the grilled eggplant and asked for them not to marinate it. I loved what the brought. They let me put all the topping I wanted on it and I appreciated that! I also ordered the banana curry and I admit that I was so excited to try it I forgot to take a pic so I through some greens on it and tried to make it look good! lol
My husband got the Vietnamese pancake and herbs and he loved it!  Great waitstaff, atmosphere and menu is do creative!! We’ll definitely return next year when we’re back in Danang 🥰
Thank you Shamballa! This place has really good food and the ambience is great. Dung, was really nice and kind , her service was superb! We enjoyed our time here and we will back again for more. 😊
The server Dung was very nice. Food was delicious!! Highly recommended.
Beautiful restaurant and exquisite food!!
This place is a must visit. I had the signature rice with cheese, the salted fried mushrooms, and the hibiscus and lemon tea. OMG!!!

The best mojito (mint, peach and passion fruit) that we’ve had anywhere in the world. And we’ve tried mojitos from over 50 countries lol. This tofu appi was fantastic if you like tofu. The food was very good and the service genuine. The price is a little higher than other vegan restaurants in Da Nang but the atmosphere is excellent.
The taste can be lighter, a little too strong, and the environment is very good.

The menu looked overwhelming at first, but going into the details revealed one of the best restaurant meals I have had for a long time. We ordered two different dishes and they were both masterclass in cooking and serving. Do not get destructed by the pricing the meals are worth more than you pay for! Also the atmosphere in the venue is exceptionally good.
The atmosphere is calm and peaceful. We tried several dishes, and they were all delicious. The staff is super friendly and pleasant.
Delicious vegetarian restaurant!

We enjoyed a wonderful cooking class with Chef  Dinh and his delightful team, Tien and Khans.
We prepared 3 of Shamballa’s beautiful dishes in their well equipped classroom. It was like something out of Masterchef! Chef Dinh is an artist, sharing his knowledge and a few secrets too…inspiring. We would not hesitate to recommend this cooking course 3 plus ours of culinary pleasure. We have eaten 3 times, twice in Ho Chi Min City and once in Da Nang. Our favorite restaurant in all of Vietnam…thank you
They make very nice and tasty vegetarian food. I wish to go there again but my time didn’t permit.

I really wanted to love this place but unfortunately I only liked it. While the service was very good, everyone was very friendly, and the atmosphere was nice, I found the food to fall fairly flat in terms of flavour.

I really love the assortment and the unique dishes, but perhaps I was unlucky with my selection.

The brown fried rice had almost no flavour and the tofu scallops really just tasted like tofu with a bit of bland sauce. The coconut pancakes and the clay pot noodles were pretty good, but not 150k each good.

Unfortunately I feel like I can only give a 3.5 for eveything because of the price. We paid 1,000,000 for 2 rice dishes, 2 appetizers, 1 mocktail and a glass of wine.

Compared to what you can get for 25k here, I was unfortunately dissapointed.
Excellent place even if not exactly cheap for Vietnam standards... anyway it's absolutely worth it
Great place by the river, and the vegan pho was amazing.
Great food, lots of gluten free options and tea. Amazing views over the han river on the rooftop. Khôi was very attentive and friendly.

They need to work on the interiors of the place. Too dark and dingy for a lunch.
Food quality is good, taste can improve in some dishes.
Very friendly and attentive service very luxurious, fancy restaurant. Food is delicious and presented well. I recommend the square rolls.
Incredibly good and beautifully presented food and drinks in a fantastic location with fantastic, professional service. I was there yesterday and am going again today 🤩

All the food can request for no onion garlic.

Foods are super delicious, we stay in Danang 4 nights and come here for dinner 3 times. 😄

Staff are super friendly.

No need to share photos. Food is exactly how their online menu is. They had the whole building including the rooftop. The rooftop is part sheltered (for dining) and part open (for drinks). Good for corporate events if there is such a thing in Da Nang.

A tad bit more expensive compared to other vegetarian restaurants. I suppose you pay for the ambience. According to my husband, you can taste the vegetables in the food. The menu is not trying to pass off as some plant-base alternatives to meat dishes.

Worth a try if you have some extra $ to spend.
This place is amazing! They serve local vegetarian/vegan meals. Is a must try 🌴♥️

Clean and well-kept place, as well as tastefully furnished. The atmosphere is calm and relaxed, accompanied by delicate background music. The food is good, carefully prepared using fresh ingredients, and well presented.
The staff is kind and prepared (they can speak English).
Prices in my opinion slightly above average, comparing it to similar restaurants.

Each and every item on the menu is so thoughtfully crafted with the intention of providing the authentic Vietnamese food experience to vegetarians.

We visited this place twice and our mind was blown equally both times.

The chef is a culinary genius, and we absolutely loved how they used mushrooms, tofu, and Eggplant as a substitute of meat in all the dishes.

We ordered the items below:

1. Summer rolls: The rolls were soo green and healthy. The addition of mint leaves gave a refreshing flavour.

2. Three layer tofu: crunchiness from cucumbers and crispness from fried tofu.

3. Fried Rice: Though a common dish in India, we were amazed how the addition of certain vegetables and cheese can enhance the taste to another level.

4. Cheese baked mushroom oyster:
They served mushrooms baked in cheese inside an artificial oyster on a bed of sea salt with the intention of providing a real experience of eating Oysters to vegetarians.

5. Seared Tofu: Roasted Tofu with crunchy veggies

6. Grilled Eggplant: Beautiful roasted eggplant with peanuts and mushrooms

The ambience and view from the rooftop space is 10 /10.

This place is a must visit for vegetarians
Amazing healthy food, peaceful atmosphere, and friendly staff. Forgot to take a photo of the noodle dish and cooked watercress we ordered, but it was also excellent. Definitely recommend.

This vegetarian restaurant caught our attention with its great reputation, and after days of indulging in seafood, we decided to give it a try. We’re so glad we did! The food was incredibly flavorful, beautifully presented, and accompanied by outstandingly friendly service. Despite being open for just a year, they’ve already made a mark—and even grow many of their greens right on the rooftop! Truly impressive!

Really happy with the food and the ambiance here! We had the vermicelli glass noodles and the roasted rice rolls with toffee nut coffee. Each item was extremely delicious and filling. The staff is very friendly here as well, very patient…they also taught me and my wife how to use chopsticks, and we were able to learn it very well. Must visit!

Peaceful hideout feel. The staff were very attentive and they were the only place which tells me I can opt out alliums for ALL their dishes. Enjoyed the sour soup the most! My kids enjoyed almost all the dishes we ordered with the most praises going to the 3 layered tofu.

Note: They do charge service and VAT.

It is a great place for vegetarian food. Really wonderful atmosphere, a great choice of delicious dishes and fantastic service. Like to shout out to Khanh, she was a really wonderful waiter who was helpful and kind. Highly recommended restaurant.

My husband and I had a lovely time here. We arrived at 20:00 on a Sunday without a reservation and were seated right away. In fact, we were the only customers in the restaurant the whole time we were there!

The menu is so extensive, we struggled to decide on what to get and have resolved to return before we leave Da Nang. The menu has English translations for everything, and pictures for most dishes (which was actually very helpful). Allergens were listed clearly, where relevant. The staff were attentive and polite, and spoke good English.

The meal was lovely and balanced; well seasoned and beautifully presented. We did take pictures of the food, but given that the official pictures online look exactly like the food we were served, there's no need for us to duplicate. The meal really is exactly how it looks!

We were able to pay using our British debit card and didn't need cash.

A standout experience in an otherwise overly touristic city. Please consider popping in if you enjoy tasty vegetarian food.

As someone who often searches for vegetarian restaurants, I accidentally discovered this place. The space is cozy and the staff is very enthusiastic. And especially the guy named Khoi is so cute. Will come back and introduce to friends.

Best experience in Vietnam ever! Just enjoy the food, the kindness of the staff and the beautiful place…10/10
Thanks for everything 🙏

I loved my experience! The food was delicious, especially the pho. On top of that your food comes with an incredible view of the city. The service was great - Tien and Duong were very attentive and friendly.

We had lunch here and enjoyed it very much. The fried breadfruit and vegetarian pho were delicious and the vegetables were very fresh. The restaurant is clean and peaceful and our server, Khanh was great!
Very nice
Very good vegetarian food
Dung was excellent. We had a lovely time and she was a great server. She was very kind and attentive throughout the whole night. We had a lovely meal.

We had such a fantastic evening at Shamballa in Da Nang. The cocktails and hot pot were delicious. Our server, Dung, was so lovely, attentive and kind! She really made our evening. She was so smiley, sweet and positive. We loved our …

Delicious food, quiet space, cute and enthusiastic staff @ Dung
Will come if I have a chance to return to Da Nang
What a gem! The food and service was amazing 🤩. Thank you so much Duong for a truely magical meal …
Great vegetarian food and Khanh was very nice!
Amazing flavours, excellent service, Tien was an excellent host, he recommended an excellent menu. We will definitely be back! 😋 …

Very nice veg restaurant.
Mr. Tien good service. He speaks very good English.
Must try restaurant.

Great place-service was excellent especially from Tien.
Great location with views of the city.
Good food, nice view and awsome service from Khoi!
It’s a specialty vegan restaurant and the food is delicious. I was also touched by the kindness of the restaurant employee Khoi^^
Amazing food and nice ambience with a choice to sit at the attic.
Tien is a guy who service me and my wife , he is nice and polite,and all the food are nice .this place is enjoyable for us , we will come back again  for sure

We had a lovely dinner here at Shamballa. Our server Dung was incredible and super helpful accommodating my severe gluten allergy. She even suggested sitting up on the rooftop which was so beautiful. Highly recommend to all!
Second time back and still satisfied
Best vegan ever in whole Da nang city. Really Dont think just come order and enjoy
We had an excellent waiter named Tin. Super friendly, and made it a wonderful dining experience. Every dish was delicious. Will be back!

Food is good,
Pho is very nice, love the soup!
Dung is very nice staff
Must come for vegetarians
Amazing veggie food with a great view. Service was exceptional, especially from Tien. A perfect way to end a wonderful holiday!
food quality is consistently delicious from saigon to here danang with a better of Bun Hue. love it
My mom said this is the best phở she ever got it in her life with the price of 95k only!
Amazing view over the river , great and healthy food and my waiter Tien did an amazing job ! Will come back !

Awesome food and service! My parents love the creativity and excellent vegetarian taste. Service is marvellous, especially from Thien and his team. This is our second time here after yesterday dinner.
We went to the branch in Ho Chi Minh. However, we found the food was way better here in Da Nang. Service is was friendly- Tram.

Everything from the food to the service was impecable!
Khanh was absolutely beautiful as a hostess, the staff went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect for us.
The food was some of the best vegetarian food I’ve ever had.
If you’re visiting Danang, make sure to stop by!
Amazing food all flavours lovers please if you go there order sweet sour & spicy hotpot. Service from Khanh was excellent .Good ginger tea
Beautiful venue, great service and great food!
Relaxing place, excellent and abundant food. service with kind, courteous and attentive khanh. excellent restaurant, recommended!
Khanh provided great service and served great food
Really nice service and food! We loved the the variety of dishes - it is not often vegetarians get so many delicious options at once 🥰✨ thank you Khành for the service and guidance 🤗
Very nice food, super nice staff ( good service by Khoi) . With a nice river view to top it off. I would definitely recommend this place!
Dung was excellent waitress. We highly visiting this restaurant.

I already had good experiences at their saigon branches so I went in with high expectations... and they still blew me away !!!

the ambiance is as nice as ever but THAT ROOFTOP BAR really sets this place apart. a beautiful panoramic view of the city perfect to watch the boats float by. the greenhouse up there is also so beautiful and lush. a mustttt visit in da nang imo.
Very good service from tram and khanh .

Shamballa Vegetarian Restaurant & Greenhouse offers a serene escape from the bustling city life of Da Nang. Situated by the Han River on a quiet street, the restaurant provides a peaceful atmosphere with a Tibetan vibe. The entrance greets you with a grand wooden door adorned with intricate Tibetan carvings, setting the tone for a unique dining experience.

****Ambiance and Setting****

The restaurant boasts high ceilings and an open atmosphere filled with earthy incense and enchanting Tibetan tunes. A highlight is the large open garden atop the dining area, where fresh vegetables are grown and used in the restaurant's dishes. Dining under natural sunlight amidst the greenery provides a relaxing experience that helps diners unwind.

****Menu and Cuisine****

Shamballa offers a wide array of vegetarian dishes inspired by Vietnamese and international flavors. Signature dishes include crispy mushrooms in a sweet and sour sauce and *banh xeo* (crispy pancake) served with fresh herbs from the garden. The menu also features a variety of beverages, from cocktails to traditional herbal drinks, and a selection of wines for an elevated dining experience.

****Service****

Nestled in the heart of Da Nang, Shamballa Vegetarian, Restaurant & Greenhouse is a true gem that promises an extraordinary dining experience. From the moment I stepped into this tranquil haven, I was captivated by its serene ambiance and lush greenery. Shamballa is not just a restaurant; it’s a sanctuary where food, nature, and wellness converge to create an unforgettable journey for the senses.

Shamballa Vegetarian, Restaurant & Greenhouse is a sanctuary for food lovers and wellness enthusiasts alike. It offers a unique dining experience that transcends the ordinary, combining exceptional vegetarian cuisine with a serene and eco-friendly environment. Whether you are a devoted vegetarian or simply someone who appreciates good food and great ambiance, Shamballa is a must-visit destination in Da Nang.

Every aspect of Shamballa exudes excellence, from the thoughtfully curated menu and impeccable service to the serene atmosphere and commitment to sustainability. It is a place where you can unwind, savor delicious food, and leave feeling rejuvenated and inspired. Shamballa has set a new standard for vegetarian dining, and I cannot recommend it highly enough. This is a dining experience that will stay with you long after the last bite.

The restaurant is located in a beautiful location, convenient for viewing the surrounding landscape. Friendly, cozy and polite space, suitable for families, friends, and couples looking for a peaceful, delicious meal with a variety of dishes and options. Thank you to the restaurant for letting me experience food and space worthy of the price, attentive service and fun when coming to Da Nang. It's a place I will definitely introduce to friends and come back to when I have the chance. 5* for a great experience.

Certainly! Here’s a short, engaging, and friendly review of Shamballa Vegetarian, Restaurant & Greenhouse in Da Nang:

If you're looking for a tranquil oasis in the heart of Da Nang, Shamballa Vegetarian, Restaurant & Greenhouse is the place to be. Nestled amidst lush greenery, this charming eatery offers a perfect blend of delicious vegetarian cuisine and a serene atmosphere. The food is not only healthy and fresh but also bursting with flavors that will tantalize your taste buds. From vibrant salads to hearty mains, every dish is crafted with love and attention to detail. The greenhouse setting adds an extra touch of magic, making it an ideal spot to unwind and enjoy a meal. The staff is warm, welcoming, and always ready to recommend their favorites. Whether you’re a vegetarian or just looking to explore new culinary delights, Shamballa is a must-visit. Don’t miss out on their signature smoothies and delightful desserts!

I was traveling to Da Nang but had no place to eat, so I asked a local taxi driver and he suggested this restaurant because he often takes guests there. It's a vegetarian restaurant but the food is very diverse. I ordered a salad with something made like mussels and found it delicious (I'm from Saigon). The sauce was well mixed and the food was clean. The restaurant is quiet and not noisy. I saw other tables entertaining guests or eating with friends, which was also suitable. You should stop by and eat.

Shamballa Vegetarian, Restaurant & Greenhouse in Da Nang is an ideal destination for those who love vegetarian cuisine and green space. The restaurant stands out with its elegant design, harmoniously combining modern and natural styles. The menu is rich with delicately prepared vegetarian dishes, ensuring delicious taste and nutrition.

In particular, the restaurant uses fresh ingredients from its own farm, providing dishes that are not only delicious but also safe for health. The service staff is enthusiastic and friendly, creating a comfortable feeling for customers. Shamballa's quiet and airy space is the ideal place to relax and enjoy delicious meals with family and friends.

Overall, Shamballa Vegetarian, Restaurant & Greenhouse is not only a place to enjoy great vegetarian cuisine but also a memorable green culinary experience in Da Nang.

Let me preface this by saying, my family and I are devout carnivores. Steak? Bring it on. Burgers? Pile 'em high. So, trying a vegetarian restaurant for New Year's Eve was... well, a leap of faith. But boy, did we land on cloud nine!

The "wonderful wonderful taste" wasn't just hype. Every bite was a symphony of vibrant seasoning and creative textures. The Satay Mushroom was a revelation – smoky, sweet, and oh-so-meaty (in the best plant-based way). And the 3-layer tofu? Forget tofu, that was pure magic – pillowy soft inside, crispy on the outside, and bursting with savory goodness. Even my grandma, the fussiest eater, couldn't stop praising it.

Now, let's address the elephant in the herb garden: the price. Yes, it's not your average diner fare. But hear me out – the experience we had was priceless. The explosion of flavors, the joy of discovering new favorites, the shared family moment of stepping outside our comfort zone? Worth every penny.

However, I gotta be honest – the desserts and drinks left me a little deflated. They were good, sure, but not mind-blowing, and definitely not worth the premium price tag. Stick to the star of the show – the incredible food!

**Final verdict:** Carnivores, vegetarians, and everyone in between – listen up! If you're looking for a tastebud adventure, Shamballa is your holy grail. Just skip the overpriced sweet endings and focus on the plant-powered perfection they dish up. Your taste buds (and maybe even your grandma) will thank you.

**Rating:** 5/5 for the food, 3/5 for the desserts and drinks. Overall, a plant-powered paradise!

**P.S.** Don't be shy, fellow meat-eaters! Embrace the veggie journey – you might just surprise yourself.

We had an amazing dinner here for New Year’s Eve 2023. It was surprisingly delicious with an extensive vegetarian menu which was just what we were looking for. Oh my god.

Very good! I really like the space here, it's very special. Diverse food, many choices for vegetarians. The staff are extremely friendly and enthusiastic. Encourage everyone to experience!

Spacious, clean and beautiful restaurant. Quiet in the city center! The female staff are pretty and kind. The food is flavorful, diverse and innovative, the drinks are delicious. Hope to do good marketing so that more local customers and tourists will know about it.

The food was Anaximander the service given by Viet & Chan (and the rest of the team) was perfect. …
Sooo overpriced and overhyped!! Plays up to the boujie traveller vibe.

Delicious vegan and vegetarian food, everything is clearly labelled. Calming atmosphere and very friendly staff. We had the orange tofu, eggplant rolls and two of the noodles dishes, everything tasted amazing and 10/10 for presentation. I would absolutely recommend even if you are not a vegetarian!
Best vegan in Da nang. Thank you for coming!

The staff is always very friendly! Howling is not there. The vegetarian food here is also quite wonderful and diverse with many dishes as well as a harmony of spices. Of course, when I mention delicious and nutritious vegetarian restaurants, I immediately remember Shamballa!

We had a pleasant experience at this place. The food was good and comparatively decent price. All of us ordered about 6 dishes and 3 drinks for $60 AUD.
The food was fresh and decent portion compared to other Vietnamese restaurants.
Good
best vegetarian in Da Nang
The food is delicious and diverse, the space is cool. The staff is very enthusiastic, will definitely come back many times

Woefully expensive, each dish on average is around 140k-300k  and the food does not represent the amazing culinary style of Vietnam. It may look pretty but it's lacking the passion and flavour.

We had to leave 2 out of the 3 dishes, as they were not good. The food looks beautiful but it's lacking in so many departments.

The woven noodles were a non-starter, the mock-meat incredibly underseasoned, had a horrible texture. I had to leave most of ths dish. You can get a much better option inrestaurants for a fraction of the price here (usually paying 55k for something like this, here it was 125k)

Whereas breadfruit was well seasoned, great start - but if you know breadfruit it is an incredibly dry and starchy fruit - best served with a sauce on the side or a condiment. Was it served with a condiment? No, it was dry breadfruit. Go to Indonesia, they'll do it properly for you.

The tofu came out tasting of fish, of course it's a vegetarian restaurant - so it's clearly seaweed that was used in the same oil to fry the tofu. The tofu tasted very fried without much seasoning, they stuck some fried crunchy bits on top which had bits of chilli which were good but not much else.

The staff were incredibly friendly though. I did let the staff know, that they were great - but the food was unfortunately not. It really wasn't good. In all my years in Asia, I've never left dishes like that.

I hope they can take this as a critique on those dishes and work on them - they need more flavour. Channel that Vietnamese flavour!

PS - They do not bother to serve you water. Not serving water with the meal is outrageous when you're paying 500k. How can a restaurant where we pay 40k for two meals serve water/tea but a restaurant where we pay 500k can't even serve a courtesy glass of water.

This is a vegetarian restaurant that even non-vegetarians can enjoy without feeling uncomfortable.
The food is delicious and there are a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks to make your meal more enjoyable.

The interior of the restaurant was also decorated according to the concept, so it was a pleasure to look at throughout the meal.

The restaurant is clean and the food settings are delicate and pretty, so I think it would be good for both locals and tourists.

When asked if you would like to visit again next time, the answer is absolutely OK.

Fantastic food and great service. We loved everything from the beginning to the end. The atmosphere in the restaurant is very peacefull and calm. Eating here is a magical experience!

Delicious food, very friendly staff. If you need a restaurant specializing in vegetarian cuisine in Da Nang, you should visit this place right away. My experiences here have been excellent. I will visit more often.

We paid around $35 for 7 different things. Not cheap for Vietnam, but easily worth the price.

Loved it.

Hope the restaurant will continue to maintain the quality!

Incredibly good, a bit expensive, great service, veggie heaven!

Stepping into Shambala is like stepping into the Mystery House. Colourful curtain embellishments adorn glass windows, creating an ancient beauty. The food is carefully made and very delicious. It’s such an amazing place to go for a relaxed day.

There wasn't enough liquid for the vegetables, so they added more water, and after that, the soup had no flavor. Drinks are very expensive, 100% more expensive than average. Service was okay, but they only brought the ladle after we asked for it.
Beautiful fireworks, delicious food, lovely staff.

Beautiful restaurant, quiet, delicious food, professional service.
